src: हाङ्गुल एकमात्र जानाजानी आविष्कार गरिएको दैनिक प्रयोगमा रहेको लोकप्रिय वर्णमाला हो। राजा सेजो (1418-1450) को शासनकालमा 1444 मा उक्त वर्णमालाको आविष्कार भएको थियो। राजा सेजोङ जोसेन राजवंशको चौँथो राजा थिए र सबैभन्दा सम्मानित मध्येको एउटा मानिन्छ। उनले मौलिक रूपमा हाङ्गुल वर्णमालाको नाम हुनमिन जोनगम राखे, जसको अर्थ “जनताको निर्देशनका लागि सही आवाज” हो।
mt: Hangul is the only alphabet invented for everyday use. It was invented in 1444 during the reign of King Sejong (1418-1450). King Sejong was the fourth king of the Joseon dynasty and is considered one of the most respected. He named the original alphabet Hangeul, which means "the right voice for the people's guidance."
ref: "Hangeul is the only purposely invented alphabet in popular daily use. The alphabet was invented in 1444 during the reign of King Sejong (1418 – 1450). King Sejong was the fourth king of the Joseon Dynasty and is one of the most highly regarded. He originally named the Hangeul alphabet Hunmin Jeongeum, which means ""the correct sounds for the instruction of the people""."

src: संस्कृत कसरी अस्तित्वमा आयो भन्ने बारे धेरै सिद्धान्तहरू छन्। तीमध्ये एक यो हो कि आर्यनहरूको पश्चिमबाट भारतमा भएको बसाइ सराइ जसले आफ्नो भाषा उनीहरूसँगै ल्याए। संस्कृत प्राचिन भाषा हो र युरोपमा बोलिने ल्याटिन भाषासँग तुलनीय छ। संसारको सबैभन्दा पुरानो जानिएको पुस्तक संस्कृतमा लेखिएको थियो। उपनिषदहरूको संग्रह पश्चात संस्कृत पदानुक्रमका कारण मात्र फिक्का भयो। फ्रान्सेली र स्पेनिश जस्ता युरोपेली भाषाहरूका स्रोत ल्याटिन जस्तै भारतीय भाषाहरूका लागि संस्कृत धेरै जटिल र धनी भाषा स्रोत बन्न पुग्यो।
mt: There are many theories about how Sanskrit came into existence. One of these is that the Aryans came from the west to India and brought their language with them. Sanskrit is an ancient language and is similar to Latin, the language of Europe. The oldest known book in the world was written in Sanskrit. The Upanishads, a collection of texts, were written in Sanskrit. After that, Sanskrit became a dead language because of its complex and rich grammar. French and Spanish, European languages, have Latin as their source, and for Indian languages, Sanskrit became a very complex and rich source language.
ref: There are many theories to how Sanskrit came into existence. One of them is about an Aryan migration from the west into India who brought their language with them. Sanskrit is an ancient language and is comparable to the Latin language spoken in Europe. The earliest known book in the world was written in Sanskrit. After the compilation of Upanishads, Sanskrit just faded due to hierarchy. Sanskrit is a very complex and rich language, which has served to be the source for many modern Indian languages, just like Latin is the source for European languages like French and Spanish.

src: Io को गुरुत्वाकर्षणले मलाई कसरी तान्छ? यदि तपाईं Io को सतहमा उभिनुभयो भने, तपाईंको वजन पृथ्वीमाभन्दा कम हुनेछ। पृथ्वीमा 200 पाउण्ड (90 किलो) तौलको व्यक्ति आइओमा करिब 36 पाउण्ड (16 किलो) तौल हुन्थ्यो। त्यसैले तपाईंलाई गुरुत्वाकर्षणले कम तान्छ।
mt: How does gravity pull on me on Io? If you were standing on Io's surface, your weight would be less than on Earth. A person weighing 200 pounds (90 kilograms) on Earth would weigh about 36 pounds (16 kilograms) on Io. So gravity pulls on you less.
ref: How would Io's gravity pull on me? If you stood on the surface of Io, you would weigh less than you do on Earth. A person who weighs 200 pounds (90kg) on Earth would weigh about 36 pounds (16kg) on Io. So the gravity, of course, pulls less on you.

src: चन्द्रमाको सतह चट्टानहरू र धूलोले बनेको छ। चन्द्रमाको बाहिरी सतहलाई क्रस्ट भनिन्छ। क्रस्ट नजिक तर्फ लगभग 70 किलोमिटर मोटो र टाढा तर्फ 100 किलोमिटर बाक्लो छ। यो मारियामुनि पातलो र हाइल्यान्डहरू मुनि बाक्लो हुन्छ। निकटपक्ष बढी मारिया हुन सक्छ किनभने पाप्रो पातलो छ। लाभाका लागि सतहसम्म उठ्न सजिलो थियो।
mt: The moon's surface is made of rocks and dust. The moon's outer crust is called the crust. The crust is about 70 kilometers thick near the center and 100 kilometers thick far from the center. It is thinner near the maria and thicker near the highlands. It is easier to get to the surface near the maria because it is thinner. It was easier to get to the surface for the benefit.
ref: The surface of the Moon is made of rocks and dust. The outer layer of the Moon is called the crust. The crust is about 70 km thick on the near side and 100 km thick on the far side. It is thinner under the maria and thicker under the highlands. There may be more maria on the near side because the crust is thinner. It was easier for lava to rise up to the surface.

src: चन्द्रमाको सतह चट्टानहरू र धूलोले बनेको छ। चन्द्रमाको बाहिरी सतहलाई क्रस्ट भनिन्छ। क्रस्ट नजिक तर्फ लगभग 70 किलोमिटर मोटो र टाढा तर्फ 100 किलोमिटर बाक्लो छ। यो मारियामुनि पातलो र हाइल्यान्डहरू मुनि बाक्लो हुन्छ। निकटपक्ष बढी मारिया हुन सक्छ किनभने पाप्रो पातलो छ। लाभाका लागि सतहसम्म उठ्न सजिलो थियो।

It is thinner near the maria and thicker near the highlands. It is easier to get to the surface near the maria because it is thinner. It was easier to get to the surface for the benefit.
ref: The surface of the Moon is made of rocks and dust. The outer layer of the Moon is called the crust. The crust is about 70 km thick on the near side and 100 km thick on the far side. It is thinner under the maria and thicker under the highlands. There may be more maria on the near side because the crust is thinner. It was easier for lava to rise up to the surface.

src: धेरै मानिसहरूले त्यस दिनको सपना देख्छन् जब मानव अर्को तारामा यात्रा गर्न र अन्य संसारहरूको अन्वेषण गर्न सक्दछन्, केही मानिसहरू त्यहाँबाट के निस्किन्छ भनेर अचम्म मान्छन् र केहीले एलियन वा अन्य जीवन अर्को संयन्त्रमा बाँच्न सक्ने विश्वास गर्दछन्। तर, यस्तो सदा हुन्छ भने सम्भवतः लामो समयका लागि हुँदैन। ताराहरू यतिसम्म फैलिएका छन् कि “छिमेकी” ताराहरूका बीचमा खरबौँ माइलको दूरी छ। हुनसक्छ एक दिन तपाईंका महान नातिनातिनाहरू तिनीहरूका प्राचीन पुर्वजहरूका बारे आश्चर्यचकित हुँदै एलियन संसारकामाथि उभिरहेका हुनेछन्?
mt: Many people dream of the day when humans can travel to other stars and explore other worlds, some are amazed at what comes out of it and believe that aliens can survive in other systems. But this always happens for a long time. The stars are so far apart that there are billions of miles between "neighbors". It may be one day that your great-grandchildren will be amazed at what their ancient ancestors have come out of alien worlds?
ref: "Many people dream of the day when humans can travel to another star and explore other worlds, some people wonder what's out there some belive that aliens or other life may live on another plant. But, if this ever does happen probably won't happen for a very long time. The stars are so spread out that there are trillions of miles between stars that are ""neighbors"". Maybe one day, your great grandchildren will be standing atop an alien world wondering about their ancient ancestors?"

src: सूर्यमा पृथ्वी जस्तो तपाईं उभिन सक्नुहुने पाप्रो छैन। सम्पूर्ण सूर्य ग्यास, आगो र प्लाज्माबाट बनेको हुन्छ। तपाईं सूर्यको केन्द्रबाट टाढा जाँदा ग्यास पातलो हुँदै जान्छ। हामीले सूर्यलाई हेर्दा देखिने बाहिरी भागलाई फोटोस्फियर भनिन्छ, जसको अर्थ “प्रकाशको बल हो।”
mt: You can't live on the Sun like you can on Earth. The Sun is made of gas, fire, and plasma. As you move away from the center of the Sun, the gas gets thinner. The outer layer of the Sun that we see when we look at it is called the photosphere, which means "the power of light."
ref: "The Sun doesn't have a crust like the Earth that you can stand on. The whole Sun is made out of gases, fire, and plasma. The gas becomes thinner as you go farther from the center of the Sun. The outer-part we see when we look at the Sun is called the photosphere, which means ""ball of light""."

src: सूर्यमा पृथ्वी जस्तो तपाईं उभिन सक्नुहुने पाप्रो छैन। सम्पूर्ण सूर्य ग्यास, आगो र प्लाज्माबाट बनेको हुन्छ। तपाईं सूर्यको केन्द्रबाट टाढा जाँदा ग्यास पातलो हुँदै जान्छ। हामीले सूर्यलाई हेर्दा देखिने बाहिरी भागलाई फोटोस्फियर भनिन्छ, जसको अर्थ “प्रकाशको बल हो।”

ref: "The Sun doesn't have a crust like the Earth that you can stand on. The whole Sun is made out of gases, fire, and plasma. The gas becomes thinner as you go farther from the center of the Sun. The outer-part we see when we look at the Sun is called the photosphere, which means ""ball of light""."

src: लगभग तीन हजार वर्षपछि, सन् 1610 मा, इटालियन खगोलविद् ग्यालिलियो ग्यालेलीले टेलिस्कोप प्रयोग गरेर शुक्रका पनि चन्द्रमाका जस्तै चरणहरू हुन्छन् भन्ने अवलोकन गरे। सूर्यतिर फर्केको गर्नु पर्ने शुक्र (वा चन्द्रमा) को छेउ मात्र उज्यालो हुनाले चरण हुन्छन्। शुक्रका चरणले कोपरनिकसको सिद्धान्तलाई समर्थन गर्छ ग्रहहरू सूर्यको वरिपरि घुम्छन्। त्यसपछि, केही वर्षपछि 1639 मा बेलायती खगोलविद Jeremiah Horrocks ले शुक्रको ट्रान्जिट देखे।
mt: 1610, Italian astronomer Galileo Galilei observed the phases of Venus using a telescope. The phases of Venus (or the Moon) are seen when the planet is near the Sun. The phases of Venus support the Copernican theory that planets orbit the Sun. A few years later, in 1639, English astronomer Jeremiah Horrocks observed the transit of Venus.
ref: About three thousand years later, in 1610, Italian astronomer Galileo Galilei used a telescope to observe that Venus has phases, just as the moon does. Phases happen because only the side of Venus (or of the Moon) facing the Sun is lighted. The phases of Venus supported the theory of Copernicus that the planets go around the Sun. Then, a few years later in 1639, an English astronomer named Jeremiah Horrocks observed a transit of Venus.

src: पृथ्वीको दोस्रो सबैभन्दा लामो र ठूलो नदी अमेजन हो। यसले दोस्रो सबैभन्दा ठूलो नदीको रूपमा 8 गुणा बढी पानी वहन गर्दछ। Amazon पृथ्वीको सबैभन्दा फराकिलो नदी पनि हो, जुन छ माइल फराकिलो छ। ग्रहका नदीहरूबाट महासागरमा पुग्ने पानीको पूरा 20 प्रतिशत अमेजन बाट आउँछ। मुख्य अमेजन नदी 6,387 किलोमिटर (3,980 माइल) छ। यसले हजारौं साना नदीहरूबाट पानी सङ्कलन गर्दछ।
mt: The second longest and largest river on Earth is the Amazon. It carries eight times more water than the second largest river. Amazon is also the planet's narrowest river, which is 15 miles wide. Twenty percent of the world's river water that flows into the ocean comes from the Amazon. The main Amazon River is 3,980 miles long. It collects water from thousands of small rivers.
ref: The Amazon River is the second longest and the biggest river on Earth. It carries more than 8 times as much water as the second biggest river. The Amazon is also the widest river on Earth, at times six miles wide. A full 20 percent of the water that pours out of the planet's rivers into the oceans comes from the Amazon. The main Amazon River is 6,387 km (3,980 miles). It collects water from thousands of smaller rivers.

src: अठार प्रतिशत भेनेजुएलाका मानिसहरू बेरोजगार छन्, र रोजगार गर्ने धेरै जस्ता मानिसहरू अनौपचारिक अर्थव्यवस्थामा काम गर्छन्। सेवा क्षेत्रमा, लगभग एक चौथाइ उद्योगमा र पाँचौँ भाग कृषिमा काम गर्ने दुई तिहाइ भेनेजुएला निवासीहरू। भेनेजुएलावासीहरूको महत्त्वपूर्ण उद्योग तेल हो। यो देश शुद्ध निर्यातकर्ता हो। तेल उद्योगमा केवल एक प्रतिशतले काम गर्छन्‌।
mt: 18 percent of Venezuelans are unemployed, and many of those who are employed work in the informal economy. In the service sector, about one-fourth are in industry, and five-fifths are in agriculture. Two-thirds of Venezuelan residents work in agriculture. Venezuela's major industry is oil. This country is a net exporter. Only one percent work in the oil industry.
ref: Eighteen percent of Venezuelans are unemployed, and most of those who are employed work in the informal economy. Two thirds of Venezuelans who work do so in the service sector, nearly a quarter work in industry and a fifth work in agriculture. An important industry for Venezuelans is oil, where the country is a net exporter, even though only one percent work in the oil industry.

src: हाइड्रोजन परमाणुहरू एक आपसमा विलय (वा फ्यूज) भएर भारी तत्वहरू बनाउँदा बनेको उर्जाका कारण ताराहरूले प्रकाश र ताप दिन्छन्। वैज्ञानिकहरू एक रियाक्टर निर्माण गर्नको लागि काम गर्दै छन् जसले उही तरिकाले शक्ति निर्माण गर्न सक्छ। यद्यपि यो समाधान गर्न धेरै गाह्रो समस्या हो र हामीले उपयोगी फ्यूजन रिएक्टरहरू निर्माण भएको देख्न धेरै वर्ष लाग्ने छ।
mt: Hydrogen nuclei fuse (or fuse) to form heavy elements when the energy released causes the wires to emit light and heat. Scientists are working to build a reactor that can generate power in the same way. However, this is a very difficult problem and we will not see useful fusion reactors for many years.
ref: Stars give off light and heat because of the energy made when hydrogen atoms are merged (or fused) together to form heavier elements. Scientists are working to create a reactor that can make energy in the same way. This, however, is a very hard problem to solve and will take many years before we see useful fusion reactors built.

src: तत्वहरू र यौगिकहरू एक अवस्थाबाट अर्कोमा सर्न सक्छन् र परिवर्तन नहुन सक्छन्। ग्यास नाइट्रोजनमा पनि तरल नाइट्रोजनका जस्ता गुणहरू हुन्छन्। तरल अवस्था सघन हुन्छ तर अणुहरू अझै पनि उस्तै हुन्छन्। अर्को उदाहरण पानी हो। यौगिक पानी दुई हाइड्रोजन र एक अक्सिजन परमाणु मिलेर बनेको छ। चाहे यो ग्याँस, तरल वा ठोस जे भएपनि यसको उस्तै आणविक संरचना रहेको छ। यसको रासायनिक अवस्था उही रहे तापनि यसको भौतिक अवस्था परिवर्तन हुन सक्छ।
mt: Elements and compounds can change from one state to another without changing their chemical structure. For example, nitrogen can be a gas like liquid nitrogen. The liquid state is denser, but the atoms are still the same. Another example is water. The compound water is made up of two hydrogen and one oxygen atom. No matter what state it is in, its atomic structure is the same. Its chemical state remains the same, but its physical state can change.
ref: Elements and compounds can move from one state to another and not change. Nitrogen as a gas still has the same properties as liquid nitrogen. The liquid state is denser but the molecules are still the same. Water is another example. The compound water is made up of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom. It has the same molecular structure whether it is a gas, liquid, or solid. Although its physical state may change, its chemical state remains the same.

src: क्रान्तिकारी युद्धको अवधिमा तेह्र राज्यले पहिलो पटक कमजोर केन्द्रीय सरकार गठन गरेको थियो जसमा महासङ्घको धारा अन्तर्गत काङ्ग्रेस यसको एक मात्र घटक थियो। कङ्ग्रेससँग करहरू लगाउने कुनै शक्ति थिएन र कुनै राष्ट्रिय कार्यकारी र न्यायपालिका नभएको हुनाले, यो आफ्ना कार्यहरू कार्यान्वयन गर्न प्रायः सहयोग नगर्ने राज्यका अधिकारीहरूमा निर्भर थियो। यससँग राज्यहरू बीचको कर कानून र ट्यारिफहरू उलङ्घन गर्ने अधिकार पनि थिएन। उक्त धाराहरू संशोधन गर्नुअघि सबै राज्यहरूको सर्वसम्मत सहमति आवश्यक थियो र राज्यहरूले केन्द्र सरकारलाई यति हल्का रूपमा लिए कि उनीहरूका प्रतिनिधिहरू प्रायः अनुपस्थित हुन्थे।
mt: During the revolutionary war, the first time a weak central government was formed, which had the Congress as its only component under the Mahasangh Act. The Congress had no power to levy taxes and there was no national executive and judiciary, so it was largely dependent on the officials of the states who did not cooperate in carrying out its work. It also had no power to violate the laws and tariffs of the states. Amendments to these provisions required the unanimous consent of all states and the states took the government so lightly that their representatives were mostly absent.
ref: During the Revolutionary War, the thirteen states first formed a weak central government—with the Congress being its only component—under the Articles of Confederation. Congress lacked any power to impose taxes, and, because there was no national executive or judiciary, it relied on state authorities, who were often uncooperative, to enforce all its acts. It also had no authority to override tax laws and tariffs between states. The Articles required unanimous consent from all the states before they could be amended and states took the central government so lightly that their representatives were often absent.

src: तपाईंले नेशनल ट्रेजर सिनेमा हेर्नु भएको छ भने, स्वतन्त्रताको घोषणाको पछाडि खजाना नक्सा लेखिएको थियो भन्ने तपाईंलाई लाग्न सक्छ। यद्यपि, त्यो सत्य होइन। कागजातको पछाडि केही लेखिएको भए तापनि, त्यो खजानाको नक्सा होइन। स्वतन्त्रताको घोषणा पछाडि “स्वतन्त्रताको मूल घोषणा 4 जुलाई 1776” लेखिएको थियो। पाठ भने कागजातको तल उल्टो देखा पर्छ। जब कसैलाई यो कसले लेखेको हो भन्ने थाहा थिएन, तर यसको जीवनको सुरुमा ठूलो छालाको पत्र कागजात (यसले 29¾ इन्च तल 24½ इन्च मापन गर्दछ) भण्डारणका लागि ल्याइएको थियो भन्ने थाहा छ। तसर्थ, सङ्केत नलाई लेबलको रूपमा थप्ने सम्भावना रहेको छ।
mt: Have you seen the National Treasure movie? You may have wondered if the treasure map was written on the back of the Declaration of Independence. Well, it's not. If there was anything written on the back of the Declaration of Independence, it was the Declaration of Independence. The text is reversed when you look at the back of the document. No one knew who wrote it, but it was a large sheet of paper (29¾ inches wide by 24½ inches long) that was brought in for storage when the document was first put on display. So, it's possible that the symbol was added as a label.
ref: "If you have watched the movie National Treasure, you may think a treasure map was written on the back of the Declaration of Independence. However, that is not true. Although there is something written on the back of the document, it is not a treasure map. Written on the back of the Declaration of Independence were the words ""Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776"". The text appears on the bottom of the document, upside down. While no one knows for certain who wrote it, it is known that early in its life, the large parchment document (it measures 29¾ inches by 24½ inches) was rolled up for storage. So, it is likely that the notation was added simply as a label."

src: राष्ट्र स्वतन्त्रताको प्रारम्भमा, सिङ्गापुर बोटानिक गार्डेनको विशेषज्ञताले टापुलाई उष्ण प्रदेशीय गार्डेन सिटीमा रूपान्तरण गर्न मद्दत गर्‍यो। 1981 मा, अर्किड हाइब्रिड, वन्दा मिस जोआक्विमलाई राष्ट्रको राष्ट्रिय फूलको रूपमा छानिएको थियो।
mt: At the start of independence, experts from the Singapore Botanic Gardens helped to transform the island into a tropical garden city. In 1981, the orchid hybrid, Vanda Miss Joaquim, was chosen as the nation's national flower.
ref: Early in the nation's independence, Singapore Botanic Gardens' expertise helped to transform the island into a tropical Garden City. In 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, an orchid hybrid, was chosen as the nation's national flower.

src: गिजाको पिरामिडहरू उनीहरूको आकार र निर्माणको प्राविधिक उत्कृष्टतामा कहिल्यै पार नगरे पनि पुरानो राज्यको अन्त्यसम्म ढुङ्गामा पिरामिड निर्माण कार्य जारी राखे पनि सकेनन्। हजार वर्ष पुरानो नयाँ राज्य प्राचीन इजिप्टियनहरू तिनीहरूका पूर्ववर्ती स्मारकहरूमा अचम्मित भए।
mt: The pyramids of Giza were never completed, despite the fact that the ancient Egyptians were never able to continue pyramid construction on stone after the Old Kingdom ended. The New Kingdom, which began about 3,000 years ago, was amazed by the pyramids of their predecessors.
ref: Although pyramid-building in stone continued until the end of the Old Kingdom, the pyramids of Giza were never surpassed in their size and the technical excellence of their construction. New Kingdom ancient Egyptians marvelled at their predecessors monuments, which were then well over a thousand year old.

src: प्रत्येक वर्ष अक्टोबर वरिपरि करिब 1.5 मिलियन साकाहारी जीव वर्षाका लागि उत्तरी पहाडबाट मारा नदी पार गर्दै दक्षिणी मैदानहरूतर्फ यात्रा गर्छन्। र लगभग अप्रिलको वर्षा पछि एकपटक फेरि मारा नदी पार गर्दै त्यसपछि पश्चिम हुँदै उत्तरमा फर्किन्छन्। सेरेन्गेटी क्षेत्रमा सेरेन्गेटी राष्ट्रिय पार्क, एनगोरन्गोरो संरक्षण क्षेत्र र तन्जानियामा मासाइ खेल आरक्षित क्षेत्र र केन्यामा मासाइ मारा राष्ट्रिय आरक्षण रहेको छ।
mt: 1.5 million herbivores migrate north across the Mara River in October each year to the southern plains. And back again once the rains of April have come, crossing the Mara River once more, then west to the north. The Serengeti area includes the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area, the Masai Mara Game Reserve in Tanzania and the Masai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.
ref: Every year around October nearly 1.5 million herbivores travel towards the southern plains, crossing the Mara River, from the northern hills for the rains. And then back to the north through the west, once again crossing the Mara river, after the rains in around April. The Serengeti region contains the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area and Maswa Game Reserve in Tanzania and the Maasai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.

src: फ्रान्सको लडाईं सकिएपछि जर्मनीले बेलायतको टापुमा आक्रमण गर्ने तयारी सुरु गर्यो। जर्मनीले उक्त हमलालाई “अपरेसन सिलियन” को सङ्केत -नाम दियो। डनकर्क छोडेर निस्कँदा अधिकांश ब्रिटिस सेनाका भारी हतियार र आपूर्तिहरू हराइसकेका थिए, त्यसैले सेना एकदमै कमजोर थियो। शाही जलसेना भने अझै पनि जर्मन जलसेना (“क्रिग्समेरिन”)भन्दा कडा थियो र अङ्ग्रेजी नालामार्फत पठाइएका कुनै पनि आक्रमणका जहाजलाई नष्ट गर्न सक्थ्यो। यद्यपि, जलसेनाका प्रधान सेनापतिहरू जर्मन हवाई आक्रमणबाट डुब्छन् कि भनी डराएका हुनाले सम्भावित आक्रमण मार्गहरूको नजिकै एकदमै कम शाही जलसेना जहाजहरू आधारित थिए।
mt: After the French defeat, Germany began preparations to attack British territory on the island. The Germans called the attack "Operation Sealion". Most of the British army's heavy weapons and supplies were lost when they left Dunkirk, so the army was very weak. The Royal Navy was still stronger than the German Navy ("Kriegsmarine") and could sink any ships sent to attack the English Channel. However, the naval commanders were afraid of being sunk by German air attacks, so there were very few Royal Navy ships stationed near the likely attack routes.
ref: With the battle for France over, Germany began to get ready to invade the island of Britain. Germany code-named the attack “Operation Sealion”. Most of the British Army's heavy weapons and supplies had been lost when it evacuated from Dunkirk, so the army was fairly weak. But the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy (“Kriegsmarine”) and could have destroyed any invasion fleet sent across the English Channel. However, very few Royal Navy ships were based near the likely invasion routes as the admirals were afraid they would be sunk by German air attack.

src: इटालीको योजनाका बारेमा एक स्पष्टीकरणबाट सुरू गरौं। इटाली मुख्यतया जर्मनी र जापानको “सानो भाई” थियो। योसँग कमजोर सेना र कमजोर नौसेना थियो, तथापि तिनीहरूले युद्धको ठीक अघि भर्खरै चार नयाँ जहाजहरूको निर्माण गरेका थिए। इटालीका मुख्य लक्ष्यहरू अफ्रिकी देशहरू थिए। ती देशहरू कब्जा गर्न, फौजहरूलाई भूमध्य सागर पार गरेर अफ्रिकामा आक्रमण गर्ने बनाउन उनीहरूसँग एउटा फौज प्रक्षेपण प्याड हुनुपर्ने थियो। यसका लागि तिनीहरूले इजिप्टमा रहेका बेलायती आधार र जहाजहरूबाट छुटकारा पाउनुपर्थ्यो। ती कार्यहरूबाहेक इटालीका युद्धपोतहरूले अरू केही पनि गर्नु पर्दैनथ्यो। अब जापानको लागि, जापान ब्रिटेन जस्तै एउटा टापु देश थियो।
mt: Let's start with a clarification about Italy. Italy was mainly Germany and Japan's "little brother". They had a weak army and a weak navy, but they had just recently built four new ships. Italy's main targets were African countries. They were to conquer those countries, launch troops across the Mediterranean to attack Africa, and for that they needed a troop projection pad. They had to get out of the British bases and ships in Egypt. In addition to those tasks, Italian warships had to do nothing else. Now, as for Japan, Japan was like Britain, a country on an island.
ref: "Let's start with an explanation about Italy's plans. Italy was mainly the ""little brother"" of Germany and Japan. It had a weaker army and a weaker navy, although they had just built four new ships right before the beginning of the war. Italy's main goals were African countries. To capture those countries, they would need to have a troop launching pad, so as troops could sail across the Mediterranean Sea and invade Africa. For that, they had to get rid of British bases and ships in Egypt. Besides those actions, Italy's battleships were not supposed to do anything else. Now for Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain."

src: डी-डे अवतरण र पछिका लडाइँहरूले फ्रान्सको उत्तरी भूभागलाई स्वतन्त्र गरेका थिए, तर दक्षिण अझै पनि स्वतन्त्र थिएन। यो “भिचि” फ्रान्सेलीद्वारा शासित थियो। यी फ्रान्सेली मानिसहरू थिए जसले 1940 मा जर्मनहरूसँग शान्ति सम्झौता गरेका थिए र आक्रमणकारीहरूसँग लडाई गर्नुको सट्टा मिलेर काम गरे। मित्र राष्ट्रहरूले दक्षिणी फ्रान्समा 15 अगस्ट 1940 मा गरेको आक्रमणलाई “अपरेसन ड्र्यागन” भनियो। केवल दुई हप्तामा अमेरिकी र स्वतन्त्र फ्रान्सेली सेनाहरूले दक्षिणी फ्रान्सलाई स्वतन्त्र गराइसकेका थिए र जर्मनीतर्फ लागेका थिए।
mt: 1940s French Resistance fighters in the south of France were still under German occupation. These French people had signed a peace treaty with the Germans in 1940 and worked with the invaders instead of fighting them. The Allied invasion of southern France on August 15, 1944 was called "Operation Dragoon". Only two weeks later, American and Free French forces liberated southern France and pushed the Germans out.
ref: "The D-Day landings and the following battles had freed the north of France, but the south still wasn't free. It was ruled by the ""Vichy"" French. These were French people who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and worked with the invaders instead of fighting them. On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called ""Operation Dragoon"". In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany."

In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany."

src: पनडुब्बीहरू पानीमुनि यात्रा गर्न डिजाइन गरिएका जहाज हुन् र त्यहाँ विस्तारित समयका लागि रहन्छन्। पहिलो र दोस्रो विश्व युद्धमा पनडुब्बीहरू प्रयोग भएका थिए। पछाडि तिनीहरू धेरै ढिलो भए र सीमित शूटिंग दायरामा रहे। युद्धको सुरुवातमा तिनीहरू प्राय: समुद्रको टुप्पोमा यात्रा गर्थे, तर राडरको विकास हुन सुरु भएपछि र अझ यथार्थ हुन थालेपछि पनडुब्बीहरूलाई नदेखिने बनाउनका लागि पानी मुनि जान बाध्य बनाइएका थिए। जर्मन पनडुब्बीहरूलाई यु-बोट्स भनिन्थ्यो। जर्मनहरू आफ्ना पनडुब्बीहरू नेभिगेट र सञ्चालन गर्नमा धेरै कुशल थिए। जर्मनहरूले निर्माण गरेका सबमरिनहरू सफल भएकाले युद्धपछि उनीहरूलाई धेरै सङ्ख्यामा सबमरिन राख्न दिनु सुरक्षित हुन्छ भन्ने कुरा विश्वास गरिएको थिएन।
mt: Submarines are designed to travel underwater and stay submerged for extended periods of time. They were used in the first and second world wars. Initially they were slow and had limited firing range. At the beginning of the war they were mostly surface ships, but with the development of radar and its becoming more realistic, submarines were forced to stay underwater to avoid detection. German submarines were called U-boats. The Germans were very skilled in building and operating submarines. The Germans were so successful in building submarines that it was thought to be safe to keep a large number of submarines after the war.
ref: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range. In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines. Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.

src: सेम्टेम्बर 17, 1939 सम्ममा, पोलिस प्रतिरक्षा पहिले नै टुटिसकेको थियो र एउटै आशा भनेको पछि हट्नु र रोमानियाली मोर्चाबन्दीको पुनर्निर्माण गर्नु थियो। यद्यपि, यी योजनाहरू रातभरिमा नै जस्तो पुरानो ढङ्गले प्रस्तुत गरिएका थिए, जब रिगा शान्ति सन्धी, सोभियत-पोलिस गैर-आक्रमण सन्धीहरू र अन्य अन्तर्राष्ट्रिय सन्धीहरू द्विपक्षीय बहुपक्षीय रूपमा उल्लङ्घन गरेर पोल्यान्डका पूर्वी क्षेत्रहरूमा आक्रमण गरेपछि सोभियत युनियन रेड आर्मीका 800,000भन्दा भन्दा बढी सैनिकहरूले प्रवेश गरे र बेलारूसी र युक्रेनी मोर्चाहरू सिर्जना गरे।
mt: 17 September 1939, police resistance had already crumbled and the only hope was to retreat and rebuild the Romanian front. However, these plans were soon outdated as the Riga Peace, Soviet-Polish non-aggression pacts and other international pacts were violated by the Soviet Union's Red Army, which entered the eastern regions of Poland with 800,000 or more soldiers and created the Bessarabian and Ukrainian fronts.
ref: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead. However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.

src: लगभग सुरुदेखि नै उत्तर अफ्रिकाका इटालियनहरूका लागि कुराहरू ठीक भएनन्। जुन 10, 1940 मा इटालीले युद्धको घोषणा गरेको एक साताभित्रै ब्रिटिस 11 औँ हुसारले लिबियामा फोर्ट क्यापुजो कब्जा गरेका थिए। बर्दियको पूर्वी भागमा भएको आक्रमणमा, बेलायती सेनाले ईटालियन दसौं सेनाका ईन्जिनियर-इन-चीफ, जनरल लास्टुचीलाई पक्राउ गरें। जुन 28 मा, तोब्रुकमा अवतरण गर्ने क्रममा लिवियाका गभर्नर जनरल र मुसलिनीका स्पष्ट उत्तराधिकारी मार्सल इटालो बाल्बो मैत्रि गोलीबारीमा मारिए।
mt: Things had not gone well for Italians in North Africa since June 10, 1940, when the British 11th Hussars, in a seven-hour raid, captured Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In the Bardia area, British forces captured Italian 10th Army Chief of Engineers, General Lasci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, Libya's governor general and clear successor to Mussolini, was killed in a friendly fire incident while landing at Tobruk.
ref: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.

src: तिब्बती बौद्ध धर्म बुद्धका शिक्षणहरूमा आधारित छ, तर प्रेमको महायान पाठ र भारतीय योगका धेरै तरिकाहरूद्वारा विस्तारित गरिएको थियो। सिद्धान्तमा, तिब्बती बौद्ध धर्म धेरै सरल छ। यसमा कुण्डलिनी योग, ध्यान र सर्वव्यापी प्रेमको मार्ग पर्दछ। कुण्डलिनी योगका साथ कुण्डलिनी ऊर्जा (ज्ञान ऊर्जा) योग आसन, सास व्यायाम, मन्त्र र दृश्यका माध्यमबाट जागृत हुन्छ। तिब्बती ध्यानको केन्द्र देवता योग हो। विभिन्न देवताहरूको दृश्यताको माध्यमबाट ऊर्जा च्यानलहरू सफा गरिन्छन्, चक्रहरू सक्रिय हुन्छन् र आत्मज्ञान चेतना सिर्जना हुन्छ।
mt: Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of the Buddha, but has been expanded by many methods of Indian yoga, meditation and the path of universal love. In principle, Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It includes Kundalini yoga, meditation and the path of universal love. Kundalini yoga is awakened by Kundalini energy (knowledge energy) yoga through asanas, pranayama, mantras and visualization. The center of Tibetan meditation is deity yoga. Various deities are visualized to cleanse energy channels, activate chakras and create self-awareness and consciousness.
ref: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga. In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love. With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.

src: कार्यक्रम स्थानीय समय बेलुकी 8:30 (15.00 UTC) बजे सुरु भयो। देशभरका प्रसिद्ध गायकहरूले श्री श्यामको पाउमा भजन वा भक्ति गीतहरू प्रस्तुत गरे। गायक सन्जु शर्माले साँझ सुरु गरे, त्यसपछि जय शंकर चौधरीले छपन्न भोग भजन पनि प्रस्तुत गरे। गायक राजु खन्डेलवालले उनलाई साथ दिइरहेका थिए। तब, लख्खा सिंह ले भजन गाउने काममा नेतृत्व लिए। 108 प्लेट छपन्न भोग (हिन्दू धर्ममा, 56 भिन्न खाने परिकारहरू, जस्तै, मिठाई, फल, सुपारी, खानाहरू आदि जुन देवतालाई चढाइन्छ) बाबा श्यामलाई दिइएको थियो। Lakkha Singh ले छप्पन भोग भजन पनि प्रस्तुत गरे। गायक, Raju Khandelwal उनीसँगै थिए।
mt: The program started at 8:30 pm local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers from all over the country presented bhajans and devotional songs on the feet of Shri Shyam. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, then Jay Shankar Chaudhary also presented a bhajan. Singer Raju Khandelwal was also with him. Then, Lakhha Singh took the lead in singing bhajans. 108 plates of chappan bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different dishes, such as sweets, fruits, coconuts, food items, which are offered to the gods) were given to Baba Shyam. Lakhha Singh also presented chappan bhog bhajans. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was also with him.
ref: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him. Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.

Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, then Jay Shankar Chaudhary also presented a bhajan. Singer Raju Khandelwal was also with him. Then, Lakhha Singh took the lead in singing bhajans. 108 plates of chappan bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different dishes, such as sweets, fruits, coconuts, food items, which are offered to the gods) were given to Baba Shyam. Lakhha Singh also presented chappan bhog bhajans. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was also with him.
ref: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him. Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.

src: यो उत्सव विश्व-प्रसिद्ध समूह सर्क्यू डु सोलाईलद्वारा विशेष कार्यक्रमको साथ सुरु भयो। त्यसपछि, इस्तानबुल स्टेट सिम्फोनी अर्केस्ट्रा, एउटा जेनिसरी ब्याण्ड र गायकहरू फातिह एरकोस र मुसलम गोर्सेसले प्रस्तुति दिएका थिए। त्यसपछि व्हर्लिङ डर्भिसहरूले स्टेज लिए। टर्की डिभा Sezen Aksu ले इटालियन टेनर टेनिस Alessandro Safina र ग्रीक गायक Haris Alexiou सँग प्रदर्शन गरे। समाप्त गर्न टर्किस नृत्य समूह फायर अफ एनाटोलियाले “ट्रोय” कार्यक्रमको प्रदर्शन गरे।
mt: The festival was opened by a special program of the world-famous group Cirque du Soleil. Then, the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band and singers Fatih Erkoç and Muslu Görsev performed. Then, the Whirling Dervishes took the stage. Turkish singer Sezen Aksu performed with Italian tenor Teneo Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. The festival ended with the Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performing the "Troy" program.
ref: "The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil. It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show ""Troy""."

src: यात्रुहरू 90 (फरेनहाइट) डिग्रीको गर्मीमा प्रतीक्षा गरिरहँदा उनीहरूलाई पानी दिइएको थियो। “सान्ता क्लारामा 90 को दशक तापक्रम दिन तातो भएको थियो” फायर कप्तान स्कट कोउन्सले भने। “कम्तिमा भन्नुपर्दा कुनै रोलर कोस्टरमा फसेको लम्बाई असहज हुन्थ्यो र पहिलो व्यक्तिलाई सवारीबाट बाहिर निकाल्न एक घन्टा लिन सक्थ्यो।”
mt: 90 (Fahrenheit) degree heat, passengers were given water. "In Santa Clara, the 90s were a hot temperature day," said Fire Captain Scott Koones. "At least, to say, the length of a roller coaster was uncomfortable, and the first person was taken out of the vehicle for an hour."
ref: "Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns said, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""

src: पछिल्लो बुलेटिनका अनुसार, समुद्री सतह नाप्ने यन्त्रले सुनामी उत्पन्न भएको सङ्केत गर्यो। पागो पागो र निउ नजिकै केहि निश्चित सुनामी गतिविधि रेकर्ड गरिएको थियो। टोङ्गामा कुनै ठूलो क्षति वा घाइतेको रिपोर्ट गरिएको छैन, तर बिजुली अस्थायी रूपमा बन्द भयो, जसले कथित रूपमा टोङ्गनका अधिकारीहरूलाई PTWC ले जारी गरेको सुनामी चेतावनी प्राप्त गर्नबाट रोक्यो। चेतावनी हटाइएको भएता पनि हवाईको तटवर्ती इलाकामा वा नजिकैका स्थानमा रहेका चौधवटा विद्यालयहरू बुधवार बन्द गरिए।
mt: Last bulletins reported that a tide gauge had recorded a tsunami. There was some activity recorded in the vicinity of Niuatoputapu, but no major damage or casualties have been reported in Tonga, where power was briefly cut, reportedly preventing Tongan officials from receiving the tsunami warning issued by PTWC. Schools in the vicinity of the coast or in nearby areas were closed on Wednesday.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: A1GP न्युजिल्यान्ड टिमका सह-चालक, Jonny Reid ले आज कानूनी रूपमा न्युजिल्यान्डको 48-वर्षे पुरानो अकल्यान्ड हार्बर ब्रिजमा सबैभन्दा छिटो ड्राइभिङ गर्दै इतिहास रचे। श्री रिड न्युजिल्यान्डको A1GP कार, ब्ल्याक ब्युटीलाई 160 किलोमिटर प्रति घण्टाको गतिमा पुलमा सात पटकसम्म चलाउन सक्षम भए। न्युजील्यान्ड प्रहरीले आफ्नो स्पीड रडार बन्दुकको प्रयोग गरेर श्री रेडको गतिलाई ब्ल्याक ब्यूटीसँग तुलना गर्न खोजिरहेको क्रममा समस्या उत्पन्न भएको थियो र प्रहरीले श्री रेडलाई अवलोकन गर्दा उनले आफ्नो गति 160 किमि प्रति घण्टामा घटाएका थिए।
mt: 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand's oldest, was legally driven by the co-driver of the New Zealand Team, Jonny Reid, the fastest drive in history. Mr. Reid was able to run the New Zealand A1GP car, Black Beauty, seven times on the bridge at a speed of 160 kilometers per hour. The New Zealand police used their speed radar gun to compare Mr. Reid's speed with Black Beauty, and the police found that Mr. Reid had reduced his speed to 160 km/h while observing him.
ref: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

src: सोमबार बेलुका 10:08 बजे एक मध्यम भूकम्पले पश्चिमी मोन्टाना हल्लायो। संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिकाको भूगर्भीय सर्वेक्षण (USGS) र यसको राष्ट्रिय भूकम्प सूचना केन्द्रले क्षतिका सम्बन्धमा कुनै पनि तात्कालिक रिपोर्टहरू प्राप्त गरेका छैनन्। भूकम्पको केन्द्रविन्दु डाइलनको करिब 20 किमि (15 माइल) उत्तर-उत्तरपूर्व र ब्युटको करिब 65 किमि (40 माइल) दक्षिणमा थियो।
mt: 10:08 pm MST on Monday, a moderate earthquake struck western Montana. The United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center have not received any immediate reports of damage. The epicenter was about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.
ref: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday. No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.

src: इराकको अबु घ्राइब कारागारलाई दंगाको समयमा सुस्त बनाइएको छ। अमेरिकी सेनाले कब्जा गरेपछि त्यहाँ कैदी दुर्व्यवहार पत्ता लागेपछि जेलको बदनामी भएको थियो।
mt: The prison in Abu Ghraib was slow to respond to the riot. After the American military took control, mistreatment of prisoners was discovered, leading to the prison's disrepute.
ref: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot. The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.

src: ब्यान्डले माउवीको वार मेमोरियल स्टेडियमको कार्यक्रम रद्द गर्‍यो, जसमा 9,000 मानिसहरू उपस्थित हुने तय गरिएको थियो, र प्रशंसकहरूसँग माफी मागे। ब्यान्डको प्रबन्धक कम्पनी, HK प्रबन्धक निगमितले, सेप्टेम्बर 20 मा रद्द गर्दा कुनै प्रारम्भिक कारण दिएन, तर अर्को दिनसम्ममा यसको तार्किक कारणलाई दोषी ठहर्‍यायो।
mt: The band cancelled its War Memorial Stadium concert, which was expected to draw 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management company, HK Management, did not give any initial reason for the cancellation on September 20, but later blamed a logical reason for the delay.
ref: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.

mt: The band cancelled its War Memorial Stadium concert, which was expected to draw 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management company, HK Management, did not give any initial reason for the cancellation on September 20, but later blamed a logical reason for the delay.
ref: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.

src: कानून प्रवर्तन अधिकारी बिश्केकको सडकमा उपस्थित नभएको कारण व्यापक रूपमा लुट्ने योजना रातभरी जारी रह्यो। समूहका मानिसहरू सडकमा घुम्दै उपभोक्ताका सामानहरू लुट्न थालेपछि एक जना पर्यवेक्षकले बिश्केकलाई “अराजकता” राज्यमा घुलमिल हुने व्यक्ति भनेर वर्णन गरेका थिए। बिश्केकका कयौं बासिन्दाहरूले दक्षिणबाट आएका प्रदर्शनकारीहरूले कानून पालना नगरेको दोष दिए।
mt: Law enforcement officials were not present on the streets, allowing widespread looting to continue throughout the night. A group of people began looting consumer goods as they drove through the streets, prompting one observer to describe Bishkek as a "chaotic" state. Many residents of Bishkek blamed the protesters from the south for not upholding the law.
ref: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."

src: कानून प्रवर्तन अधिकारी बिश्केकको सडकमा उपस्थित नभएको कारण व्यापक रूपमा लुट्ने योजना रातभरी जारी रह्यो। समूहका मानिसहरू सडकमा घुम्दै उपभोक्ताका सामानहरू लुट्न थालेपछि एक जना पर्यवेक्षकले बिश्केकलाई “अराजकता” राज्यमा घुलमिल हुने व्यक्ति भनेर वर्णन गरेका थिए। बिश्केकका कयौं बासिन्दाहरूले दक्षिणबाट आएका प्रदर्शनकारीहरूले कानून पालना नगरेको दोष दिए।
mt: Law enforcement officials were not present on the streets, allowing widespread looting to continue throughout the night. A group of people began looting consumer goods as they drove through the streets, prompting one observer to describe Bishkek as a "chaotic" state. Many residents of Bishkek blamed the protesters from the south for not upholding the law.
ref: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."

src: यसअघि, रिङ्गका सिइओ, जेमी सिमिनअफले आफ्नो पसलको ढोकाको घण्टी आफ्नो ग्यारेजमा श्रवणयोग्य नभएको बेलादेखि कम्पनी सुरु गरेको टिप्पणी गर्नुभयो। उनले Wifi ढोकाको घण्टी बनाएको भने। सिमिनोफले भन्नुभयो कि सन् 2013 मा सार्क ट्याङ्क एपिसोडमा उहाँको उपस्थितिपछि बिक्री बढेको छ जहाँ शो प्यानलले स्टार्टअपलाई वित्तीय पोषण दिन अस्वीकार गरेको थियो। गत सन् 2017 सालमा, सिमिनअफ किनमेल गरिने टेलिभिजन च्यानल QVC मा देखिनुभयो। रिङले प्रतिस्पर्धा गर्ने सुरक्षा कम्पनी ADT कर्पोरेसनसँग पनि मुद्दा मिलायो।
mt: Previously, Ring's CEO Jamie Siminoff had commented on his garage being audible from his store's doorbell since the company's inception. He said he had invented the Wi-Fi doorbell. Siminoff said his company's sales increased after his appearance on the 2013 Shark Tank episode where the show's panel rejected funding for startups. In 2017, Siminoff appeared on the QVC shopping channel where his company was competing. Ring also filed a complaint against security company ADT Corporation.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: PBS मा दुई दर्जनभन्दा बढी एमी पुरस्कार छन् र यसको रन सिसम स्ट्रीट र मिस्टर रोजर्सको आसपासभन्दा कम छ। कार्यक्रमको प्रत्येक एपिसोड विशेष पुस्तकमा एक विषयवस्तुमाथि केन्द्रित हुन्छ र त्यसपछि बहु कथाहरूमार्फत त्यो विषयवस्तु अन्वेषण गर्छ। बालबालिकाहरू पुस्तकालयमा जाँदा तिनीहरूले हेर्नु पर्ने किताबका लागि प्रत्येक कार्यक्रमले पुस्तकहरूका लागि सिफारिस पनि प्रदान गर्छ। WNED बफेलोका, जोन ग्रान्टले (रेन्बोको होम स्टेसन पढ्दै) भने, “रेन्बो पढ्नाले बच्चाहरूलाई किन पढ्ने भन्ने सिकायो, ......पढाइको प्रेम - (कार्यक्रमले) बच्चाहरूलाई पुस्तक लिन र पढ्न प्रोत्साहित गर्‍यो।” जोन ग्रान्ट लगायत केही व्यक्तिहरूले यो विश्वास गर्छन् कि कोषको समस्या र शैक्षिक टेलिभिजन प्रोग्रामिङको दर्शन दुवैले श्रृङ्खला समाप्त गर्न योगदान पुर्‍याए।
mt: PBS has won more than 200 Emmy awards and its run is shorter than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the series focuses on a particular topic and then explores that topic through multiple stories. Children are encouraged to read the book for which each episode recommends books. WNED Buffalo, John Grant (reading Rainbow's Home Station) said, "Reading Rainbow taught children why to read,... love of reading - (the program) encouraged children to read and read books." Some people believe that the problem of the fund and the educational television programming of the vision of the series ended.
ref: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."

src: एम्स्टर्डाम सहर र एनी फ्र्याङ्क सङ्ग्रहालयका अधिकारीहरूले बताउँछन् कि ढुसीले रूख सङ्क्रमित भएको छ र जनस्वास्थ्यमा यति खतरा गराउँछ कि तिनीहरूले तर्क गरेअनुसार यो ढल्ने खतरा हुन लागेको थियो। यसको कामलाई मङ्गलबार सक्नु पर्ने थियो, तर आपतकालीन अदालतको फैसलापछि यसलाई सुरक्षित गरिएको थियो।
mt: Authorities at the Amsterdam city and the Anne Frank Museum say the tree was infected with a fungus and posed such a health risk that they decided to cut it down. The tree was scheduled to be cut down on Monday, but a court ruling kept it safe.
ref: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over. It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.

src: पशु मुक्ति र पशुहरूमाथि क्रुरता रोकथामका लागि शाही समाज (RSPCA)ले अष्ट्रेलियाली कसाइखानाहरूमा सीसीटीभी क्यामेराको अनिवार्य स्थापनाका लागि फेरि आह्वान गरिरहेका छन्। अस्ट्रेलियामा अपहरणकारीहरूको निगरानी र निरिक्षण सामान्य हुनु पर्छ भनेर RSPCA न्यु साउथ वेल्सका निरिक्षक डेभिड ओ'शनेसीले ABCलाई भने। “जनावरहरूसँग काम गर्ने मानिसलाई तिनीहरूको कल्याण उच्चतम प्राथमिकतामा छ भनेर सिसिटिभीले निश्चित रूपमा बलियो सङ्केत दिन्छ।”
mt: The Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) has again called for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in Australian abattoirs, saying that the monitoring and supervision of abductors is common in Australia. "The person working with animals must have their welfare as their highest priority," David O'Shea, an RSPCA investigator in New South Wales, told ABC. "CCTV has been clearly and strongly signaled by the industry that it is a very strong deterrent."
ref: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""

src: जेफ वीज र नौजना पीडितहरूमध्ये तीन जनाको अन्त्येष्टि भएको रेड लेक समुदायमा आज समाचार फैलिएको छ कि मार्च 21 को विद्यालयमा भएको गोलीबारी को आरोपमा अर्को विद्यार्थी पक्राउ परेको खबर छ। अधिकारीहरूले आधिकारिक रूपमा आजको पक्राउको पुष्टि बाहिर भने। यद्यपि, अनुसन्धानको बारेमा थाहा भएको स्रोतले मिनेपोलिस स्टार-ट्रिब्युनलाई त्यो रेड लेक ट्राइबल चेयरम्यान फ्लोयड जोर्डेनको 16-वर्षे छोरा लुइस जोर्डन भएको बतायो। अहिले यो थाहा छैन कि केकस्ता आरोपहरू लगाइनेछ वा के कुराले अधिकारीलाई केटासम्म पुर्‍यायो तर सङ्घीय अदालतमा किशोरसम्बन्धी कारवाहीहरू सुरु भएका छन्।
mt: 3 of the 4 victims were buried in Red Lake on Monday, and a report was made to the Star-Tribune that another student was arrested on March 21 school shooting charges. Authorities have officially confirmed the arrest on Monday. However, a source familiar with the investigation told the Star-Tribune that the Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain's 16-year-old son Louis Jourdain was arrested. It is not known what charges were filed or what led authorities to the boy, but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.
ref: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: आन्दोलनका आयोजकहरूले बर्लिन, कोलोन, ह्याम्बर्ग र हनोभर जस्ता जर्मन शहरहरूमा करिब 100,000 मानिसहरू आएका थिए भने। बर्लिनमा, पुलिसले 6,500 प्रदर्शनकारीहरू भएको अनुमान गरे। पेरिस, बुल्गेरियाको सोफिया, लिथुआनियाको भिल्नियस, माल्टाको भालेटा, इस्टोनियाको टाल्लीन र स्कटल्याण्डको एडिनबर्ग र ग्लास्गोमा पनि विरोध प्रदर्शनहरू भए। लन्डनमा करिब 200 मानिसले केही मुख्य प्रतिलिपि अधिकार प्राप्त कार्यालयहरूको बाहिर विरोध गरे। देशले ACTA मा हस्ताक्षर गर्नाले गत महिना पोल्यान्डमा ठूलो विरोध प्रदर्शन भएको थियो जसले गर्दा पोलिस सरकारले अहिलेका लागि सम्झौतालाई अनुमोदन नगर्ने निर्णय गरेको थियो। लात्भिया र स्लोभाकिया दुबैले ACTA मा सामेल हुने प्रक्रियामा ढिलाइ गरे।
mt: 100,000 people were reported to have taken part in demonstrations in Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protesters. In Paris, Sofia, Vilnius, Valletta, Tallinn, Edinburgh and Glasgow, there were also protests. In London, around 200 people protested outside some major copyright holder offices. Poland had a large protest last month after signing ACTA, which led the government to decide to not approve the agreement for the time being. Latvia and Slovakia both delayed the process of joining ACTA.
ref: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.

src: लगभग 60 वटा काम नगरेका आइपोड अत्यधिक तातेका घटनाहरू रिपोर्ट गरिएको थियो, जसमा जम्मा छ वटाबाट आगलागी भएको थियो र चार जनालाई सामान्य रूपमा पोलेको थियो। जापानको अर्थ, व्यापार तथा उद्योग मन्त्रालय (METI) ले आफू उपकरणसँग सम्बन्धित 27 दुर्घटनाहरूका बारेमा जानकार रहेको बताएको छ। गत हप्ता, METI ले घोषणा गर्‍यो कि एप्पलले उसलाई 34 वटा अत्यधिक तापक्रम भएका घटनाहरूको बारेमा जानकारी दिएको थियो, जसलाई कम्पनीले “गैर-गम्भीर” भन्यो।” Apple को प्रतिवेदन स्थगित गर्दै मन्त्रालयले “साँच्चै अफसोसपूर्ण” भन्यो।
mt: 60 or so unopened iPods were reported to have overheated, with one catching fire and four being generally melted. The Japanese Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said it was aware of 27 incidents involving the device. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 overheating incidents, which the company had called “minor.” “Very regrettable,” METI said, suspending Apple’s report.
ref: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

src: एप्पल (Apple) का सिइओ स्टिभ जोब्स (Steve Jobs)ले स्टेजमा हिँडेर र आफ्नो जीन्सको पकेटबाट आइफोन (iPhone)लाई बाहिर निकालेर यसको अनावरण गर्नुभयो। आफ्नो 2 घण्टाको भाषणका क्रममा उहाँले भन्नुभयो कि “आज एप्पलले फोन पुनः आविष्कार गर्न गइरहेको छ, हामी आज इतिहास बनाउन गइरहेका छौं।”
mt: Steve Jobs, CEO of Apple, pulled an iPhone from his jeans pocket and unveiled it on stage. In his two-hour speech, he said, "Today, Apple is reinventing the phone, we're making history."
ref: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket. During his 2 hour speech he stated that ""Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today""."

src: वर्तमान सिनेटर तथा अर्जेन्टिनाकी प्रथम महिला क्रिस्टिना फर्नान्डेज डी किर्चनार (Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner) ले बुनेस आयर्सबाट 50 किलोमिटर (31 माइल) टाढा रहेको सहर ला प्लाटामा हिजो साँझ आफूलाई राष्ट्रपति पदको उम्मेद्वार घोषणा गरेकी छिन्। श्रीमती किर्चनरले अर्जेन्टाइन थिएटरमा राष्ट्रपतिका लागि लड्ने आफ्नो योजनाको घोषणा त्यही ठाउँमा गरिन् जुन उनले ब्युनर्स आयर्स प्रान्त प्रतिनिधिमण्डलको सदस्यका रूपमा सिनेटका लागि 2005 को अभियान सुरु गर्न प्रयोग गरेकी थिइन्।
mt: Current Senator and first lady of Argentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her candidacy for President of Argentina this evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her plans to run for President of Argentina at the same place where she started her campaign for a seat in the Senate in 2005 as a representative of the province of Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: ACMAले यो पनि पत्ता लगायो कि इन्टरनेटमा भिडियो प्रवाहित हुनुको बाबजुद, बिग ब्रदरको वेबसाइटमा मिडिया भण्डारण नभएकाले बिग ब्रदरले अनलाइन सामग्री सेन्सरसिप कानुनको उल्लङ्घन गरेका थिएनन्। प्रसारण सेवा ऐनले इन्टरनेट सामग्रीको नियमन उपलब्ध गराउँछ, यद्यपि इन्टरनेट सामग्री मानिनका लागि यो भौतिक रूपमा कुनै सर्भरमा रहनुपर्छ।
mt: The ACMA also noted that, despite the video being streamed online, Big Brother's website did not store media, so Big Brother had not breached the Online Content Scheme of the Broadcasting Services Act. The Act provides for the regulation of online content, but online content is not required to be stored physically on a server.
ref: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

The Act provides for the regulation of online content, but online content is not required to be stored physically on a server.

The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

src: पिटर कोस्टेलो, अस्ट्रेलियाका कोषाध्यक्ष र सम्भवतः प्रधानमन्त्री जोन होवार्डको उत्तराधिकारी हुन सक्ने लिबरल पार्टीका नेताले अस्ट्रेलियामा रहेको आणविक शक्ति उद्योगका पछाडि आफ्नो समर्थन दिएका छन्। कोस्टेलो (Costello)ले आणविक ऊर्जा उत्पादन आर्थिक तवरले व्यवहारिक हुन्छ, अष्ट्रेलियाले यसको उपयोग गर्नु पर्छ भने। “यो व्यावसायिक हुन्छ भने, हामीसँग यो हुनुपर्छ। अर्थात्, आणविक ऊर्जाका लागि कुनै सैद्धान्तिक आपत्ति छैन” मिस्टर कोस्टेल्लोले भने।
mt: Peter Costello, Australia's treasurer and likely successor to Prime Minister John Howard of the Liberal Party, has backed Australia's nuclear power industry. Costello (Costello) said nuclear energy is practical economically, and Australia should use it. "It's commercial, we need it. There's no theoretical objection to nuclear energy," Mr Costello said.
ref: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

src: एक दिनमा मात्र अठार पदकहरू उपलब्ध भएकोले, केही देशहरू पदक मञ्च बनाउन असफल भएका छन्। उनीहरूले हिजो महिला स्ट्यान्डिङ वर्गमा नवौँ स्थानमा समाप्त गर्ने अन्ना जोचेमसेनको साथ सुपर-जीमा नेदरल्यान्डलाई र सोही प्रतियोगितामा दशौँ स्थानमा समाप्त गर्ने काट्जा सरिनेनको साथमा फिनल्यान्डलाई सम्मिलित गरे। पुरूषहरूको स्ट्यान्डिङ सुपर-G मा अष्ट्रेलियाका मिशेल गोर्लीले एघारौं स्थान हासिल गरे। चेक प्रतिस्पर्धी ओल्ड्रिच जेलिनेकले पुरूषहरूको सिटिङ सुपर-G मा सोह्रौं स्थान हासिल गरे। मेक्सिकोका अर्ली भेलास्केज पुरुषको सिटिङ सुपर-G मा पन्ध्रौँ स्थानमा रहे। न्युजिल्यान्डका एडम हल पुरुषहरूको स्ट्यान्डिङ सुपर-G मा नवौं स्थानमा रहे। पोल्याण्डका पुरुषतर्फको दृष्टिविहीन स्कीयर Maciej Krezel र मार्गदर्शक Anna Ogarzynska ले सुपर-जीमा तेह्रौं स्थानमा खेल पूरा गरे। पुरुषतर्फको सुपर-जीमा दक्षिण कोरियाका Jong Seork Park ले चौबीसौं स्थानमा खेल पूरा गरे‌।
mt: 18 medals were available in one day, so some countries failed to qualify for the medal podium. They included Anna Jochumsen, who finished ninth in the women's standing super-G, and Katrien Aalesmaa, who finished tenth in the women's standing super-G. In the men's standing super-G, Australian Michael Gorriz finished eleventh. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting super-G. Mexican Arli Velasquez finished fifteenth in the men's sitting super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing super-G. Polish blind skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the super-G. South Korean Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's super-G.
ref: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.

src: मुद्दा बर्मिंघम क्राउनको अदालतमा सुरु भयो र अगस्ट3 मा समाप्त भयो। घटनास्थलमा पक्राउ परेका प्रस्तुतकर्ताले, आक्रमण गरेको कुरा अस्वीकार गरे र उनले तीस जना मानिसहरूले आफूलाई हानेका बोतलहरूबाट जोगिन खाँबाको प्रयोग गरेको दावी गरे। Blake लाई न्यायको बाटो बिगार्ने प्रयासका लागि पनि दोषी ठहराइएको थियो। न्यायाधीशले Blakeलाई यो झण्डै अपरिहार्य थियो र उनलाई जेल पठाइने छ भने।
mt: The case began in the Birmingham Crown Court and ended on August 3. The presenters arrested at the scene, rejected the claim of being attacked and claimed that thirty people used bottles of gin to knock him out. Blake was also found guilty of attempting to obstruct the course of justice. The judge said that Blake was almost inevitable and he will be sent to jail.
ref: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake it was ""almost inevitable"" he was going to be sent to jail."

src: बालीमा सो एजेन्डामा अन्य विषयहरूमा विश्वका बाँकी रहेका जङ्गल बचाउनु र विकासशील राष्ट्रहरूलाई कम प्रदूषण गर्ने तरिकाबाट अगाडि बढ्न मद्दत गर्न प्रविधि बाँड्नु समावेश छन्। यसका साथै, विश्वव्यापी उष्णताले प्रभाव पारेका देशहरूलाई यसका असरहरूसँग सामना गर्न सहयोग गर्न संयुक्त राष्ट्रसङ्घले यससम्बन्धी कोशलाई अन्तिम रूप दिने आशा राखेको छ। पैसा बाढीरोधी घरहरू, पानीको राम्रो व्यवस्थापन र अन्न विविधीकरणतर्फ जान सक्दछ।
mt: The agenda includes other issues such as helping the rest of the world's jungles and developing countries to reduce pollution, and helping countries affected by global warming to cope with its effects. The United Nations hopes to finalize the agreement with the help of money for flood-resistant homes, good water management and crop diversification.
ref: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts. The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.

src: नाइजेरियाले शिखर सम्मेलन हुने हप्तामा AfCFTA मा भाग लिने योजना बनाएको यसअघि घोषणा गरेको थियो। AU व्यापार र उद्योग Albert Muchanga मुचंगाले Benin को साथ हुने घोषणा गरे। आयुक्तले भने, “हामीले अहिलेसम्म उत्पत्तिका नियमहरू र शुल्कदर रियायतहरू स्वीकार गरेका छैनौँ तर हामीसँग भएको रूपरेखा जुलाई 1, 2020 मा व्यापार सुरु गर्न पर्याप्त छ।”
mt: Nigeria announced plans to join the AfCFTA summit week, previously announced. AU Trade and Industry Commissioner Albert Muchanga Muchanga announced with Benin. The Commissioner said, “We have not yet accepted the rules of origin and tariff concessions, but we have a framework with us that is sufficient to start trade on July 1, 2020.”
ref: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."

src: एटलान्टामा हुँदा उनले समालोचनात्मक प्रशंसा प्राप्त गरिन र नवीन सहरी शिक्षाका लागि प्रसिद्ध थिइन्। सन् 2009 मा उनलाई वर्षको राष्ट्रिय सुपरिटेन्डेन्टको पदकबाट सम्मानित गरियो। पुरस्कारको समयमा, एट्लान्टा विद्यालयहरूले परीक्षण स्कोरमा विशाल सुधार देखेका थिए। त्यसको लगत्तै, द एट्लाण्टा जर्नल-कन्स्टिट्यूशनले परीक्षणको नतिजामा समस्या देखाउँदै एउटा रिपोर्ट प्रकाशित गर्‍यो। रिपोर्टले देखायो कि परीक्षा अङ्कहरू द्रुत गतिले बढेका थिए र यसले विद्यालयले आन्तरिक समस्याहरू पत्ता लगाएको तर खोजहरूमा कार्य नगरेको आरोप लगायो। त्यसपछि प्राप्त प्रमाणहरूले परीक्षाका उत्तरपुस्तिकामा छेडछाड गरिएको थियो भन्ने जनाएका थिए। हललगायतका अन्य 34 जना शिक्षा अधिकारीहरूलाई सन् 2013 मा अभियोग लगाइएको थियो।
mt: He was praised for his critical review while in Atlanta and was known for his work in urban education. In 2009 he was awarded the National Superintendent of the Year award. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen dramatic improvements in test scores. Shortly thereafter, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report on the test results, which showed that scores had increased rapidly and that the school system had failed to address internal problems. The report also alleged that the tests had been tampered with. After the report, 34 other Atlanta school officials were charged with fraud in 2013.
ref: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores. Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings. Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.

src: गभर्नर जनरलको कार्यालयबाहिर बम विस्फोट भयो। दुई घन्टाको फरकमा सरकारी भवनहरूका नजिक तीन बम विस्फोट भयो। केही प्रतिवेदनहरूले आधिकारिक मृत्युको सङ्ख्या आठ भनेका थिए र आधिकारिक प्रतिवेदनले कम्तीमा 30 जना घाइते भएको पुष्टि गरेको थियो; तर अन्तिम सङ्ख्या अझै थाहा हुन सकेको छैन।
mt: A bomb exploded outside the Governor General's office. Three bombs exploded near government buildings within two hours. Some reports said the official death toll was eight, and the official report confirmed at least 30 injured; but the final number is still unknown.
ref: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours. Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.

src: 21 वर्षीय जिसस गत वर्ष जनवरी 2017 मा ब्राजिलियन क्लब पाल्मेइरासबाट £27 मिलियन शुल्क तिरेर म्यानचेस्टर सिटीमा सामेल भए। त्यस बेलादेखि, ब्राजिलियनले क्लबका लागि सबै प्रतियोगिताहरूमा 53 खेल मा प्रदर्शन गरेको छ र 24 गोल गरेको छ।
mt: 21-year-old Jesus, who was signed by Manchester City in January 2017 for £27 million from Brazilian club Palmeiras. Since then, the Brazilian has played in all competitions for the club in 53 matches and scored 24 goals.
ref: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.

src: आज बिहान स्थानीय समयानुसार 10 बजे इस्लामको पवित्र सहर मक्कामा एक होस्टल ध्वस्त भयो। हज यात्राको पूर्व सन्ध्यामा पवित्र शहरको भ्रमण गर्न धेरै तीर्थयात्रीहरू आएका थिए। होस्टलका धेरै पाहुना संयुक्त अरब इमिरेट्सका नागरिक थिए। मृत्यु टोल कम्तिमा 15 रहेको छ, जुन बढ्ने आशा गरिएको आँकडा हो।
mt: 10 am local time this morning, a hostel collapsed in the holy city of Mecca. Many pilgrims were visiting the holy city during the previous evening's pilgrimage. Many of the hostel's guests were citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, which is expected to rise.
ref: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage. The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.

src: यद्यपि, क्षयरोग भएका मानिसहरूको सम्पूर्ण समूहमा XDR-TB को प्रतिशत अझै कम देखिन्छ; दक्षिण अफ्रिकामा कुनै विशेष समयमा संक्रमित कुल 330,000मध्ये 6,000 रहेको छ। वैज्ञानिकहरू भन्छन् कि उक्त टक्‍करले भएको विस्फोट ठूलो थियो। तिनीहरू दुर्घटना कति ठूलो थियो र पृथ्वी कसरी प्रभावित हुनेछ भन्ने निर्धारण गर्न अझै पनि कोसिस गर्दैछन्। संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिकाको रक्षा विभागको कार्यालयको रणनीतिक कमान्डले भत्केका अवशेषहरूको ट्र्याक गरिरहेको छ। षडयन्त्रको विश्लेषणको नतिजा सार्वजनिक वेबसाइटमा राखिने छ।
mt: However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire population of TB patients is still low; in South Africa, at any given time, there are about 330,000 infected, of whom 6,000 are XDR-TB. Scientists say the explosion was big. They are still trying to determine how big the accident was and how the Earth will be affected. The office of the Department of Defense of the United States is tracking the debris. The analysis of the conspiracy will be kept on the public website.
ref: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. src: ब्याटन सन् 2008 को सबैभन्दा धनी 400 अमेरिकीहरूको सूचीमा 190 औँ स्थानमा रहेका थिए जसको अनुमानित कुल सम्पत्ति 2.3 अरब अमेरिकी डलर छ। उनले सन् 1950 मा भर्जिनिया विश्वविद्यालयको कला र विज्ञान कलेजबाट स्नातक गरेर त्यो संस्थाको महत्वपूर्ण दाता थिए।
mt: 2008 Forbes 400 richest Americans list ranked him 190th with an estimated net worth of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the University of Virginia's College of Arts and Sciences in 1950 and was a major donor to the institution.
ref: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.

src: साना बच्चाहरूलाई हिंसात्मक भिडियो खेलहरूको बिक्री वा भाडामा प्रतिबन्ध लगाइने कानूनमा क्यालिफोर्नियाका गभर्नर अर्नोल्ड श्वार्जेनेगरले हस्ताक्षर गरे। बिलमा क्यालिफोर्निया राज्यमा बेचिएको हिंसात्मक भिडियो गेमहरूको आवश्यक पर्दछ जसलाई “18” चिह्नित गर्दै लेबल लगाइन्छ र उक्त भिडियो गेम बालबालिकाहरूलाई बिक्री गरेको खण्डमा $1000 डलर जरिवाना तिर्न लगाइन्छ।
mt: California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed a law banning the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires that violent video games sold in California be labeled "18" and that retailers who sell violent video games to minors be fined $1000.
ref: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading ""18"" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense."

src: """विवाह गरेर दुई वयस्क बच्चाहरू भएका डुभलले मिलरमा ठूलो छाप छोडेनन्, जससँग कथा सम्बन्धित थियो। टिप्पणीका लागि आग्रह गर्दा, मिलरले भने, """"सुनुवाईको समयमा माइक धेरै बोल्छन्... म तयार भइरहेको थिएँ त्यसैले म उनले के भनिरहेका थिए भनेर साँच्चै नै सुनिरहेको थिइन।"""""""
mt: "Dubbil and Miller have left a big mark in marriage, with two adult children.  Dubbil asked for comment, Miller said, "I was ready to go, so I was really listening to what he was saying... I was really listening to what he was saying."
ref: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."""

mt: "Dubbil and Miller have left a big mark in marriage, with two adult children.  Dubbil asked for comment, Miller said, "I was ready to go, so I was really listening to what he was saying... I was really listening to what he was saying."
ref: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."""

src: """प्रधानमन्त्री स्टेफेन हार्परले PMO मा NDP का नेता ज्याक लेटनसँग मङ्गलबार 25 मिनेटको बैठक बसेपछि सरकारको “स्वच्छ हावासम्बन्धी ऐन'को दोस्रो सुनुवाइअघि उक्त ऐन समीक्षाका निम्ति सर्वदलीय समितिमा पठाउन सहमति जनाएका छन्। लेटोन (Layton) ले कन्जर्वेटिभ पार्टीको वातावरणीय विधेयकको """"विस्तृत र पूर्ण पुनर्लेखन"""" का लागि आग्रह गर्दै प्रधानमन्त्रीसँगको भेटमा कन्जर्भेटिभको वातावरणीय विधेयकमा परिवर्तन गर्न आग्रह गरेका थिए। सङ्घीय सरकारले तास्मेनियाको डेभनपोर्टमा रहेको मर्सी अस्पतालको कोष लिन कदम चालेको छ। राज्य सरकार र केही सङ्घीय सांसदहरूले नोभेम्बरसम्म बोलाउनु पर्ने सङ्घीय चुनावको प्रस्तावनाको यो कार्यलाई आलोचनाको रूपमा लिए। प्रधानमन्त्रीले तर जोन हवार्डले अतिरिक्त AUD$45 मिलियन डलर दिएको बेलामा यस ऐनलाई उक्त अस्पतालका सुविधाहरूलाई तास्मानीयाको सरकारले तल्लो दर्जामा झर्नबाट जोगाउन मात्रै ल्याइएको थियो भने।"""
mt: """Prime Minister Stephen Harper met with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO for 25 minutes on Monday before the second reading of the government's "Clean Air Act" was sent to a multi-party committee for review. Layton (Layton) asked for a "thorough and complete rewrite" of the Conservative Party's environmental bill during his meeting with the prime minister. The federal government has taken steps to take over the Mercy Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania. The state government and some federal MPs have criticized the announcement of the federal election to be held by November. The prime minister said that the bill was only to keep the facilities of the hospital from falling into the hands of the Tasmanian government at a lower price when the government of John Howard gave an additional AUD$45 million dollars as a guarantee."""
ref: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."
