src: “पानामा पेपर्स” पानामियाली कानून फर्म मोस्याक फोन्सेकाको करिब 10 मिलियन कागजातहरूका लागि छाता हो, जुन 2016 वसन्त ऋतुमा प्रेसमा प्रकाशित भयो। कागजातहरूले चौध बैंकहरूले धनी ग्राहकहरूलाई कर र अन्य नियमहरूबाट बचाउन अरबौँ अमेरिकी डलरको सम्पत्ति लुकाउन मद्दत गरेको देखाए। ब्रिटिस पत्रिका द गार्जियनका अनुसार यो कार्य गर्नका लागि प्रयोग गरिएका 1200 वटा सेल कम्पनीहरूमध्ये एक तिहाइ कम्पनीहरू ड्युच बैंकको नियन्त्रणमा थिए। विश्वव्यापी रूपमा प्रदर्शनहरू र धेरै आपराधिक अभियोग भएका थिए, र आइसल्यान्ड र पाकिस्तान दुबै सरकारका नेताले राजीनामा दिए।
mt: “Panama Papers” are the documents of Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, about 10 million papers, which were published in the press in the spring of 2016. The papers showed that four banks helped their wealthy clients to hide billions of dollars of assets from taxes and other rules. According to the British magazine The Guardian, one-third of the 1200 companies used to perform this work were under the control of Deutsche Bank. There were many demonstrations and many criminal charges around the world, and both the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan resigned.
ref: """Panama Papers"" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016. The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations. British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this. There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned."

src: इरानमा वायु दुर्घटनाहरू साधारण हुन्, जसको नागरिक र सैन्य दुवै कार्यहरूका लागि कमजोर रूपमा सज्जित गरिएको पुरानो नौका समुदाय छ। अन्तर्राष्ट्रिय प्रतिबन्धको अर्थ नयाँ विमान किन्न सकिँदैन भन्ने हो। यस हप्ताको सुरुमा भएको पुलिसको हेलिकप्टर दुर्घटनामा तीन व्यक्तिको मृत्यु र तीन जना घाइते भएका थिए। गत महिना इरानले वर्षौंदेखि सबैभन्दा डरलाग्दो हवाई दुर्घटनाको सामना गरेको छ, आर्मेनिया जाँदै गरेको एक विमान दुर्घटनाग्रस्त भएको थियो र सवार 168 जनाको मृत्यु भएको थियो। त्यही महिना मशहदमा धावनमार्गबाट बाहिर गएको र भित्तामा ठोक्किएको अर्को ठूलो विमान देखियो, जसमा सत्र जना मारिए।
mt: Air crashes are common in Iran, whose civilian and military fleets are both composed largely of aging aircraft. The international sanctions mean that new planes cannot be bought. Last week's helicopter crash killed three people and injured three others. Last month Iran suffered its worst air disaster in years, when a plane crashed while en route to Armenia, killing 168 people. The same month a huge plane was seen flying out of the runway and hitting a wall, killing 107 people.
ref: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations. International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased. Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more. Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board. The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.

src: इराक स्टडी ग्रुपले आज 12.00 GMT मा आफ्नो रिपोर्ट प्रस्तुत गर्‍यो। यसले कसैले पनि ईराकमा यस बिन्दुमा कुनै पनि कार्यवाहीले साम्प्रदायिक युद्ध, बढ्दो हिंसा वा अराजकतातिरको स्लाईड रोक्नेछ भनेर ग्यारेण्टी दिन सक्दैन भन्दै चेतावनी दिन्छ। यो प्रतिवेदन मध्य पूर्वको नीतिका बारेमा संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिकामा खुल्ला बहस र सहमति गठन गर्नका लागि अनुरोध गर्न खुल्यो। यो प्रतिवेदनमा कार्यकारीले इराकप्रति लिएको वर्तमान नीतिको लगभग सबै पक्षको आलोचना गरिएको छ तुरुन्तै उक्त नीति परिवर्तन गर्न आग्रह गरिएको छ। यसका 78 सिफारिसहरूमध्ये पहिलो यो हो कि प्रतिरोधी हस्तक्षेपहरूको विरूद्ध इराकको सीमाना सुरक्षित गर्न र यसका छिमेकीहरूसँग कुटनीतिक सम्बन्धहरू पुनर्स्थापना गर्न यो वर्षको समाप्तिअघि नयाँ कुटनीतिक पहलहरू गर्नुपर्छ।
mt: 12:00 GMT today, the Iraq Study Group will present its report. It warns that no one can guarantee that any action in Iraq will prevent sectarian war, increased violence or chaos. It calls for an open debate and consensus in the United States on Middle East policy. It criticizes almost all aspects of the current policy and calls for immediate changes. Its first recommendation is that the border be secured against resistance interference and that diplomatic relations with Iraq's neighbors be restored before the end of the year.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today. It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos. The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East. The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction. First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: आन्साले जनाएअनुसार “प्रहरीहहरू केही उच्च-स्तरका झडपहरूले गर्दा चर्को युद्ध सुरु हुन सक्ला भन्ने कुराले चिन्तित थिए। प्रहरीले लो पिक्कोलोको माथिल्लो हात रहेको छ भने किनभने उनी पालेर्मोमा प्रोभेन्जानोको दाहिने हातका मानिस थिए र उनको ठूलो अनुभवले उनलाई पुरानो पुस्ताका मालिकहरूको मन जिते किनभने उनीहरूले आफ्नो शक्तिको सञ्जाललाई सुदृढ पार्ने क्रममा प्रोभेन्जानोको सकेसम्म कम राख्ने नीति अनुसरण गरेका थिए। यी मालिकहरूलाई प्रोभेन्जानोद्वारा तबसम्म अधीनमा राखिएको थियो जबसम्म उनले 1992 मा माफिया क्रुसेडर्स जियोवानी फाल्कन र पाओलो बोरसेलिनोको जीवनको दाबी गर्ने राज्य विरूद्ध रीयनाद्वारा सञ्चालित युद्धलाई अन्त्यसम्म पुर्‍याएनन्।”
mt: "Police were concerned that some high-level clashes could start a hot war. Police had a low profile, but why because he was a man of Provence in the right hand of the province and his great experience made him the old masters of mind, because they followed the policy of keeping the power of Provence as little as possible. These masters were under the control of Provence until 1992, when he ended the state against the war of the mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino, who were led by the government of Renato."
ref: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""

src: आन्साले जनाएअनुसार “प्रहरीहहरू केही उच्च-स्तरका झडपहरूले गर्दा चर्को युद्ध सुरु हुन सक्ला भन्ने कुराले चिन्तित थिए। प्रहरीले लो पिक्कोलोको माथिल्लो हात रहेको छ भने किनभने उनी पालेर्मोमा प्रोभेन्जानोको दाहिने हातका मानिस थिए र उनको ठूलो अनुभवले उनलाई पुरानो पुस्ताका मालिकहरूको मन जिते किनभने उनीहरूले आफ्नो शक्तिको सञ्जाललाई सुदृढ पार्ने क्रममा प्रोभेन्जानोको सकेसम्म कम राख्ने नीति अनुसरण गरेका थिए। यी मालिकहरूलाई प्रोभेन्जानोद्वारा तबसम्म अधीनमा राखिएको थियो जबसम्म उनले 1992 मा माफिया क्रुसेडर्स जियोवानी फाल्कन र पाओलो बोरसेलिनोको जीवनको दाबी गर्ने राज्य विरूद्ध रीयनाद्वारा सञ्चालित युद्धलाई अन्त्यसम्म पुर्‍याएनन्।”
mt: "Police were concerned that some high-level clashes could start a hot war. Police had a low profile, but why because he was a man of Provence in the right hand of the province and his great experience made him the old masters of mind, because they followed the policy of keeping the power of Provence as little as possible. These masters were under the control of Provence until 1992, when he ended the state against the war of the mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino, who were led by the government of Renato."
ref: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""

src: ओलम्पिक स्वर्ण पदक विजेता जापानी जुडोका हितोसी साइतोको 54 वर्षको उमेरमा मृत्यु भएको छ। उहाँको मृत्यु इन्ट्राहेपाटिक बाइल डक्ट क्यान्सरले गर्दा भएको हो भनी घोषणा गरिएको थियो। उहाँको मङ्गलबार ओसाकामा मृत्यु भयो। पूर्व ओलम्पिक र विश्व च्याम्पियनका रूपमा, साइटो आफ्नो मृत्युका समयमा अखिल जापान जुडो फेडरेशन प्रशिक्षण समितिका अध्यक्ष थिए।
mt: 54-year-old Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, an Olympic gold medalist, died of cancer. He died on Monday in Osaka. As a former Olympic and world champion, Saito was chairman of the All Japan Judo Federation training committee at the time of his death.
ref: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54. The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer. He died in Osaka on Tuesday. As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.

src: आफ्नो यात्राको क्रममा इवासाकी(Iwasaki) ले धेरै पटक समस्यामा परे। उनलाई समुद्री डाँकुहरूले लुटेका थिए र उनलाई तिब्बतमा एक कुख्यात कुकुरले हमला गरेको थियो, उनले नेपालमा विवाह गरेका थिए भने उनलाई भारतमा पक्राउ गरिएको थियो।
mt: Iwasaki had many problems on his journey. He was robbed by sea pirates and attacked by a notorious dog in Tibet, he married in Nepal and was arrested in India.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions. He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: जियानकार्लो फिसिचेलाले आफ्नो कारको नियन्त्रण गुमाए र सुरु भए लगत्तै दौड समाप्त गरे। उनका टोलीका साथी फर्नान्डो एलोन्सो प्रायः दौडको लागि अग्रणी थिए, तर उनको पिट-स्टप पछि यसको अन्त्य भयो, शायद किनभने दायाँको अगाडिको पाङ्ग्रा नराम्रोसँग खराब भयो। माइकल शुमाचरले दौडका क्रममा असंख्य लडाईंहरूमा निलम्बनको क्षतिका कारणले गर्दा आफ्नो दौड एलोन्सोको केही समयपछि समाप्त गरे।
mt: Giacomo Fisichella lost control of his car and finished the race almost immediately. His team's Fernando Alonso was leading the race for most of the time, but his pit-stop later ended the race, perhaps because of a bad left rear tire. Michael Schumacher finished the race after several collisions due to damage caused by his suspension.
ref: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel. Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.

src: पछिल्लो 3 महिनामा, 80 भन्दा बढी पक्राउ परेका मानिसहरू औपचारिक शुल्क नलगाई केन्द्रीय बुकिङ भवनबाट रिहाई गरिएका थिए। यस वर्षको अप्रिलमा न्यायाधीश ग्लेनले 24 घण्टाभन्दा बढी पक्राउ परेका व्यक्तिलाई रिहा गरे जसलाई अदालतले कुनै सुनुवाइ नपाएकोले रिहा गरेको थियो। यदि स्वीकृत भएमा आयुक्तले जमानत तोक्छन् र पक्राउ गर्ने अधिकारीले दर्ता गरेको आरोपलाई औपचारिक बनाउँछन्। त्यसपछि आरोपहरू राज्यको कम्प्युटर प्रणालीमा प्रविष्ट गरिन्छ जहाँ मुद्दा ट्र्याक गरिन्छ। सुनुवाईमा संदिग्धको अधिकारका निम्ति द्रुत परीक्षणकोका लागि मिति पनि अंकित छ।
mt: 80 or more people arrested in the last three months have been released from the central booking building without formal charges. In April of this year, Judge Glenn released a person arrested for more than 24 hours without charges because the court had not yet filed charges. If approved, the commissioner grants bail and the arresting officer files formal charges. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. A date for a speedy trial is also set.
ref: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged. In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner. The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.

src: लोदिनले अफगानीहरूलाई अर्को निर्वाचनको खर्च र सुरक्षा जोखिमबाट बचाउनका लागि पदाधिकारीहरूले निर्वाचन रद्द गर्ने निर्णय गरेको पनि बताए। कूटनीतिज्ञहरूले अफगानिस्तानको संविधानमा अनावश्यक रूपमा अपहरण निर्धारित गर्न पर्याप्त अस्पष्टता फेला पारे भने। यसले अघिल्ला रिपोर्टहरूलाई खण्डन गर्दछ जसमा निर्णायक निर्वाचन रद्द गर्नु संविधानको विपरित हुन्छ भनिएको छ।
mt: Lodin said the officials had decided to cancel the election to save the Afghans the cost and risk of another election. Diplomats had found the constitution's provision for the cancellation of elections to be too vague. This contradicts earlier reports that the cancellation of the decisive election would be against the constitution.
ref: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election. Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary. This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.

src: सन् 1947 मा बेलायती शासनबाट पाकिस्तान स्वतन्त्र भएदेखि, पाकिस्तानी राष्ट्रपतिले FATA मा शासन गर्न “राजनीतिक एजेन्टहरू” नियुक्त गरेका छन्, जसले इलाकाहरूमा लगभग पूर्ण स्वायत्त नियन्त्रण प्रयोग गर्दछन्। यी एजेन्टहरू पाकिस्तानी संविधानको धारा 247 अन्तर्गत सरकारी र न्यायिक सेवाहरू प्रदान गर्न जिम्मेवार छन्।
mt: 1947 मा बेलायती शासनबाट पाकिस्तान स्वतन्त्र भएदेखि, पाकिस्तानी राष्ट्रपतिले FATA मा शासन गर्न “राजनीतिक एजेन्टहरू” नियुक्त गरेका छन्, जसले इलाकाहरूमा लगभग पूर्ण स्वायत्त नियन्त्रण प्रयोग गर्दछन्। यी एजेन्टहरू पाकिस्तानी संविधानको धारा 247 अन्तर्गत सरकारी र न्यायिक सेवाहरू प्रदान गर्न जिम्मेवार छन्।
ref: "Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed ""Political Agents"" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas. These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."

src: रायन गोस्लिङ र एम्मा स्टोन प्रस्तुत गर्ने चलचित्रले सबै मुख्य वर्गहरूमा नामाङ्कन प्राप्त गर्‍यो। गोसलिङ र स्टोनले क्रमशः सर्वश्रेष्ठ अभिनेता र अभिनेत्रीका लागि नामाङ्कन प्राप्त गरे। अन्य मनोनयनहरूमा सर्वश्रेष्ठ तस्विर, निर्देशक, छायाङ्कन, पोशाक डिजाइन, फिल्म सम्पादन, मौलिक स्कोर, उत्पादन डिजाइन, ध्वनि सम्पादन, ध्वनि मिश्रण र मूल स्क्रिनप्ले समावेश भएका छन्। अडिशन चलचित्रका दुई गीतहरू, (द फूल्स हू ड्रीम) र सिटी अफ स्टार्सले सर्वोत्कृष्ट मौलिक गीतका लागि नामाङ्‍कन प्राप्त गरे। लायन्सगेट स्टुडियोले कुनै पनि अन्य स्टुडियोभन्दा बढी 26 नामाङ्कनहरू प्राप्त गर्‍यो।
mt: 2016 Academy Awards
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively. The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: रायन गोस्लिङ र एम्मा स्टोन प्रस्तुत गर्ने चलचित्रले सबै मुख्य वर्गहरूमा नामाङ्कन प्राप्त गर्‍यो। गोसलिङ र स्टोनले क्रमशः सर्वश्रेष्ठ अभिनेता र अभिनेत्रीका लागि नामाङ्कन प्राप्त गरे। अन्य मनोनयनहरूमा सर्वश्रेष्ठ तस्विर, निर्देशक, छायाङ्कन, पोशाक डिजाइन, फिल्म सम्पादन, मौलिक स्कोर, उत्पादन डिजाइन, ध्वनि सम्पादन, ध्वनि मिश्रण र मूल स्क्रिनप्ले समावेश भएका छन्। अडिशन चलचित्रका दुई गीतहरू, (द फूल्स हू ड्रीम) र सिटी अफ स्टार्सले सर्वोत्कृष्ट मौलिक गीतका लागि नामाङ्‍कन प्राप्त गरे। लायन्सगेट स्टुडियोले कुनै पनि अन्य स्टुडियोभन्दा बढी 26 नामाङ्कनहरू प्राप्त गर्‍यो।
mt: 2016 Academy Awards
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively. The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: निगाताको काशिवाजाकि करिवा आणविक उर्जा केन्द्र सामान्य रूपमा सञ्चालन भइरहेको छ भनेर NHK ले पनि रिपोर्ट गरेको छ। होकुरिकु इलेक्ट्रिक पावर कम्पनीले रिपोर्ट गर्‍यो कि भूकम्पबाट कुनै प्रभाव भएन र यसका शिका आणविक ऊर्जा प्लान्टमा नम्बर 1 र 2 रिएक्टरहरू बन्द गरिए। यो रिपोर्ट गरिएको छ कि यस क्षेत्रमा लगभग 9400 घरहरू पानीबिना र लगभग 100 बिजुलीबिनाका छन्। केही सडकहरू बिग्रिएका छन्, प्रभावित क्षेत्रहरूमा रेल सेवा अवरूद्ध भएको छ र इशिकावा प्रान्तको नोटो विमानस्थल बन्द नै रहेको छ।
mt: NHK also reported that the nuclear power plant in Kashiwazaki is operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Company reported that there was no effect from the earthquake and that the No. 1 and No. 2 reactors at the plant's nuclear power plant were shut down. It was reported that about 9,400 homes were without water and about 100 without electricity in the area. Some roads were damaged, rail service was suspended in the affected area, and the Ishikawa Prefecture's Noto Airport was closed.
ref: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down. It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity. Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.

src: गोप्य सुत्र अनुसार, कागजातले सीमा विवादलाई जनाउनेछ जसमा प्यालेस्टाईनले सन् 1967 को मध्यपूर्व युद्ध अगाडिको सीमाको आधारमा चाहन्थ्यो। समावेश गरिएका अन्य विषयहरूमा कथित रूपमा राष्ट्रहरू र जोर्डन भ्यालीको मुद्दा दुबैका लागि पवित्र जेरुसलेमको भविष्यको अवस्था सम्मिलित छन्। सम्झौता पत्रमा हस्ताक्षर गरिएपछि इजरायल उक्त उपत्यकामा दश वर्षसम्म सैन्य उपस्थिति जारी राख्नु पर्ने माग राख्छ भने PA पाँच वर्षसम्म मात्र सैन्य उपस्थिति हुन दिने कुरामा सहमत छ।
mt: According to anonymous sources, the documents will address the border dispute, which the Palestinians have claimed is based on the pre-1967 Middle East War borders. Other issues included in the agreement are the disputed territories of the West Bank and the Jordan Valley, as well as the future status of Jerusalem. After signing the agreement, Israel will be required to maintain a military presence in the valley for ten years, while the PA will be required to maintain a military presence for five years.
ref: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War. Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.

src: हङकङमा जन्मेकी मा(Ma)ले न्यू योर्क युनिभर्सिटी र हार्वर्ड ल स्कूलमा अध्ययन गरे र एक पटक अमेरिकी स्थायी निवासी “ग्रीन कार्ड” लिएका थियो। सिएले निर्वाचनका बेला सङ्केत गरे कि मा सङ्कटका समयमा देश छोडेर जान सक्दछन्। फोटोजेनिक Ma ठोस कार्य गर्नुभन्दा बोल्न बढी रुचाउँछन् भनेर पनि Hsieh ले तर्क गरे। यी आरोपहरूको बावजुद, Ma ले चिनियाँ मुख्य भूमिसँग घनिष्ट सम्बन्धको वकालत गर्दै प्लेटफर्ममा दक्षतापूर्वक जित हासिल गरे।
mt: Ma was born in Hong Kong and studied at New York University and Harvard Law School, and once held a green card as a permanent resident of the United States. During the election, Ma signaled that she could leave the country during the crisis. Ma also argued that she prefers to act rather than talk. Despite these allegations, Ma advocated for close ties with mainland China and won the platform decisively.
ref: "Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident ""green card"". Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland."

src: धेरै परिवारहरूले निष्कासनसँग लड्न कानूनी सहायता खोजिरहेको स्पष्ट भएपछि, आवास ठगीका पीडितहरूका लागि इस्ट बे कम्युनिटी ल सेन्टरमा मार्च 20 मा एक बैठक राखियो। जब भाडामा बस्नेहरूले उनीहरूसँग भएको कुरा साझा गर्न थाले, धेरैजसो संलग्न परिवारहरूले अचानक महसुस गरे कि OHA का क्यारोलिन विल्सनले उनीहरूको सुरक्षा निक्षेप चोरी गरेको थियो र शहर छोडेर भाग्यो। लकवुड गार्डनका भाडामा बस्नेहरू विश्वास गर्छन् कि त्यहाँ 40 वा सोभन्दा बढी परिवारले निष्कासनमा सामना गर्नुपर्ने हुन सक्छ जबदेखि उनीहरूलाई थाहा भयो कि OHA पुलिसले ओकल्याण्डमा अन्य सार्वजनिक सम्पत्तिहरू पनि अनुसन्धान गरिरहेका छन् जुन आवास घोटालामा फस्न सक्छन्।
mt: 20 March, a meeting was held at the East Bay Community Center for victims of rent gouging. When the tenants who were evicted began to share their stories, many of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolin Willis of OHA had stolen their security deposits and fled the city. Tenants in Lakewood Gardens believe that there may be as many as 40 or more families who will have to face eviction when they found out that OHA police are also investigating other public properties in Oakland that could be involved in the housing scam.
ref: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam. When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town. Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.

src: दौड पछाडि, केसेलोस्की 2,250 अङ्कका साथ सवारी चालकको च्याम्पियनशिप अगुवा बने। सात अङ्कपछाडि, जोनसन 2,243 का साथ दोस्रो स्थानमा छन्। तेस्रोमा, ह्याम्लिन बीस अङ्कले पछाडी र बोयरभन्दा पाँच अङ्कले अगाडि रहेको छ। कह्ने र ट्रुएक्स, जुनियर 2,220 र 2,207 अङ्कका साथ क्रमशः पाचौं र छैठौं स्थानमा छन्। स्टेवर्ट, गोर्डन, केन्सेथ र हार्विकले चालक च्याम्पियनसिपको लागि शीर्ष दश स्थानमा चारवटा दौडहरू बाँकी छँदै आफ्नो स्थान बनाए।
mt: 2,250 points behind, Kesselowski is the championship leader with 2,243 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243 points. Third, Hamlin is eight points behind Hamlin and five points ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex Jr. are fifth and sixth with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth and Harvick have four races left to make the top ten in the driver championship.
ref: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243. In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.

src: यो मानिन्छ कि इतिहासमा पाँचौँ पटक मानिसहरूले अवलोकन गरे कि रासायनिक रूपले पुष्टि भएको मङ्गल ग्रहको पदार्थ पृथ्वीमा खसिरहेको थियो। पृथ्वीमा खसेको भनेर थाहा भएका करिब 24,000 वटा उल्का पिण्डमध्ये केवल 34 वटा मात्रै मंगल ग्रहबाट आएको पुष्टि भएको छ। यी मध्ये पन्ध्र वटा चट्टानहरूलाई गत जुलाईमा उल्का पिण्ड वर्षाका लागि श्रेय दिइन्छ। पृथ्वीमा धेरै दुर्लभ रहेका केही ढुङ्गाहरू प्रति आउन्स 11,000 देखि 22,500 अमेरिकी डलरमा बेचिन्छन् जुन सुनको लागतभन्दा दश गुणाले बढी हो।
mt: 24,000 meteorites have been found on Earth, of which only 34 have been confirmed to be from Mars. Fifteen of these were awarded to the Meteorite Year in July. Some of these rocks are sold for $11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is ten times the price of gold.
ref: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.

src: यो मानिन्छ कि इतिहासमा पाँचौँ पटक मानिसहरूले अवलोकन गरे कि रासायनिक रूपले पुष्टि भएको मङ्गल ग्रहको पदार्थ पृथ्वीमा खसिरहेको थियो। पृथ्वीमा खसेको भनेर थाहा भएका करिब 24,000 वटा उल्का पिण्डमध्ये केवल 34 वटा मात्रै मंगल ग्रहबाट आएको पुष्टि भएको छ। यी मध्ये पन्ध्र वटा चट्टानहरूलाई गत जुलाईमा उल्का पिण्ड वर्षाका लागि श्रेय दिइन्छ। पृथ्वीमा धेरै दुर्लभ रहेका केही ढुङ्गाहरू प्रति आउन्स 11,000 देखि 22,500 अमेरिकी डलरमा बेचिन्छन् जुन सुनको लागतभन्दा दश गुणाले बढी हो।
mt: 24,000 meteorites have been found on Earth, of which only 34 have been confirmed to be from Mars. Fifteen of these were awarded to the Meteorite Year in July. Some of these rocks are sold for $11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is ten times the price of gold.
ref: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.

src: सुमाकर जो 2006 मा सात पटक फर्मुला 1 च्याम्पियनसिप जितेपछि सेवा निवृत्त भए जसले घाइते फेलिप मास्साको ठाउँ लिन आँटेका थिए। सन् 2009 को हंगेरी ग्राण्ड प्रिक्सको बेलामा ब्राजिली मानिसको टाउकोमा गम्भीर चोटपटक लाग्यो। Massa कम्तिमा 2009 सत्रमा बाँकीका लागि बाहिर आउने कारण हो।
mt: 2006 Formula One champion Kimi Raikkonen, who was set to replace Massa, retired in 2009 after sustaining a serious head injury in the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa was out of action for at least the remainder of the 2009 season.
ref: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.

src: अहिलेसम्म, AOL संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिकाभित्र यसको व्यापक प्रयोगको कारण आफ्नै गतिमा IM बजारलाई सार्न र विकास गर्न सक्षम भएको छ। यस्तो व्यवस्था भएमा यो स्वतन्त्रता अन्त्य हुन सक्छ। Yahoo! का प्रयोगकर्ताहरूको संख्या र Microsoft सेवाहरूले संयुक्त रूपमा एओएलका ग्राहकहरूको संख्यासँग प्रतिस्पर्धा गर्नेछ।
mt: So far, AOL has been able to grow and develop its own pace IM market in the United States. This arrangement, if it is, will end the freedom. Yahoo! users and Microsoft services will compete with the number of customers of AOL.
ref: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

src: टर्कीको गाजियनटेपमा हिजो बिहान पुलिस मुख्यालयमा भएको एक कार बम बिस्फोटमा परि दुई पुलिस अधिकारीको मृत्यु भयो र बिसभन्दा बढी अरू मानिसहरू घाइते भए। गभर्नरको कार्यालयले भन्यो कि घाइतेहरूमध्ये उन्नाइस जना पुलिस अधिकारीहरू थिए। प्रहरीले भन्यो कि तिनीहरूले यो आक्रमणका लागि तथाकथित डाएस (ISIL) लडाकुलाई शङ्का गर्छन्।
mt: Two police officers were killed and more than 20 others injured in a car bomb explosion this morning at the police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey. The governor's office said that among the injured were 25 police officers. Police said they suspect the attack was carried out by the so-called ISIL militants.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: मासाचुसेटका पूर्व गभर्नर Mitt Romney ले मङ्गलबार फ्लोरिडा रिपब्लिकन पार्टीको राष्ट्रपतीय प्राथमिक निर्वाचनमा 46 प्रतिशत मतले जिते। सदनका पूर्व अमेरिकी अध्यक्ष न्युट जिङ्ग्रिच 32 प्रतिशत प्राप्त गरेर दोस्रो स्थानमा आए। विजेताले सबै राज्य पाउने हुनाले, फ्लोरिडाले आफ्ना पचास जना प्रतिनिधिहरूलाई Romneyले पुरस्कृत गर्‍यो र उनलाई रिपब्लिकन पार्टीको मनोनयनका लागि देखाउन अगाडि बढायो।
mt: On Tuesday, former Massachusetts Governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party's presidential primary with 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. House Speaker Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As the winner takes all, Florida awarded its fifty delegates to Romney and moved him forward as the Republican Party's nominee.
ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

src: मासाचुसेटका पूर्व गभर्नर Mitt Romney ले मङ्गलबार फ्लोरिडा रिपब्लिकन पार्टीको राष्ट्रपतीय प्राथमिक निर्वाचनमा 46 प्रतिशत मतले जिते। सदनका पूर्व अमेरिकी अध्यक्ष न्युट जिङ्ग्रिच 32 प्रतिशत प्राप्त गरेर दोस्रो स्थानमा आए। विजेताले सबै राज्य पाउने हुनाले, फ्लोरिडाले आफ्ना पचास जना प्रतिनिधिहरूलाई Romneyले पुरस्कृत गर्‍यो र उनलाई रिपब्लिकन पार्टीको मनोनयनका लागि देखाउन अगाडि बढायो।

src: पूर्व सभामुख न्युट गिनग्रिच टेक्ससका गभर्नर रिक पेरी र काङ्ग्रेस महिला मिसेल बाचम्यान क्रमशः चौथो, पाँचौँ र छैठौँ स्थानमा छन्। नतिजा आएपछि, जिनग्रिचले सान्तोरमको प्रशंसा गरेका थिए, तर रोम्नीका लागि उनीसँग कडा शब्दहरू थिए जसको तर्फबाट जिनग्रिचको विरूद्धमा आयोवामा नकारात्मक अभियानका विज्ञापनहरू प्रसारित गरिएको थियो। पेरीको भनाईअनुसार “उनी आज रातिको कउकस नतिजाको मूल्याङ्कन गर्न टेक्सास फर्कने छन् जसमा उक्त दौडमा उनका लागि अगाडि कुनै बाटो छ वा छैन भनेर निर्धारण गर्दछ”, तर पछि उनले दौडमा नै रहँदै र जनवरी 21 को दक्षिण क्यारोलाइना प्राइमरीमा प्रतिस्पर्धा गर्ने बताएका थिए। अगस्टमा एम्स स्ट्र जितेकी ब्याकम्यानले आफ्नो अभियान अन्त्य गर्ने निर्णय गरिन्।
mt: 2008 United States presidential election results by state. States won by John McCain: light blue; States won by Barack Obama: dark blue. Numbers indicate electoral votes cast by each state.
ref: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."

src: “नयाँ र अपमानजनक ग्रिकी स्पिनका साथ पुरानो विद्यालय रेडियो थिएटर” को रूपमा स्टेशनको वेब साइटले शोको वर्णन गर्छ। सुरुवाती दिनमा यो कार्यक्रम लामो समयदेखि सञ्चालनमा रहेको र रेडियो वार्तामा केन्द्रित रहने इन्टरनेट रेडियो साइट टोगीनेट रडियोमा मात्र उपलब्ध थियो। टोगीनेटले एस्ट्रोनेट रेडियोलाई 2015 को अन्तमा सहायक स्टेशनका रूपमा स्थापित गरेका थिए। यो प्रदर्शनीले मूल रूपमा पूर्वी टेक्ससका स्थानीय अनुभवहीन आवाज कलाकारहरू प्रस्तुत गर्‍यो।
mt: “New and offensive Greek spin on old school radio theater” is how the station's website describes the show. In its early days, this program was one of the longest-running on the Internet radio site ToGinetRadio, which was available only on that site. ToGinetRadio had established AstronetRadio as an auxiliary station in late 2015. This performance originally featured local inexperienced voice actors from Eastern Texas.
ref: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."

src: मुम्बई आक्रमणकारीहरू भिडभाड हुने छत्रपति शिवाजी टर्मिनस रेल-वे स्टेशन र प्रख्यात ताजमहल होटललगायत धेरै लक्ष्यहरू बनाएर ग्रेनेड, स्वचालित हतियार बोकेर नोभेम्बर 26, 2008 मा डुङ्गाबाट आइपुगेका थिए। डेभिड हेडलीको स्काउटिङ र जानकारी सङ्कलनले पाकिस्तानी सैन्य समूह लस्खर-ए-ताइबाबाट 10 बन्दुकसहितका मानिसद्वारा अपरेसनलाई सक्षम बनाउन मद्दत गरेको थियो। भारत र पाकिस्तानबीच यस आक्रमणले सम्बन्धलाई धेरै तनाव बनायो।
mt: 26 November 2008, the attackers, armed with grenades and automatic weapons, had targeted several locations including the Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped the Pakistani military group Lashkar-e-Taiba to carry out the attack with 10 men and 10 grenades. The attack strained relations between India and Pakistan.
ref: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.

src: मुम्बई आक्रमणकारीहरू भिडभाड हुने छत्रपति शिवाजी टर्मिनस रेल-वे स्टेशन र प्रख्यात ताजमहल होटललगायत धेरै लक्ष्यहरू बनाएर ग्रेनेड, स्वचालित हतियार बोकेर नोभेम्बर 26, 2008 मा डुङ्गाबाट आइपुगेका थिए। डेभिड हेडलीको स्काउटिङ र जानकारी सङ्कलनले पाकिस्तानी सैन्य समूह लस्खर-ए-ताइबाबाट 10 बन्दुकसहितका मानिसद्वारा अपरेसनलाई सक्षम बनाउन मद्दत गरेको थियो। भारत र पाकिस्तानबीच यस आक्रमणले सम्बन्धलाई धेरै तनाव बनायो।
mt: 26 November 2008, the attackers, armed with grenades and automatic weapons, had targeted several locations including the Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped the Pakistani military group Lashkar-e-Taiba to carry out the attack with 10 men and 10 grenades. The attack strained relations between India and Pakistan.
ref: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.

src: क्यानाडाली विरुद्ध नाडालको हेड टु हेड रेकर्ड 7-2 छ। उहाँ भर्खर ब्रिसबेन ओपनमा राओनिकका विरूद्ध पराजित हुनुभयो। खेलमा नडालले 88% कुल अङ्क प्राप्त गरेका थिए जसमा उनले पहिलो सर्भमै 76% अङ्क प्राप्त गरेका थिए। खेलपछि, क्लेका राजाले भने, “म अत्यन्तै महत्त्वपूर्ण कार्यक्रमहरूको अन्तिम चरणमा सामेल हुन पाएकोमा उत्साहित नै छु। म यो जित्ने प्रयास गर्न यहाँ आएको छु।”
mt: 7-2 is the Canadian record against Nadal. He was just defeated by Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal won 88% of the total points in the match, including 76% of the first serve. After the match, Raonic said, "I'm excited to be part of the final stages of important tournaments. I came here to try to win this match."
ref: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""

src: गत हप्ता, नेकेड न्यूजले घोषणा गर्‍यो कि यसले तीन नयाँ प्रसारणका साथ समाचार रिपोर्टिंगमा आफ्नो अन्तर्राष्ट्रिय भाषा जनादेश नाटकीय रूपमा बढाउनेछ। पहिले नै अङ्ग्रेजी र जापानी भाषामा रिपोर्ट गर्दै आइरहेको, विश्वव्यापी सङ्गठनले टेलिभिजन, वेब र मोबाइल उपकरणहरूका लागि स्पेनिस, इटालियन र कोरियाली भाषाका कार्यक्रमहरू सुरु गर्दैछ।
mt: Last week, Naked News announced it would be expanding its international language news coverage dramatically. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global network will be launching programs in Spanish, Italian and Korean for television, web and mobile devices.
ref: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.

src: बुधबारको कार्यक्रमबाहेक कार्पानेडोले च्याम्पियनसिपमा दुई अलग दौडहरूमा प्रतिस्पर्धा गरे। उनको पहिलो स्लालोम थियो, जहाँ उनले आफ्नो पहिलो दौडमा डिड नट फिनिस कमाइन्। त्यो दौडमा 116 मध्ये 36 जनाको उस्तै नतिजा थियो। उनको अन्य जाती, जाईण्ट स्लालोमले महिलाको बसोबास समूहमा 4:41.30, 2:11.60 मिनेट ढिलो पहिलो स्थान फिनिशर अस्ट्रियन क्लाउडिया लोश र नवौं स्थानकोभन्दा 1:09.02 मिनेट ढिलो फिनिशर हंगेरीको ग्लोंगी दानीको दशौं स्थानमा उनले समाप्त गरेको देखिन्। महिला सिटिङ समूहमा चार स्कीयर आफ्नो रन पूरा गर्न असफल भए र जायन्ट स्लालोममा 117 कुल स्कीयर मध्ये 45 ले दौडमा श्रेणी पाउन सकेनन्।
mt: 2010 Winter Paralympics program aside, Carpanedo competed in two separate events. Her first was the slalom, where she finished her first run in 1:16, 36th out of 116. Her other event, the giant slalom, finished 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes behind first place finisher Austrian Claudia Losh and tenth place finisher Hungarian Glogny Danika, 1:09.02 minutes behind. Four skiers failed to finish their runs in the women's sitting and 45 out of 117 total skiers failed to finish the giant slalom.
ref: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.

src: बुधबार, संयुक्त राज्यको राष्ट्रिय बास्केटबल सङ्गठन (NBA)ले COVID-19 को सन्दर्भका चासोहरूका कारणले आफ्नो पेशागत बास्केटबल सिजन निलम्बन गर्दछ। युटा जाज खेलाडीको COVID-19 भाइरसको परीक्षण सकारात्मक देखिएपछि NBA को निर्णय आयो।
mt: On Wednesday, the National Basketball Association (NBA) in the United States announced the suspension of its professional basketball season due to concerns over the COVID-19 coronavirus. The decision came after a test came back positive for the virus in Utah Jazz player Rudy Gobert.
ref: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

src: बुधबार, संयुक्त राज्यको राष्ट्रिय बास्केटबल सङ्गठन (NBA)ले COVID-19 को सन्दर्भका चासोहरूका कारणले आफ्नो पेशागत बास्केटबल सिजन निलम्बन गर्दछ। युटा जाज खेलाडीको COVID-19 भाइरसको परीक्षण सकारात्मक देखिएपछि NBA को निर्णय आयो।
mt: On Wednesday, the National Basketball Association (NBA) in the United States announced the suspension of its professional basketball season due to concerns over the COVID-19 coronavirus. The decision came after a test came back positive for the virus in Utah Jazz player Rudy Gobert.
ref: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

src: आजका दिनका हेर्नलायक खेलाडी वाशिङ्गटन क्यापिटल्सको एलेक्स ओभेचिन हुन्। उनले 2 गोल गरे र यस 2 गोलले एट्लान्टा थ्रासर्रलाई 5-3 ले जित्न वासिङ्टनलाई सहयोग गर्‍यो। ओभेच्किन (Ovechkin) को रातको खेलको पहिलो सहयोग रुकी निकलास ब्याकस्ट्रोम (Nicklas Backstrom) को खेल जिताउने गोलमा थियो; उनले त्यस रात हानेको दोस्रो गोल उनले उक्त सिजनमा हानेको 60औँ गोल थियो। यससँगै उनी सन् 1995-1996 देखि एउटा सिजनमा 60 वा सोभन्दा बढी गोल गर्ने पहिलो खेलाडी बने। त्यतिबेला जरोमिर जगर र मारियो लेमिअक्स दुवै जनाले उक्त माइलस्टोन प्राप्त गरेका थिए।
mt: Today's notable player is Washington Capitals' Alex Ovechkin. He scored two goals and helped the Capitals beat the Atlanta Thrashers 5-3. Ovechkin's first assist came on Nicklas Backstrom's game-winning goal; his second goal of the night was his 60th goal of the season, making him the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-1996, when both Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux accomplished the feat.
ref: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.

src: नर्धर्न रक बैंकले बेलायत सरकारबाट आपतकालिन सहायता पाएको थियो भन्ने कुरा खुलेपछि उक्त कम्पनीलाई सन् 2008 मा राष्ट्रियकरण गरिएको थियो। नर्दन रकलाई सन् 2007 मा सबप्राइम धितो सङ्कटका समयमा यसको एक्सपोजरका कारण समर्थन आवश्यक परेको थियो। बैंकको राष्ट्रियकरण हुनुअघि रिचार्ड ब्रानसनको भर्जिन समूहले बैंकका लागि लगाएको बोली अस्वीकृत भएको  थियो। 2010 मा राष्ट्रियकरण गरिएको समयमा हालको हाइ स्ट्रिट बैंक नर्दर्न रक पिएलसी 'खराब बैंक', नर्दर्न रक (सम्पत्ति व्यवस्थापन) बाट छुट्टिएको थियो। भर्जिनले उत्तरी चट्टानको “राम्रो बैंक” खरिद गरेको छ, सम्पत्ति व्यवस्थापन कम्पनी होइन।
mt: The bank received emergency support from the British government after it was revealed to have received a bailout in 2008 following its exposure to the subprime crisis. The bank was nationalised before its bid by Richard Branson's Virgin Group was rejected. In 2010, when the bank was nationalised, the current HSBC Holdings plc, Northern Rock plc was separated from Northern Rock Asset Management, a property management company. Virgin has since bought Northern Rock (Asset Management), a property management company.
ref: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.

src: नर्धर्न रक बैंकले बेलायत सरकारबाट आपतकालिन सहायता पाएको थियो भन्ने कुरा खुलेपछि उक्त कम्पनीलाई सन् 2008 मा राष्ट्रियकरण गरिएको थियो। नर्दन रकलाई सन् 2007 मा सबप्राइम धितो सङ्कटका समयमा यसको एक्सपोजरका कारण समर्थन आवश्यक परेको थियो। बैंकको राष्ट्रियकरण हुनुअघि रिचार्ड ब्रानसनको भर्जिन समूहले बैंकका लागि लगाएको बोली अस्वीकृत भएको  थियो। 2010 मा राष्ट्रियकरण गरिएको समयमा हालको हाइ स्ट्रिट बैंक नर्दर्न रक पिएलसी 'खराब बैंक', नर्दर्न रक (सम्पत्ति व्यवस्थापन) बाट छुट्टिएको थियो। भर्जिनले उत्तरी चट्टानको “राम्रो बैंक” खरिद गरेको छ, सम्पत्ति व्यवस्थापन कम्पनी होइन।

Virgin has since bought Northern Rock (Asset Management), a property management company.
ref: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.

src: सम्झौता अनुमोदन नगर्ने विकसित देशको रूपमा क्योटो मौसम सम्झौतामा हस्ताक्षर गर्ने रुड्को निर्णयले संयुक्त राज्यलाई टाढा राख्छ। अष्ट्रेलियाको पूर्व रूढीवादी सरकारले क्योटो सम्झौताको अनुमोदन गर्न अस्वीकार गर्दै भारत र चीन जस्ता देशहरू उत्सर्जनको लक्ष्यमा बाध्य नभएको हुनाले कोइलाको निर्यातमा ठूलो निर्भरताले अर्थव्यवस्थालाई नोक्सान पुर्‍याउँछ भने।
mt: The United States' decision to not sign the Kyoto Protocol, a weather agreement, keeps it at odds with developed countries. Australia's conservative government rejected ratification of the Kyoto Protocol, saying that countries such as India and China are not bound to emission targets, and that its heavy reliance on coal exports hurts its economy.
ref: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

src: परीक्षणको निगरानी गरिएको र यसको प्रभावकारिताको मूल्याङ्कन गरिएको हुनाले रेन्जरहरूले पूरक कीरा नियन्त्रण परीक्षणमा सुटरहरूको नजिकैबाट निरीक्षण गर्नुपरेको थियो। NPWS र स्पोर्टिंग शूटर्स एसोसिएशन अफ अष्ट्रेलिया (NSW) इंकको साझेदारीमा, स्पोर्टिंग शूटर्स एसोसिएसनको शिकार कार्यक्रम अन्तर्गत योग्य स्वयंसेवकहरू भर्ती गरिए। NPWS का साथ पार्क संरक्षण तथा सम्पदाका अभिनय निर्देशक Mick O'Flynn काअनुसार पहिलो सुटिङ सञ्चालनका लागि छानिएका चार सुटरले विस्तृत सुरक्षा र प्रशिक्षण निर्देशन प्राप्त गरे।
mt: After monitoring the trial and assessing its effectiveness, shooters were asked to inspect the area around the shooters. In a joint venture with the NSW Sporting Shooters Association, Sporting Shooters Association's Hunting Program, qualified volunteers were recruited under the Sporting Shooters Association's Hunting Program. Mick O'Flynn, Director of Park Protection and Heritage, said the first shooting operation was conducted by four shooters who received detailed security and training instructions.
ref: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.

src: यस जीवाश्मको आधारमा, यसको मतलब विभाजन आणविक प्रमाणले अनुमान गरेभन्दा धेरै पहिलेको हो। “यसको मतलब सबै कुरा फिर्ता गर्नु पर्छ”, इथियोपियाको रिफ्ट भ्याली रिसर्च सर्भिसका अन्वेषक र अध्ययनका सह लेखक बर्हाने एस्फावले भने।
mt: Based on this finding, the split must have occurred earlier than previously estimated using molecular evidence. "Everything needs to be rethought," said Berhanu Asfaw, an Ethiopian Rift Valley Research Center researcher and co-author of the study.
ref: """Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence. That means everything has to be put back,"" said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw."

src: यस जीवाश्मको आधारमा, यसको मतलब विभाजन आणविक प्रमाणले अनुमान गरेभन्दा धेरै पहिलेको हो। “यसको मतलब सबै कुरा फिर्ता गर्नु पर्छ”, इथियोपियाको रिफ्ट भ्याली रिसर्च सर्भिसका अन्वेषक र अध्ययनका सह लेखक बर्हाने एस्फावले भने।
mt: Based on this finding, the split must have occurred earlier than previously estimated using molecular evidence. "Everything needs to be rethought," said Berhanu Asfaw, an Ethiopian Rift Valley Research Center researcher and co-author of the study.
ref: """Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence. That means everything has to be put back,"" said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw."

src: बिहीबारको टोकियो गेम शोको मुख्य प्रस्तुतीमा निन्तेन्दोका अध्यक्ष सतोरू इवाताले कम्पनीको नयाँ निन्तेन्दो क्रान्तिलाई कन्सोलको डिजाइनको रूपमा अनावरण गरेका थिए। टेलिभिजन रिमोटमा पुन: संयोजन गर्दै, नियन्त्रण गर्ने कन्ट्रोलरले यसको त्रिकोणिय स्थानमा त्रिकोणमित गर्न प्रयोगकर्ताको टेलिभिजनको नजिकै राखिएका दुईवटा सेन्सरहरू प्रयोग गर्दछ। यसको सहायताले खेलाडीहरू भिडियो गेमका एक्सन र चालहरू यो यन्त्रलाई हावामा यताउता चलाएर नियन्त्रण गर्न सक्छन्।
mt: In the main presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Ninendo's president Satoru Iwata unveiled the company's new Ninendo Revolution as a console design. Using a reconfigured television remote, the controllers' sensors, placed in a triangular position, triangulate the player's television. This allows players to control video game actions and moves by waving the device in the air.
ref: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.

src: यसभन्दा पहिले चिनियाँ समाचार एजेन्सी Xinhuaले एउटा विमान हाइज्याक भएको खबर गरे। प्रतिवेदनले पछि गएर यो कुरा बतायो कि विमानले बमको धम्की पाएको थियो र कान्दाहारमा अवतरण गर्ने गरि, अफगानिस्तान फिर्ता पठाइएको थियो। प्रारम्भिक प्रतिवेदनले उरूम्कीमा आपत्कालीन अवतरण अस्वीकार भएपछि विमानलाई अफगानिस्तान फर्काइयो भनेर बताउँछ।
mt: Earlier, Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a hijacked plane. The report later clarified that the plane was threatened with a bomb and was diverted to Kandahar, Afghanistan. Initial reports say the plane was refused an emergency landing in Urumqi and was diverted to Afghanistan.
ref: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked. Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.

src: यसभन्दा पहिले चिनियाँ समाचार एजेन्सी Xinhuaले एउटा विमान हाइज्याक भएको खबर गरे। प्रतिवेदनले पछि गएर यो कुरा बतायो कि विमानले बमको धम्की पाएको थियो र कान्दाहारमा अवतरण गर्ने गरि, अफगानिस्तान फिर्ता पठाइएको थियो। प्रारम्भिक प्रतिवेदनले उरूम्कीमा आपत्कालीन अवतरण अस्वीकार भएपछि विमानलाई अफगानिस्तान फर्काइयो भनेर बताउँछ।

The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.

src: सोमबारका दिन सारा ड्यानियस, स्विडिस एकेडेमीमा नोबेल साहित्य समितिका स्थायी सचिवले, स्विडेनको सेभेरिजेस रेडियोको एक रेडियो कार्यक्रममा सार्वजनिक रूपमा घोषणा गरे कि बब डिलनलाई साहित्यमा 2016 को नोबेल पुरस्कार पाउने बारेमा सिधै पुग्न असमर्थ भएकाले समितिले उहाँसम्म पुग्न आफ्ना प्रयासहरू त्यागिदियो। अहिले हामी केही गरिरहेका छैनौं। मैले उसको नजिकैको सहयोगीलाई फोन र इमेल पठाएर धेरै मैत्रीपूर्ण जवाफ पाएको छु। अहिलेका लागि यो पर्याप्त छ डानियसले भने।
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, the Swedish Academy's permanent secretary, announced publicly on a radio program of the Swedish public broadcaster Sveriges Radio that the committee had failed to reach Bob Dylan directly. "We have tried to reach him. We have tried to contact him. I have sent him a letter and an email, and I have received very friendly replies. For now, that is enough," Danius said.
ref: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him. Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""

Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""

src: संयुक्त राज्यका राष्ट्रपति जर्ज डब्ल्यु बुस (George W. Bush) ले यस घोषणालाई स्वागत गर्नुभयो। बुशका प्रवक्ता गोर्डन जोनड्रोले उत्तर कोरियाको यो प्रतिबद्धतालाई “कोरियाली प्रायद्वीपमा प्रमाणित परमाणु निशस्त्रीकरण प्राप्त गर्ने लक्ष्यको दिशामा एउटा महत्त्वपूर्ण कदम भने।”
mt: United States President George W. Bush welcomed this announcement. Bush's spokesman Gordon Johndroe said this commitment "is an important step toward verified denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula."
ref: "U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge ""a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."""

src: सन्‌ 1956 मा स्लानिया स्वीडेनमा बसाईंसराई गरेका थिए जहाँ तीन वर्षपछि उनले स्वीडेनी डाकघरमा काम गर्न सुरु गर्दै उनीहरूको मुख्य तक्षणकार बनेका थिए। उनले स्वीडेन र 28 अन्य देशहरूका लागि 1,000भन्दा बढी टिकटहरू उत्पादन गरेका थिए। उहाँको काम यस्तो मान्यता प्राप्त गुण भएको र विवरणको छ कि उहाँ फिलाटेलिस्टहरू मध्ये अति कम “चर्चित नामहरू” मध्येको एक हुनुहुन्छ। कोहीले उहाँको काम एक्लै सङ्कलन गर्नमा विशेषज्ञता हासिल गरेका छन्। उनको 1,000 औँ टिकट 2000 मा डेभिड क्लोकर एरेनस्ट्राहलको भव्य “ग्रेट डिड्स बाइ स्विडिस किंग्स” थियो, जुन गिनीज बुक अफ वर्ल्ड रेकर्डमा सूचीबद्ध छ। उनको हालसालैका कामका उदाहरणहरू क्यानेडाली नयाँ 5$ र 100$ बिलको अगाडि प्रधानमन्त्रीको तस्वीर सहित धेरै देशहरूका लागि बैङ्क नोटहरू बनाउन पनि व्यस्त थिए।
mt: 1956, he was transferred to Sliana, Sweden, where three years later he began working at the Swedish post office, becoming their main typographer. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is so well known and described that he is one of the least "famous names" among philatelists. Few have his expertise in collecting alone. His 1,000th stamp was in 2000, David Klucker's "Great Did's by Swedish Kings", which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. His most recent work included many countries' banknotes, including the Canadian new $5 and $100 bills, with the prime minister's picture in front.
ref: "In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few ""household names"" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills."

src: ट्रान्स-अलास्का पाइपलाइन प्रणालीको 800 माईल अलास्काको फेयरब्याङ्क्सको दक्षिणी भागमा हजारौं ब्यारल कच्चा तेल पोखिएपछि बन्द गरिए। नियमित फायर-कमान्ड प्रणालीको परीक्षणपछि पावर फेल हुँदा राहत भल्भ खोलियो र फोर्ट ग्रीली पम्प स्टेसन 9 नजिकै कच्चा तेल ओभरफ्लो भयो। भल्भ खुल्नाले प्रणालीको चाप बाहिरिने ठाउँ मिल्यो र तेल प्याड हुँदै 55,000 ब्यारेल (2.3 लाख ग्यालन) तेल अट्न सक्ने ट्याङ्कीमा बग्यो। बुधबार दिउँसोसम्म,ट्याङ्कीका निकासहरू सम्भवत ट्याङ्की भित्रको थर्मल विस्तारबाट अझै पनि चुहिने नै थिए। 104,500 ब्यारेल राख्न सक्षम ट्याङ्की मुनिको अर्को माध्यमिक नियन्त्रण क्षेत्र अझै त्यसको पूर्ण क्षमतामा भरिएको थिएन।
mt: 800-mile Trans-Alaska pipeline system was shut down after thousands of barrels of crude oil spilled in southern Alaska's Fairbanks. After a regular fire-command system failed, relief valves opened and crude oil overflowed the Fort Greely pump station 9. Opening the valves allowed the system to vent to a place where the oil could flow into a tank that could hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). By Wednesday morning, the tank's outlets were still draining oil that was still flowing out of the tank's thermal expansion. Another secondary control area under the tank was not yet filled to its full capacity.
ref: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.

src: यु.एस. कोर्प्स अफ इन्जिनियरहरूको अनुमान छ कि 6 इन्च वर्षाले विगतमा क्षतिग्रस्त बाँधलाई तोड्नेछ। नवौं वार्ड, जहाँ तुफान क्याट्रिनाका बेला 20 फिट सम्म उचाई भएको बाढी आएको थियो, अहिले नजिकैको बाँधलाई पार गरेकाले कम्मरसम्मको पानीमा छ। पानी 100 फिट चौडाइमा सेतुमाथि बगिरहेको छ।
mt: 6 inch rainfall is expected to break the levee. The Ninth Ward, where floodwaters reached 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is now overtopped by the nearby levee. Water is 100 feet wide and rising above the top of the levee.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees. The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped. Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: ह्यामिल्टनले होवार्ड विश्वविद्यालय अस्पतालले विरामीलाई स्थिर अवस्थामा भर्ना गरेको पुष्टि गर्‍यो। बिरामी नाइजेरिया गएको थियो, जहाँ इबोला भाइरसका केही मामिलाहरू देखिएका थिए। अस्पतालले अरू मानिसहरूलाई सम्भाव्य संक्रमणको रोकथाम गर्न बिरामीलाई अलग गर्नु पर्ने कुरा समावेश गर्दै, संक्रमण नियन्त्रणको लागि प्रोटोकलको पालना गरेको छ।
mt: Hamillton confirmed the patient was admitted to stable condition at Howard University Hospital. The patient had traveled to Nigeria, where some cases of Ebola virus had been reported. The hospital had isolated the patient, including protocols for infection control to prevent transmission.
ref: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition. The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred. The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.

src: पुच्छ्रेतारा सम्भवतः पृथ्वीमा प्रोटिन बनाउन सक्ने र जीवनलाई सहयोग पुर्‍याउने जैविक पदार्थको साथै पानी वितरणको स्रोत हुन सक्छन्। वैज्ञानिकहरू धेरै पहिला धूम्रकेतुहरू पृथ्वीसँग ठोक्किएपछि, विशेषगरी पृथ्वी कसरी बनेको हो भन्ने ग्रहहरू कसरी बनेको बुझ्ने आशा राख्दछन्।
mt: Comets may have brought organic matter that could have helped life form and water to Earth. Scientists are hoping to learn how planets form by studying comets that have struck Earth, especially the one that formed the Earth.
ref: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.

src: अधिकारीहरू खतराको विश्वसनीयताको बारेमा अनिश्चित भए तापनि मेरील्यान्ड यातायात प्राधिकरणले FBI को आग्रहमा बन्द गर्‍यो। टिप्परहरू ट्युब प्रवेशद्वारहरू रोक्नका लागि प्रयोग गरिएका थिए र 80 प्रहरीको मद्दत मोटरसाइकल यात्रीहरूलाई घुमाउरो बाटो तर्फ निर्देशित गर्नका लागि तयार थियो। सहरको वैकल्पिक मार्ग, बेल्टवेमा कुनै ठूलो यातायात ढिलाई रिपोर्ट गरिएको थिएन।
mt: Authorities were uncertain about the credibility of the threat, but the Merilland Transportation Authority closed at the request of the FBI.  Tippers were used to block entryways, and 80 police officers were prepared to direct motorcyclists to detour routes.  There was no major traffic delay reported in the city's alternative routes.
ref: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours. There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.

src: फोटोग्राफरलाई Ronald Reagan UCLA मेडिकल सेन्टरमा लगिएको थियो, पछि उनी त्यहीँमरे। उनको उमेर 20 देखि 30 वर्षको बिचमा भएको जनाइएको थियो। एक विज्ञप्‍तिमा बिबरले भने “[जबकि] म यो दुःखद दुर्घटना हुँदा घटनास्थलमा उपस्थित नभए पनि र म यसमा प्रत्यक्ष रूपमा सम्मिलित नभएको भए पनि मेरो विचार र प्रार्थनाहरू पीडितका परिवारसँग छन्।” मनोरञ्जन समाचार वेबसाइट TMZले बुझ्दछ कि फोटोग्राफरले सेपुलवेदा बोलेभार्डको अर्कोपट्टि आफ्नो गाडी रोके र सडक पार गर्नुअघि र पुलिस स्टपको तस्विर खिच्ने प्रयास गरे र सडक पार गर्न जारी राखे, जसले गर्दा ट्राफिक रोक्ने काम गरिरहेका क्यालिफोर्निया राजमार्ग गस्ती पुलिस अफिसरले उनलाई दुई पटक फिर्ता हुन आदेश दिए। प्रहरीका अनुसार फोटटोग्राफरलाई ठोक्काउने सवारी चालकले अपराधिक मुद्दाहरूको सामना गर्ने सम्भावना छैन।
mt: The photographer was identified as being at Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, then he went there. He was reported to be between 20 and 30 years old. In a statement, Beverly said, "While I was not present at the scene of this tragic accident, nor was I directly involved, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim." TMZ reports that the photographer stopped his car in front of the other car and took a picture of the stop sign before crossing the street, which caused the traffic to stop, which was being done by the California Highway Patrol officers. The photographer was ordered to turn around twice by the officers, according to police. The driver of the other car is not expected to face criminal charges.
ref: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died. He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."

src: अध्यक्षीय मन्त्री रोड्रिगो अरियासले एरियास भाइरसको हल्का सङ्क्रमणको सकारात्मक परीक्षण गरिएको कुरा गरेका छन्‌। राष्ट्रपतिको अवस्था स्थिर भए पनि उनलाई केही दिनका लागि घरमा अलग राखिनेछ। ज्वरो र घाँटी दुखाइका बाहेक, म दूरसञ्चार गरेर आफ्नो काम पूरा गर्नका लागि स्वस्थ महसुस गर्छु र राम्रो अवस्थामा छु। “म सोमबारसम्ममा आफ्ना सबै कर्तव्यहरूमा फर्कने आशा गर्छु”, Arias ले विज्ञप्तिमार्फत भने।
mt: President Rodrigo Arias has tested positive for the milder strain of the Arias virus. His condition is stable but he will be kept isolated at home for a few days. I feel well enough to continue my work by phone and I am in good condition. “I hope to return to all my duties on Monday,” Arias said in a statement.
ref: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."

ref: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."

src: यसको चरम विन्दुमा, मालदिभ्सको भाषामा ताडको पातको झोलाका लागि नाम दिइएको, ट्रपिकल साइक्लोन गोनु, 240 किलोमिटर प्रति घण्टा (149 माइल प्रति घण्टा) को निरन्तर हावासम्म पुग्यो। आजको सुरुमा, हावा 83 किमी प्रति घण्टाको वरिपरि थियो र यो कमजोर रहिरहने अपेक्षा गरिएको थियो।
mt: At its peak, the storm, named Tropical Cyclone Goni in the local language for the leaf of the coconut palm, reached 240 kilometres per hour (149 mph). Winds were around 83 kilometres per hour (52 mph) early Monday, and were expected to remain weak.
ref: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.

src: प्राकृतिक रूपमा हुने एकल कोशिकायुक्त समुद्री जीवले हुने रातो छाल, कारेनिया ब्रिभिसको सामान्य एकाग्रताभन्दा बढीको कारणले हुन्छ। प्राकृतिक कारकहरूले आदर्श अवस्थाको उत्पादन गर्नका लागि प्रतिच्छेद गर्न सक्दछन्, जसले लेउको संख्यालाई धेरै संख्यामा वृद्धि गर्न दिन्छन्। लेऊले मानव र माछा दुवैका स्नायुहरू काम नगर्ने बनाउन सक्ने न्युरोटोक्सिन उत्पादन गर्छ। पानीमा विषाक्तताको उच्च गाढापनले गर्दा प्रायः माछा मर्छन्। हावा र छालहरूबाट हावामा लिने पानी भएको सास लिँदा मानिस प्रभावित हुन सक्छ।
mt: A natural single-celled marine organism produces a red slime, the concentration of which is higher than the ideal state, which can be crossed by natural factors, which increases the number of leuks. Leuks can produce neurotoxins that make human and fish nerves not work. High toxicity of water in the air and skin can affect people by breathing air containing water from the air and skin.
ref: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.

src: सफिर-सिम्पसन आँधी मापनमा एक पटक श्रेणी 4 आँधी, फेलिसिया मङ्गलवारका दिन विघटन हुनुभन्दा अगाडि उष्ण प्रदेशिय संकुचन हुनाले कमजोर भयो। यसका अवशेषहरूले अधिकांश टापुहरूमा वर्षा उत्पादन गरे, तर अहिलेसम्म, कुनै क्षति वा बाढीको रिपोर्ट गरिएको छैन। ओहुको प्रमाणिक नापमा 6.34 इन्च पुगेको वर्षालाई “फाइदाजनक” भनेर वर्णन गरिएको थियो। केहि वर्षाका साथ आँधिबेहरी र लगातार चट्याङ परेको थियो।
mt: The Safir-Simpson wind scale was downgraded from a category 4 hurricane to a tropical depression on Monday, weakened by a pre-mangalavara contraction in the tropics. Its remnants brought rain to most of the islands, but no damage or flooding has been reported so far. The 6.34 inches of rain recorded by the Ohu gauge was described as "beneficial" with some rain and continuous downpours.
ref: "Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported. The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as ""beneficial"". Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning."

src: फर्नान्डो अलोन्सोको रोकावटका कारण प्युकेट जूनियरको सन् 2008 को सिङ्गापुरमा भएको ग्रान्ड प्रिक्समा दुर्घटना भएको थियो। अलोन्सोभन्दा अगाडीका कारहरू सुरक्षा कारमुनि इन्धनका लागिभित्र पस्दा, उ प्याकसम्म पुगेर विजयी भयो। प्युकेट जुनियरलाई 2009 हंगेरी ग्र्याण्ड प्रिक्सपछि बर्खास्त गरियो।
mt: 2008 Singapore Grand Prix was won by Fernando Alonso, who was leading the race when the safety car was deployed to clear debris from the track. The cars behind Alonso were forced to slow down, allowing him to win. He was sacked by Renault in 2009 after the Hungarian Grand Prix.
ref: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory. Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

src: साइन्स पत्रिकामा बिहीबार प्रकाशित एउटा अध्ययनले एक्वादोरियाली गालापागोस टापुमा नयाँ चरा प्रजातिहरूको निर्माण बारेमा रिपोर्ट गरेको छ। संयुक्त राज्यको प्रिन्सटन विश्वविद्यालय र स्वीडेनको अप्सला विश्वविद्यालयका अन्वेषकहरूले नयाँ प्रजातिहरू मात्र दुई पुस्तामा विकसित भएको बताएका छन्, यद्यपि स्थानीय डार्विन फिन्च, जियोस्पाइजा फोर्टेस र विदेशी सिउडि फिन्च, जियोस्पाइजा कनिरोस्ट्रिसबीचको प्रजननका कारण यस प्रक्रियामा धेरै समय लाग्ने विश्वास गरिएको थियो।
mt: A study published in Science on Wednesday reports the creation of new bird species on the Galapagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden say the new species have developed in just two generations, although it was thought that the process would take much longer due to hybridization between the local Darwin finch, Geospiza fortis, and the foreign Cocos finch, Geospiza conirostris.
ref: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

src: यो कलात्मक घटना पनि बुखारेस्ट सिटी हलको एक अभियानको हिस्सा हो, जसले रोमानियाली राजधानीको छविलाई एक रचनात्मक र रंगीन महानगरका रूपमा फेरि सुरू गर्न खोज्दछ। यो सहर जुन र अगस्तको बिचमा विश्वको सबैभन्दा ठूलो सार्वजनिक कला कार्यक्रम, काउपरेड आयोजना गर्ने दक्षिण पूर्वी यूरोपमा पहिलो हुनेछ।
mt: This artistic event is also part of a larger project to rebrand Bucharest City Hall, which aims to rebrand the capital of Romania as a creative and colorful metropolis. The city, which will host the world's largest public art event, the August Cup, will be the first in Southeastern Europe.
ref: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis. The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.

src: यो कलात्मक घटना पनि बुखारेस्ट सिटी हलको एक अभियानको हिस्सा हो, जसले रोमानियाली राजधानीको छविलाई एक रचनात्मक र रंगीन महानगरका रूपमा फेरि सुरू गर्न खोज्दछ। यो सहर जुन र अगस्तको बिचमा विश्वको सबैभन्दा ठूलो सार्वजनिक कला कार्यक्रम, काउपरेड आयोजना गर्ने दक्षिण पूर्वी यूरोपमा पहिलो हुनेछ।

ref: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis. The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.

src: एयरक्राफ्ट इर्कत्स्कतर्फ बढिरहेको थियो र आन्तरिक सैनिकहरूद्वारा सञ्चालन भइरहेको थियो। अनुसन्धानका लागि एक जाँच समिति स्थापित गरिएको थियो। 1970 को दशकदेखि Il-76 रूसी र सोभियत दुवै सेनाको एउटा प्रमुख घटक भएको छ र गएको महिना रसियामा गम्भीर दुर्घटना देखिसकेको छ। अक्टोबर 7 मा उडान गर्दा एउटा इन्जिन अलग्गियो, जसमा कुनै चोटपटक लागेन। त्यो दुर्घटनापछि रूसले Il-76s को उडान केही समय प्रतिबन्धित गर्‍यो।
mt: The aircraft was heading towards Irkutsk and was operated by the Russian military. A committee was formed to investigate the crash. The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet air forces since the 1970s and serious accidents have been occurring in Russia in the past month. On October 7, an engine fell off while in flight, with no injuries. After that accident, Russia temporarily banned flights of Il-76s.
ref: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops. An inquiry was established to investigate. The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.

The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.

src: सिम्पसनभन्दा पहिला साइमनले विभिन्न अवस्थाका विभिन्न कार्यक्रममा काम गरिसकेका थिए। 1980 को दशकमा उनले ट्याक्सी, चीयर्स र The Tracy Ullman शो जस्ता कार्यक्रमहरूमा काम गरे। सन् 1989 मा उनले ब्रुक्स र ग्रोनिङ्गसँग द सिम्पसनहरू सिर्जना गर्न मद्दत गरे र उनी कार्यक्रमको पहिलो लेखन टोली नियुक्त गर्न जिम्मेवार थिए। सन् 1993 मा कार्यक्रम छोड्दा पनि उनले कार्यकारी निर्माताको पदवी कायम राखे र रोयल्टी वापत हरेक सिजन दशौँ मिलियन डलर प्राप्त गरिराखे।
mt: Simpson had previously worked on various shows in various capacities. In the 1980s, he worked on Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989, he helped create The Simpsons with Matt Groening and was responsible for selecting the show's first writing staff. In 1993, he left the show, but continued to serve as executive producer and received royalties of $10 million per season.
ref: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions. During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team. Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.

src: फ्लुकले लेखे कि महिलाको स्वास्थ्यको बारेमा बोल्नबाट महिलालाई दबाउन केहीले गरेका प्रयासहरू असफल भएका थिए। गर्भ निरोधक औषधी उपचारलाई चिकित्सा आवश्यकता मानिनेछ भनेर दुवै महिला र पुरूषहरूले उनीलाई पठाई धेरै सकारात्मक टिप्पणी र प्रोत्साहनको कारण उनी यस निष्कर्षमा पुगेकी छिन्।
mt: Fluke wrote that she was able to speak about women's health without being silenced by those who tried to suppress her.  She was able to conclude that contraceptives are a medical necessity because both women and men were sent to her with positive comments and encouragement.
ref: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.

src: यसलाई पानी जस्तै व्यवहार गर्न गइरहेको छ। यो पानी जस्तै नै पारदर्शी छ। त्यसैले यदि तपाईं तटरेखामा उभिँदै हुनुहुन्थ्यो भने, तपाईं पिँधमा भएका कङ्कडहरू वा गम देख्न सक्षम हुनुहुन्थ्यो। “जहाँसम्म हामीलाई थाहा छ, त्यहाँ एक मात्र ग्रहको निकाय छ जसले टाइटनभन्दा बढी गतिशीलता देखाउँछ र यसको नाम पृथ्वी हो”, स्टोफानले थपे।
mt: It behaves like water. It is as transparent as water. So if you are standing on the beach, you can see the pebbles and sand in the bottom of the pool. "As far as we know, there is only one body in the solar system that is more active than Titan and its name is Earth," Stofan added.
ref: """It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is. So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."
