src: संयमताका साथ मादक पदार्थहरू पिउनुहोस्। रक्सीले सबैलाई भिन्न तरिकाले असर गर्छ र आफ्नो सीमा जान्नु धेरै महत्त्वपूर्ण हुन्छ। अत्यधिक मदिरा सेवन हुन सक्ने सम्भावित दीर्घकालीन स्वास्थ्य घटनाहरूमा कलेजोको क्षति र अन्धोपना र मृत्युसमेत हुन सक्छ। अवैध रूपमा उत्पादन गरिएको मदिरा सेवन गर्दा सम्भावित खतरा बढेको छ। अवैध स्पिरिटहरूले विभिन्न खतरनाक अशुद्धिहरू समावेश गर्न सक्दछन्, मिथेनोल लगायत, जसले सानो खुराकमा पनि अन्धोपन वा मृत्यु गराउन सक्दछन्।
mt: 1. Drink responsibly. Alcohol affects everyone differently and knowing your limits is important. Excessive alcohol consumption can lead to a range of potential long-term health events, including liver damage and blindness, and even death. Drinking illegally produced alcohol carries additional risks. Bootleg spirits can contain a range of dangerous contaminants, including methanol, which can cause blindness or death at even small doses.
ref: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important. Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol. Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.

src: संयमताका साथ मादक पदार्थहरू पिउनुहोस्। रक्सीले सबैलाई भिन्न तरिकाले असर गर्छ र आफ्नो सीमा जान्नु धेरै महत्त्वपूर्ण हुन्छ। अत्यधिक मदिरा सेवन हुन सक्ने सम्भावित दीर्घकालीन स्वास्थ्य घटनाहरूमा कलेजोको क्षति र अन्धोपना र मृत्युसमेत हुन सक्छ। अवैध रूपमा उत्पादन गरिएको मदिरा सेवन गर्दा सम्भावित खतरा बढेको छ। अवैध स्पिरिटहरूले विभिन्न खतरनाक अशुद्धिहरू समावेश गर्न सक्दछन्, मिथेनोल लगायत, जसले सानो खुराकमा पनि अन्धोपन वा मृत्यु गराउन सक्दछन्।
mt: 1. Drink responsibly. Alcohol affects everyone differently and knowing your limits is important. Excessive alcohol consumption can lead to a range of potential long-term health events, including liver damage and blindness, and even death. Drinking illegally produced alcohol carries additional risks. Bootleg spirits can contain a range of dangerous contaminants, including methanol, which can cause blindness or death at even small doses.
ref: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important. Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol. Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.

src: क्यानल डिस्ट्रिक्ट (डच: ग्राक्टेन्गोर्डेल) 17औँ शताब्दीको प्रसिद्ध जिल्ला हो जसले एम्स्टर्डमको बिन्नेन्स्ट्याड घेरेको थियो। पूरा जिल्लालाई यसको अद्वितीय सांस्कृतिक र ऐतिहासिक महत्त्व का लागि UNESCO विश्व सम्पदाका रूपमा तोकिएको छ र यसका सम्पत्तिको मूल्य देशमा सबैभन्दा उच्च छ।
mt: 17th century Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is a famous district surrounded by the city of Amsterdam. The entire district has been designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical significance and its property values are the highest in the country.
ref: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam. The whole district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest of the country.

src: नोम क्रोम, सिम रिपको 12 किलोमिटर दक्षिण पश्चिममा। यस पहाडको टुप्पोमा अवस्थित मन्दिर 9 औँ शताब्दीको अन्तमा राजा यासोवर्मनको शासनकालमा निर्माण गरिएको थियो। मन्दिरको उदास वातावरण र टोनल स्याप तालको दृश्यले पहाडमा चढ्नु सार्थक बनाउँछन्। साइटसम्मको भ्रमण तालसम्मको डुङ्गा यात्राका साथ सहजै मिलाउन सकिन्छ। टोनले सापमा जाँदा आङ्कोर पास मन्दिर प्रवेश गर्ने हुनाले पासपोर्ट ल्याउन नबिर्सनु होला।
mt: 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. The temple on the top of the mountain was built in the late 9th century during the reign of King Yasovarman. The sad atmosphere and the view of the Tonle Sap lake make the climb to the mountain worthwhile. The site can be easily combined with a boat trip on the lake to Angkor Wat temple, so it is advisable not to bring a passport.
ref: Phnom Krom, 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This hilltop temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman. The gloomy atmosphere of the temple and the view over the Tonle Sap lake make the climb to the hill worthwhile. A visit to the site can be conveniently combined with a boat trip to the lake. The Angkor Pass is needed to enter the temple so do not forget to bring your passport along when heading to Tonle Sap.

src: पृथ्वीको सबैभन्दा चिसो ठाउँ अन्टार्टिका हो र यो दक्षिण ध्रुवको वरिपरि छ। पर्यटक भ्रमण महँगो रहेको छ, शारीरिक तन्दुरुस्ती चाहिन्छ, नोभेम्बर-फेब्रुअरीको गर्मीमा मात्र हुन सक्छ र प्रायः प्रायद्वीप, टापु र रस सागरमा सीमित छन्। प्रायः ती क्षेत्रहरूमा गर्मीमा केही चार दर्जन अड्‍डाहरूमा केही हजार जोडी कर्मचारीहरू बस्छन्; थोरै संख्या जाडोभरि बस्छन्। आन्तरिक अन्टार्कटिका एक उजाड पठार हो जुन 2-3 किलोमिटर बरफले ढाकिएको छ। कहिलेकाहीँ विशेषज्ञ हवाई टुरहरू पर्वतारोहणका लागि वा पोलमा पुग्नका लागिभित्र जान्छन्, जसको ठूलो आधार हुन्छ।
mt: The coldest place on Earth is Antarctica, which is around the South Pole. Tourist visits are expensive, physical fitness is required, and they can only be done in the summer months of November-February and are usually limited to the peninsula, islands and Ross Sea. There are usually a few hundred or so staff at a few dozen bases in the warmer months, and a few in the winter. The interior of Antarctica is a barren plateau covered in 2-3 meters of snow. Occasionally experts fly in for mountaineering or to reach the pole, whose main base is there.
ref: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole. Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea. A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter. Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice. Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.

src: आधुनिक समयभन्दा पहिलेका प्रयोगशालाहरू सामान्यतया आज काम नलाग्ने अवस्थामा छन् र ती सङ्ग्रहालय वा शिक्षा प्राप्त गर्ने स्थलका रूपमा छन्। पहिले हालको जस्तो प्रकाश प्रदूषणको समस्या थिएन। आधुनिक समयमा बनेकोभन्दा पुग्न सजिला तिनीहरू प्राय: शहर वा क्याम्पसहरूमा अवस्थित थिए। अधिकतम आधुनिक अनुसन्धान टेलिस्कोपहरू अनुकूल वातावरणीय अवस्थाहरू भएका दुर्गम क्षेत्रहरूमा विशाल सुविधाहरू हुन्।
mt: Most of the old laboratories are now in museums or educational sites. They were not as polluted as today. Most of the modern research telescopes are in large facilities in remote areas with good environmental conditions.
ref: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education. As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times. Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.

src: आधुनिक समयभन्दा पहिलेका प्रयोगशालाहरू सामान्यतया आज काम नलाग्ने अवस्थामा छन् र ती सङ्ग्रहालय वा शिक्षा प्राप्त गर्ने स्थलका रूपमा छन्। पहिले हालको जस्तो प्रकाश प्रदूषणको समस्या थिएन। आधुनिक समयमा बनेकोभन्दा पुग्न सजिला तिनीहरू प्राय: शहर वा क्याम्पसहरूमा अवस्थित थिए। अधिकतम आधुनिक अनुसन्धान टेलिस्कोपहरू अनुकूल वातावरणीय अवस्थाहरू भएका दुर्गम क्षेत्रहरूमा विशाल सुविधाहरू हुन्।

src: अकल्यान्डको दुई बन्दरगाहरूको फैलावटका कारण त्यहाँ धेरै समुद्री तटहरू छन्। सबैभन्दा लोकप्रिय तीन क्षेत्रहरूमा छन्। उत्तरी बैंक तटहरू (उत्तर हार्बर जिल्लामा) प्रशान्त महासागरमा छन् र उत्तरमा लङ्ग खाडीदेखि दक्षिणमा डाभेनपोर्टसम्म फैलिएका छन्। तिनीहरू प्रायः सबै बालुवा युक्त समुद्री बैंकहरू हुन् जसमा पौडी खेल्नु सुरक्षित छ र प्राय पोहुटुकावा रुखहरूद्वारा छायाँ प्रदान गरिएको छ। वेटमाता हार्बरमा तामाकी ड्राइभमा समुद्री बिचहरू छन्, मिशन बे मध्य बजारमा र सेन्ट हेलियर्स सेन्ट्रल अकल्यान्डको बजारमा छन्‌। यी समुद्री तटमा राम्रा श्रृङ्खलाबद्ध पसलहरूको साथमा कहिलेकाहीँ भिडभाड हुने पारिवारिक समुद्री तट हुन्। पौडी सुरक्षित छ।
mt: There are many beaches in Auckland due to its many harbours. The most popular three areas are: North Shore beaches (North Harbour District) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. They are mostly sandy beaches safe for swimming and usually shaded by pohutukawa trees. Whangaparaoa Harbour has beaches at Tamaki Drive, Mission Bay in the middle of the city and St Heliers in the Central Auckland suburb. These beaches have good family beaches with occasional congestion. Swimming is safe.
ref: There are many beaches, due to Auckland's straddling of two harbours. The most popular ones are in three areas. North Shore beaches (in North Harbour district) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. They are almost all sandy beaches with safe swimming, and most have shade provided by pohutukawa trees. Tamaki Drive beaches are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the upmarket suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland. These are sometimes-crowded family beaches with a good range of shops lining the shore. Swimming is safe.

src: कृपया याद राख्नुहोस् कि तपाईं सामूहिक चिहानको क्षेत्रको साथसाथै विश्वको जनसंख्याको महत्त्वपूर्ण अंशको लागि प्रायः अतुलनीय अर्थ भएको क्षेत्रको भ्रमण गर्दै हुनुहुन्छ। यहाँ अझै धेरै पुरुष र महिलाहरू बाँचेका छन् जसले आफ्नो समय यहाँ व्यतीत गरे र अरू धेरै जसका प्रियजनहरू थिए जसलाई त्यहाँ मारिएको वा यहूदी र गैर-यहूदीहरूलाई समान रुपमा मृत्युदण्ड दिइएको थियो। कृपया साईटलाई योग्य रहेको पूर्ण मर्यादा, गम्भीरता र आदरका साथ व्यवहार गर्नुहोस्। होलोकास्ट वा नाजीहरूको बारेमा ठट्टा नगर्नुहोस्। संरचनाहरूमा भित्ते चित्र लगाएर वा स्क्र्याच गरेर साइटलाई खराब नगर्नुहोस्।
mt: Please remember that you are visiting a site of great historical and cultural significance, as well as a site of great historical and cultural significance. Please treat the site with the appropriate level of respect, decorum, and dignity. Do not make Holocaust or Nazi jokes. Do not vandalize the structures with graffiti or scratch art.
ref: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population. There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike. Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis. Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.

src: सहायक भाषाहरू कृत्रिम वा सिर्जना गरिएका भाषाहरू हुन् जुन मानिसहरूका माझमा सञ्चारको सुविधा पुर्‍याउने उद्देश्यका साथ सिर्जना गरिएका हुन् र जसलाई अन्यथा सञ्चार गर्नमा कठिनाइ हुन सक्थ्यो। तिनीहरू बोलिचालिका भाषाहरूबाट अलग छन्, जुन प्राकृतिक वा जैविक भाषाहरू हुन् जुन एक वा अर्को कारणले अरू भाषाहरूका वक्ताहरूका बिचमा सञ्चारको माध्यमका रूपमा प्रभावशाली बन्न जान्छन्।
mt: Auxiliary languages are constructed or invented languages created with the purpose of facilitating communication among people and which are distinct from natural or naturalistic languages, which are effective as means of communication between speakers of different languages for some reason.
ref: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating. They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.

mt: Auxiliary languages are constructed or invented languages created with the purpose of facilitating communication among people and which are distinct from natural or naturalistic languages, which are effective as means of communication between speakers of different languages for some reason.

src: यदि जाडोमा उत्तरी बाल्टिक पार गर्ने हो भने, क्याबिनको स्थान जाँच गर्नुहोस्, किनकि हिउँको बाटो हुदै जाँदा यो सबैभन्दा बढी प्रभावित व्यक्तिहरूका लागि एकदम डरलाग्दो आवाजको कारण बन्दछ। सेन्ट पिटर्सबर्ग क्रुजहरूले सहरमा समय समावेश गरे। क्रुज यात्रीहरूलाई भिसा आवश्यकताहरूबाट (सर्तहरूलाई जाँच्नुहोस्) छुट दिइएको छ।
mt: If you're crossing the North Baltic in winter, check the road conditions, as this is the most affected by snow and ice, and can be very scary for the most affected people. St. Petersburg cruises include city time. Cruisers are exempt from visa requirements (check the rules).
ref: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected. Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).

ref: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected. Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).

src: क्याटालान र स्पेनिश बार्सिलोनाका आधिकारिक भाषा हुन्। करिब आधाले क्याटालान बोल्न मन पराउँछन् र बहुमतले यसलाई बुझ्छन्‌ र लगभग सबैलाई स्पेनी भाषा आउँछ। जहाँसम्म, धेरै सङ्केत हरू केवल क्याटालानमा मात्र सङ्केत गरिन्छन् किनकी यो कानुनद्वारा पहिलो आधिकारिक भाषाका रूपमा स्थापित छ। यद्यपि, स्पेनी भाषा सार्वजनिक यातायात र अन्य भवनहरूमा पनि व्यापक रूपमा प्रयोग गरिन्छ। मेट्रोमा नियमित घोषणा क्याटालानमा मात्र गरिन्छ तर योजनाबद्ध अवरोध स्वचालित प्रणालीले स्पेनिश, अङ्ग्रेजी, फ्रान्सेली, अरबी र जापानीजसहित विभिन्न भाषाहरूमा घोषणा गर्छ।
mt: Catalan and Spanish are the official languages. About half prefer to speak Catalan and most understand it, while almost all are fluent in Spanish. As long as, most signs are only in Catalan as it is established as the first official language by law. However, Spanish is widely used in public transportation and other buildings. In the metro, announcements are only in Catalan but the planned disruption is announced in Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese among other languages.
ref: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish. However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language. Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities. Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.

src: विकसित देशहरूमा आज, डिलक्स बेड र ब्रेकफास्टहरू प्रदान गर्ने कुरालाई कलाको-प्रकारको रूपमा बढाइएको छ। शीर्ष अन्त्यमा, बी एण्ड बीएस स्पष्ट रूपमा दुई मुख्य चीजहरूमा प्रतिस्पर्धा गर्छ: ओछ्यान र बिहानको खाजा। यसैअनुसार, यी उत्कृष्ट प्रतिष्ठानहरूमा, शायद हातले बनाएको डसना वा पुरानो खाटमा, सबैभन्दा विलासी पलङ्ग पाउन उपयुक्त छ। ब्रेकफास्टमा उक्त क्षेत्रको मौसमअनुसारको स्वादिष्ट खानेकुरा वा होस्टले तयार पार्ने विशेष खाना समावेश हुन सक्छ। सेटिङ प्राचीन सामान, हेरविचार गरिएको मैदान र एउटा पौडी पोखरीको साथ ऐतिहासिक पुरानो भवन हुन सक्छ।
mt: In developed countries, today, providing a deluxe bed and breakfast is considered an art form. At the top end, B&Bs clearly compete on two main things: the sheets and the breakfast. Accordingly, these establishments, perhaps a hand-made duvet or an old-fashioned quilt, are suitable for the most luxurious of slumbers. Breakfast may include local weather-appropriate tasty fare or a special meal prepared by the host. The setting may be ancient furnishings, a tended lawn and a historic old building with a pond.
ref: In developed countries today, providing deluxe bed and breakfasts has been raised to a sort of art-form. At the top end, B&Bs obviously compete mainly on two main things: bedding and breakfast. Accordingly, at the finest such establishments one is apt to find the most luxurious bedding, maybe a handmade quilt or an antique bed. Breakfast may include seasonal delights of the region or the host's speciality dish. The setting might be an historic old building with antique furnishings, manicured grounds and a swimming pool.

src: सन् २०२२ मा हुने शीतकालीन ओलम्पिक खेलको आयोजक सहर चीनको बेइजिङ सहर हुने छ। यससँगै बेइजिङ ग्रीष्मकालीन र शीतकालीन दुवै ओलम्पिक खेल आयोजना गर्ने पहिलो सहर बन्ने छ। बेइजिङले उद्घाटन र समापन समारोहहरू र इनडोर आइस कार्यक्रमहरूको आयोजना गर्दछ। अन्य स्कीइङ प्रतियोगिताहरू बेइजिङबाट 220 किलोमिटर (140 माइल) टाढा झाङजियाकोउको ताइजिचेङ स्की क्षेत्रमा हुनेछन्।
mt: 2022 Winter Olympics will be held in Beijing, China. Beijing will be the first city to host both the Summer and Winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and indoor ice events. Other skiing events will be held 220 kilometres (140 miles) away in Zhangjiakou's Taiyuan Ski Area.
ref: The city of Beijing in China will be the host city of the Olympic Winter Games in 2022, which will make it the first city to have hosted both the summer and winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the indoor ice events. Other skiing events will be at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.

src: सन् २०२२ मा हुने शीतकालीन ओलम्पिक खेलको आयोजक सहर चीनको बेइजिङ सहर हुने छ। यससँगै बेइजिङ ग्रीष्मकालीन र शीतकालीन दुवै ओलम्पिक खेल आयोजना गर्ने पहिलो सहर बन्ने छ। बेइजिङले उद्घाटन र समापन समारोहहरू र इनडोर आइस कार्यक्रमहरूको आयोजना गर्दछ। अन्य स्कीइङ प्रतियोगिताहरू बेइजिङबाट 220 किलोमिटर (140 माइल) टाढा झाङजियाकोउको ताइजिचेङ स्की क्षेत्रमा हुनेछन्।
mt: 2022 Winter Olympics will be held in Beijing, China. Beijing will be the first city to host both the Summer and Winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and indoor ice events. Other skiing events will be held 220 kilometres (140 miles) away in Zhangjiakou's Taiyuan Ski Area.
ref: The city of Beijing in China will be the host city of the Olympic Winter Games in 2022, which will make it the first city to have hosted both the summer and winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the indoor ice events. Other skiing events will be at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.

src: औपचारिक रूपमा एभियन इन्फ्लुएन्जाका नामले चिनिने बर्ड फ्लुबाट चरा र स्तनधारी प्राणी दुवै सङ्क्रमित हुन सक्छन्। मानवमा हजारभन्दा कम घटनाहरू रिपोर्ट गरिएका छन् र तीमध्ये केही घातक छन्। ज्यान गुमाउने मान्छेहरूमध्ये धेरैजसो कुखुरा पालनमा काम गर्ने व्यक्तिहरू रहेका छन् तर चराहरू अवलोकन गर्न चाहने व्यक्तिमा पनि यसबाट केही जोखिम रहेको छ।
mt: Birds and mammals can both be infected with the avian influenza, officially known as bird flu. There have been fewer than 1,000 reported cases in humans, and some have been fatal. Most of the people who have died were involved in poultry farming, but people who observe birds can also be at risk.
ref: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals. Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal. Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.

src: औपचारिक रूपमा एभियन इन्फ्लुएन्जाका नामले चिनिने बर्ड फ्लुबाट चरा र स्तनधारी प्राणी दुवै सङ्क्रमित हुन सक्छन्। मानवमा हजारभन्दा कम घटनाहरू रिपोर्ट गरिएका छन् र तीमध्ये केही घातक छन्। ज्यान गुमाउने मान्छेहरूमध्ये धेरैजसो कुखुरा पालनमा काम गर्ने व्यक्तिहरू रहेका छन् तर चराहरू अवलोकन गर्न चाहने व्यक्तिमा पनि यसबाट केही जोखिम रहेको छ।
mt: Birds and mammals can both be infected with the avian influenza, officially known as bird flu. There have been fewer than 1,000 reported cases in humans, and some have been fatal. Most of the people who have died were involved in poultry farming, but people who observe birds can also be at risk.
ref: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals. Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal. Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.

src: भाइकिङहरूले ब्ल्याक समुद्र र क्यास्पियन समुद्र पुग्न रूसी जलमार्ग प्रयोग गरे। यी मार्गका भागहरू अझै पनि प्रयोग गर्न सकिन्छ। विशेष अनुमतिका लागि सम्भावित आवश्यकता जाँच गर्नुहोस्, जुन प्राप्त गर्न गाह्रो हुन सक्छ। ह्वाइट सी-बाल्टिक क्यानलले धेरैजसो नदी र तालहरूद्वारा ओनेगा ताल, लादोगा ताल र सेन्ट पिटर्सबर्गमार्फत आर्कटिक महासागरलाई बाल्टिक सीसँग जोड्छ। ओनेगा लेक भोल्गासँग जोडिएको हुनाले क्यासपियन सी हुँदै रूस आउन सम्भव छ।
mt: The ships were able to reach the Black Sea and the Caspian Sea via the Russian waterways. These routes are still in use. Check for any possible requirements for special permission, which may be difficult to obtain. The White Sea-Baltic Canal connects the Baltic Sea with the Arctic Ocean via the Onega Lake, Ladoga Lake and Saint Petersburg. The Onega Lake is connected to the Volga River, so it is possible to reach Russia via the Caspian Sea.
ref: Vikings used the Russian waterways to get to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check possible need for special permits, which may be difficult to get. The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes. Lake Onega is also connected to Volga, so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.

src: विमान, जहाज वा अन्य गाडीबाट उत्रिदा अध्यागमन चेकपोइन्ट प्रायः पहिलो स्टप हो। केहि सीमा पारीको रेलहरूमा निरीक्षण चलिरहेको ट्रेनमा गरिन्छ र तपाईंसँग ती ट्रेनहरूमध्ये कुनै एकमा चढ्दा मान्य आईडी हुनु पर्छ। राती सुत्ने रेलहरूमा, कन्डक्टरले राहदानीहरू संकलन गर्न सक्दछन् ताकि तपाईंलाई निन्द्रामा बाधा नपुगोस्।
mt: 1. The first stop on an airplane, ship, or other vehicle is usually the customs check point. On some border crossing trains, you must have a valid ID on the train you are boarding. On overnight trains, the conductor can collect your tickets so you are not disturbed while sleeping.
ref: An immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop when disembarking from a plane, a ship, or another vehicle. In some cross-border trains inspections are done on the running train and you should have valid ID with you when boarding one of those trains. On night sleeper trains, passports may be collected by the conductor so that you do not have your sleep interrupted.

src: सामान्यतया सिङ्गापुर सुरक्षित स्थान हो। नेभिगेट गर्न धेरै सजिलो छ र तपाईं पुगेपछि लगभग केहि पनि खरीद गर्न सक्नु हुन्छ। तर यो देश भूमध्यरेखाको केही डिग्री उत्तरमा रहेको “उच्च उष्णकटिबन्धीय” क्षेत्रमा मा पर्ने हुनाले तपाईंले गर्मी (सधैँ) र चर्को घाम (आकाश सफा भएका बेला, बिरलै) दुवै कुराको सामना गर्नु पर्ने हुन्छ।
mt: Singapore is usually a safe place. It's easy to navigate and once you're there, you can buy almost anything. But being in the "high tropical" region, you will have to deal with heat (always) and hot sun (on clear days, rare).
ref: "Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving. But being placed in the ""high tropics"" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely)."

src: जर्मन पेस्ट्रीहरू राम्रा छन् र बाभरियामा, तिनीहरूको दक्षिणी छिमेकी अस्ट्रियाले जस्तै, धेरै कुरा हालेको र विभिन्न खालका छन्। फलफूलबाट बनेका पेस्ट्री आम रूपमा उपलब्ध हुन्छन्, वर्षभर नै स्याउ पकाएर पेस्ट्री बनाइन्छ र गर्मीयाममा चेरी र आलुबखडा पनि प्रयोग गरिन्छ। जर्मनीमा बेक गरिएका धेरैजसो खानेकुरामा बदाम, हेजलनट र रूखमा फल्ने ओखर जातका अन्य फलहरू पनि हालिएका हुन्छन्। लोकप्रिय केकहरू विशेष गरी एक कप कडा कफीसँग खाँदा जोडी मिल्छ। तपाईं साना प्याट्रीहरू चाहानुहुन्छ भने क्षेत्रको आधारमा बर्लिनर, फाफनकुचेन वा क्राफेन भनिनेमा हेर्नुहोस्‌।
mt: German pastries are good and in Bavaria, like its southern neighbor Austria, they are many and varied. Fruits are available year-round, and berries are used in the summer. In Germany, nuts, hazelnuts, and other fruits of the tree are also used in many dishes. Popular cakes are often served with a cup of strong coffee. If you want small pastries, look for Berliner, Fafnir, or Krafen.
ref: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria. Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer. Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee. If you want some small though rich pastries, try what depending on region are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.

src: तपाईं सस्तोमा विश्व हेर्न चाहानुहुन्छ भने आवश्यकता, जीवनशैली वा चुनौतीअनुसार यसका लागि केही तरिकाहरू छन्। सामान्यतया, तिनीहरू दुई श्रेणीहरूमा पर्दछन्ः या त तपाईं यात्रा गर्दा काम गर्नुहोस् वा तपाईंको खर्च सीमित गर्ने प्रयास गर्नुहोस्। यो लेख पछिल्लोमा केन्द्रित छ। खर्चहरूलाई झन्डै शुन्यमा झार्न आराम, समय र पूर्वानुमान त्याग्न चाहनेहरूले न्यूनतम बजेट यात्रा हेर्नुहोस्। सल्लाहले यात्रीहरू चोर्ने, बेइज्जत गर्ने, अवैध बजारमा भाग लिने, माग्ने वा अन्यथा तिनीहरूको आफ्नै फाइदाका लागि अन्य मानिसहरूलाई शोषण गर्दैनन् भन्ने अनुमान गर्दछ।
mt: If you want to travel cheaply, there are some ways to do so. Generally, they fall into two categories: either you work while you travel or you try to keep your expenses low. This article focuses on the latter. If you want to travel on a shoestring, ignore the comforts, time, and predictions you want to give up. Travelers do not steal, insult, participate in illegal markets, beg, or otherwise exploit other people for their own benefit, according to the advice.
ref: If you want to see the world on the cheap, for necessity, lifestyle or challenge, there are some ways to do that. Basically, they fall into two categories: Either work while you travel or try and limit your expenses. This article is focused on the latter. For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability to push expenses down close to zero, see minimum budget travel. The advice assumes that travellers do not steal, trespass, participate in the illegal market, beg, or otherwise exploit other people for their own gain.

src: पोइन्ट मेरियन र फेयरमोन्ट बीचको विस्तारले अक्सर दुर्गम जङ्गली भूभाग हुँदै बफेलो-पिट्सबर्ग राजमार्गमा सबैभन्दा चुनौतीपूर्ण ड्राइभिङ परिस्थिति प्रस्तुत गर्दछ। यदि तपाईंले देशका सडकहरू सवारी चलाउनका लागि प्रयोग गर्नुहुन्न भने, आफ्नो बारेमा विवेकशक्ति राख्नुहोस् जसमा ठाडो श्रेणी, साँघुरो मार्ग र धारिलो वक्र प्रमुख हुन्छन्। अघिल्लो र पछिको खण्डहरूमा जारी गरिएको गति सीमाहरू कम देखिन्छन् - सामान्यतया 35-40 माइल प्रति घण्टा (56-64 किमी प्रति घण्टा) - र उनीहरूका लागि कडा आज्ञापालन अन्यथाभन्दा अझ महत्त्वपूर्ण हुन्छ। यद्यपि, यो मार्गमा रहेका पेन्सिलभेनिया वाइल्ड्स् जस्ता अन्य स्थानको तुलनामा यहाँ मोबाइल फोन सेवा निकै राम्रो छ।
mt: The Point Marion to Fairmont extension often presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Turnpike. If you are not driving on the country's roads, please exercise good judgment, where the straight line, narrow road and winding curves are the main features. The speed limits posted in the previous and following sections are lower - usually 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) - and strict enforcement is more important. However, the mobile phone service here is much better than in other places such as the Pennsylvania Wilds.
ref: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain. If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate. Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise. Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.

src: क्यान्योनिङ (वा: क्यान्योनियरिङ) भनेको एउटा सुख्खा वा पानीले भरिएको झरनाको तल जाने हो। क्यान्योनिङले पौडी खेल्ने, उड्ने र जम्पिङ गर्ने तत्त्वहरूलाई जोड्दछ - तर तुलनात्मक रूपमा सानो प्रशिक्षण वा शारीरिक आकारको आवश्यक पर्दछ (उदाहरणका लागि, रक क्लाइम्बिङ, स्कुबा डाइभिङ वा अल्पाइन स्किइङको तुलनामा)।

ref: Canyoning (or: canyoneering) is about going in a bottom of a canyon, which is either dry or full of water. Canyoning combines elements from swimming, climbing and jumping--but requires relatively little training or physical shape to get started (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or alpine skiing, for example).

src: तपाईंको आफ्नै कारमा पुग्नु र लामो सडक यात्रामा अगाडि बढ्नुको यसको सरलतामा आन्तरिक अपील रहेको छ। ठूला सवारीहरूको विपरित, तपाईं शायद पहिले नै आफ्नो कार चलाउन परिचित हुनुहुन्छ र यसको सीमितता तपाईंलाई थाहा छ। कुनै आकारको शहरमा निजी सम्पत्तिमा वा पाल स्थापना गर्दा सजिलै ध्यान आकर्षण हुन सक्छ। छोटकरीमा भन्नुपर्दा, आफ्नै कारमा सुत्नु सडक यात्रामा जाने राम्रो उपाय हो तर यसलाई “क्याम्पिङ” भन्न मिल्दैन र यो आरामदायी पनि हुँदैन। यदि तपाईंसँग ठूलो मिनीभ्यान, SUV, सेडान वा स्टेसन वेगन छ जसको सीटहरू ढल्किन्छन् भने कार क्याम्पिंग सम्भव हुन्छ।
mt: This appeal is to those who already know how to drive a car and are familiar with its limitations. In any city, a private property or a campsite can easily become a magnet for attention. To put it simply, sleeping in your car is a good way to travel on the road, but it is not called “camping” and it is not comfortable either. If you have a large minivan, SUV, sedan or station wagon with reclining seats, car camping is possible.
ref: "Getting into your own car and heading off on a long road trip has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity. Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limitations. Setting up a tent on private property or in a town of any size can easily attract unwanted attention. In short, using your car is a great way to take a road trip but seldom in itself a way to ""camp"". Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with seats that lay down."

src: तपाईंको आफ्नै कारमा पुग्नु र लामो सडक यात्रामा अगाडि बढ्नुको यसको सरलतामा आन्तरिक अपील रहेको छ। ठूला सवारीहरूको विपरित, तपाईं शायद पहिले नै आफ्नो कार चलाउन परिचित हुनुहुन्छ र यसको सीमितता तपाईंलाई थाहा छ। कुनै आकारको शहरमा निजी सम्पत्तिमा वा पाल स्थापना गर्दा सजिलै ध्यान आकर्षण हुन सक्छ। छोटकरीमा भन्नुपर्दा, आफ्नै कारमा सुत्नु सडक यात्रामा जाने राम्रो उपाय हो तर यसलाई “क्याम्पिङ” भन्न मिल्दैन र यो आरामदायी पनि हुँदैन। यदि तपाईंसँग ठूलो मिनीभ्यान, SUV, सेडान वा स्टेसन वेगन छ जसको सीटहरू ढल्किन्छन् भने कार क्याम्पिंग सम्भव हुन्छ।

src: कासाब्लान्काको आधुनिक सहर ईसापूर्व 10 औँ शताब्दीमा बर्बर फिसरम्यानले स्थापित गरेका थिए र फोनिसियनहरू, रोमनहरू र मेरिनिडहरूद्वारा अनफा भन्ने रणनीतिक बन्दरगाहका रूपमा प्रयोग गरियो। पोर्तुगालीहरूले यसलाई नष्ट गरे र केवल सन् 1755 मा गएको भूकम्पपछि हराउन नदिन कासा ब्रान्साको नाम अन्तर्गत यसको पुनर्निर्माण गरे। मोरक्कोको सुल्तानले शहरलाई डारः एल बडय़ाको रूपमा पुनर्निर्माण गरे र यसलाई त्यहाँ व्यापारिक आधारहरू बनाउने स्पेनका व्यापारीहरूले क्यासाब्लान्काको नाम दिए। किनमेल गर्न सबैभन्दा कम रोचक ठाउँहरूमध्ये मोरक्कोमा कासाब्लान्का हो। पुरानो मदीना वरिपरिको ट्यागिन, भाँडाकुँडा, छालाका सामान, हुक्का र गिगाका सम्पूर्ण स्पेक्ट्रमजस्ता परम्परागत मोरक्कन सामानहरू बेच्ने ठाउँहरू भेट्टाउन सजिलो छ तर यो सबै पर्यटकहरूका लागि मात्र हो।
mt: Casablanca was founded as Anfa by the Berber Fishermen in the 10th century BC and was used as a strategic port by the Phoenicians, Romans and Merinids. The Portuguese destroyed it and only its reconstruction as Casa Branca was not prevented by the earthquake of 1755. The Sultan of Morocco rebuilt it as Dar al-Baida and the Spanish merchants who came to trade there gave it the name Casablanca. The least interesting place to shop in Morocco is Casablanca. Old Medina around the Tagine, the pot, the coal, the hookah and the giga of the entire spectrum of traditional Moroccan goods are easy to find but this is only for tourists.
ref: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BCE, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it under the name Casa Branca, only to abandon it after an earthquake in 1755. The Moroccan sultan rebuilt the city as Daru l-Badya and it was given the name Casablanca by Spanish traders who established trading bases there. Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to shop in all of Morocco. Around the old Medina it's easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, hookahs, and a whole spectrum of geegaws, but it's all for the tourists.

src: उत्तरतिर र सजिलो पहुँचमा, सिन्ट्राको रोमान्टिक र आकर्षक सहर छ जसलाई लर्ड बाइरनद्वारा रेकर्ड गरिएको र यसका शानको चमकदार घटनापछि विदेशीहरूका लागि प्रसिद्ध बनाइएको थियो। स्कटर्ब बस क्याबो दा रोकामा रोकिदैँ 403 सिन्ट्राको नियमित यात्रा गर्दछ। यसबाहेक उत्तरमा विश्वव्यापी रूपमा प्रसिद्ध मारियनको पिशाच भएको ठाउँ हाम्रो लेडी अफ फातिमा (तीर्थ) को महान् अभयारण्यका भ्रमण गर्नुहोस्।
mt: 403 Scenic Route to Cintsa, a romantic and attractive town made famous by Lord Byron's record and foreigners after the bright event. In addition to the north, our Lady of Fatima (pilgrimage) great sanctuary, visit the demon of Marian.
ref: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron. Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca. Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.

src: सन् १९९४ मा अजरिसको विरूद्ध अजरबैजानको जातीय अर्मेनियाई नागोर्नो-काराबाख क्षेत्रले युद्ध सुरु गर्‍यो। अर्मेनियाको समर्थनले एउटा नयाँ गणतन्त्र निर्माण गरियो। यद्यपि, अर्मेनियालगायतका कुनै पनि स्थापित राष्ट्रले यसलाई आधिकारिक मान्यता दिएको छैन। यस क्षेत्रका बारे कूटनीतिक बहसले आर्मेनिया र अजरबैजान बीचको सम्बन्धलाई निरन्तर रूपमा क्षति पुर्याएको छ।
mt: 1994, the Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan, which is populated by ethnic Armenians, declared war against Azerbaijan. A new republic was formed with the support of Armenia. However, no established nation has recognized this as a state. The political dispute over this region has continued to damage the relationship between Armenia and Azerbaijan.
ref: In 1994, the ethnically Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan waged war against the Azeris. With Armenian backing, a new republic was created. However, no established nation - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it. Diplomatic arguments over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.

src: शार्लट, उत्तर क्यारोलिनाको मजबुत बिन्दुहरूमा एक यो हो कि यसमा परिवारहरूका लागि उच्च-गुणस्तरका विकल्पहरूको प्रचुरता छ। अन्य क्षेत्रका बासिन्दाहरूले प्रायः पारिवारिक मित्रतालाई त्यहाँ आउनुको प्राथमिक कारणको रूपमा देखाएका छन् र आगन्तुकहरूले प्राय: सहरमा बच्चाहरूसँगै रमाइलो गर्न सजिलो महसुस गर्छन्‌। अपटाउन चार्लोटीमा बच्चा अनुकूल विकल्पहरूको मात्रा विगत २० वर्षमा तीव्र रूपमा बढेको छ। केहि परिस्थितिहरूमा प्रयोग गर्न ट्याक्सीहरू सामान्यतया शार्लोटमा परिवारहरूले प्रयोग गर्दैनन्। 2भन्दा बढी यात्रु हुनाले अधिभार लाग्नाले यो विकल्प आवश्यकभन्दा बढी महँगो हुन सक्छ।
mt: This is true in many other parts of the state as well. Visitors often feel at ease with children there. The number of child-friendly options in uptown Charlotte has grown rapidly in the past 20 years. Taxis are rarely used by families in Charlotte. The cost of a taxi ride can be prohibitive when there are more than two passengers.
ref: One of strong points of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that it has an abundance of high-quality options for families. Residents from other areas often cite family-friendliness as a primary reason for moving there, and visitors often find the city easy to enjoy with children around. In the past 20 years, the amount of child-friendly options in Uptown Charlotte has grown exponentially. Taxis are not generally used by families in Charlotte, though they can be of some use in certain circumstances. There is a surcharge for having more than 2 passengers, so this option might be more expensive than necessary.

src: 16 औं शताब्दीमा स्पेनिशहरू प्रस्थान गर्नुअघि उत्तरी चिलीमा इन्का शासकहरूको अधीनमा भएको बेला आदिवासी अरौकानियन (मापुचे) मध्य र दक्षिण चिलीमा बस्ने गर्थे। मापुचे एउटा अन्तिम स्वतन्त्र अमेरिकी आदिवासी समूह पनि थियो, जुन चिलीको स्वतन्त्रतापछि पूर्ण रूपमा स्पेनी भाषी शासनमा सामेल भएको थिएन। सन् 1810 मा चिलेले स्वतन्त्रताको घोषणा गरे पनि (नेपोलियन युद्धको बिचमा स्पेनले केन्द्रीय सरकारको रूपमा काम गर्न केही वर्षको छोडेको थियो), स्पेनीहरूमा निर्णायक विजय सन् 1818 सम्म हासिल हुन सकेको थिएन।
mt: 16th century Spanish settlers arrived in northern Chile under the rule of Inca rulers. The Mapuche were one of the last independent American indigenous groups, not fully incorporated into Spanish-speaking government until after Chile's declaration of independence in 1810 (Spain was acting as a central government for a few years during the Napoleonic Wars), but the decisive Spanish victory was not achieved until 1818.
ref: Before the Spanish arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule while the indigenous Araucanians (Mapuche) inhabited central and southern Chile. The Mapuche were also one of the last independent American indigenous groups, that were not fully absorbed into Spanish-speaking rule until after Chile's independence. Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (amid the Napoleonic wars that left Spain without a functioning central government for a couple of years), decisive victory over the Spanish was not achieved until 1818.

src: 16 औं शताब्दीमा स्पेनिशहरू प्रस्थान गर्नुअघि उत्तरी चिलीमा इन्का शासकहरूको अधीनमा भएको बेला आदिवासी अरौकानियन (मापुचे) मध्य र दक्षिण चिलीमा बस्ने गर्थे। मापुचे एउटा अन्तिम स्वतन्त्र अमेरिकी आदिवासी समूह पनि थियो, जुन चिलीको स्वतन्त्रतापछि पूर्ण रूपमा स्पेनी भाषी शासनमा सामेल भएको थिएन। सन् 1810 मा चिलेले स्वतन्त्रताको घोषणा गरे पनि (नेपोलियन युद्धको बिचमा स्पेनले केन्द्रीय सरकारको रूपमा काम गर्न केही वर्षको छोडेको थियो), स्पेनीहरूमा निर्णायक विजय सन् 1818 सम्म हासिल हुन सकेको थिएन।
mt: 16th century Spanish settlers arrived in northern Chile under the rule of Inca rulers. The Mapuche were one of the last independent American indigenous groups, not fully incorporated into Spanish-speaking government until after Chile's declaration of independence in 1810 (Spain was acting as a central government for a few years during the Napoleonic Wars), but the decisive Spanish victory was not achieved until 1818.
ref: Before the Spanish arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule while the indigenous Araucanians (Mapuche) inhabited central and southern Chile. The Mapuche were also one of the last independent American indigenous groups, that were not fully absorbed into Spanish-speaking rule until after Chile's independence. Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (amid the Napoleonic wars that left Spain without a functioning central government for a couple of years), decisive victory over the Spanish was not achieved until 1818.

src: लिगुरियाको इटालि क्षेत्रमा अवस्थित पाँचवटा सानो समुद्री तटवर्ती गाउँहरू रियोमाग्गीओर, मानारोला, कोर्निग्ला, भेर्नाजा र मोन्टेरोस्सो समावेश गर्ने सिन्के टेरे, जसको अर्थ पाँच जग्गा हो। तिनीहरू युनेस्को विश्व सम्पदा सूचीमा सूचीबद्ध छन्। शताब्दियौँसम्म, मानिसहरूले ध्यानपूर्वक चट्टानी, भिरालो परिदृष्यमा माथिबाट समुद्र हेर्ने भिरसम्म छतको निर्माण गरेका छन्। यसको आकर्षणको अंश भनेको दृश्य कर्पोरेट विकासको अभाव हो। पथ, रेल र डुङ्गाले गाउँहरू जोड्दछ र कारहरूले तिनीहरूलाई बाहिरबाट पुर्याउन सक्दैनन्।
mt: 5 small coastal villages in Liguria, Italy, including Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso, are included in the Cinque Terre, whose name means 5 lands. They are listed in the UNESCO World Heritage List. For centuries, people have built houses with roofs up to the cliffs, overlooking the sea. Its attraction is the lack of corporate development. Paths, rail and boats connect the villages and cars cannot reach them from outside.
ref: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, comprises the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso located in the Italian region of Liguria. They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List. Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea. Part of its charm is the lack of visible corporate development. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot reach them from the outside.

mt: 5 small coastal villages in Liguria, Italy, including Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso, are included in the Cinque Terre, whose name means 5 lands. ref: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, comprises the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso located in the Italian region of Liguria. They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List. Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea. Part of its charm is the lack of visible corporate development. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot reach them from the outside.

src: जाडामा दुर्घटनाका सबैभन्दा सामान्य कारणहरू चिप्ला सडक, फुटपाथ (साइडवाक) र विशेष गरी सिंढीहरू हुन्। कम्तिमा पनि तपाईंलाई उपयुक्त तलुवा भएको जुत्ता चाहिन्छ। गर्मीयामका जुत्ताहरू प्रायः बरफ र हिउँमा धेरै चिप्लिने हुन्छन्, केही जाडोयामका जुत्ताहरूमा पनि कमी हुन्छ। यो ढाँचा पर्याप्त मात्रामा गहिरो, 5 मिलिमिटर (1/5 इन्च) वा थप हुनुपर्छ र सामग्री चिसो तापक्रमहरूमा पर्याप्त नरम हुनुपर्छ। केही बुटमा स्टडहरू हुन्छन् र त्यहाँ चिप्लिने अवस्थाका लागि, धेरैजसो जुत्ता र बुटका लागि सुहाउँदो, हिल वा हिल र तलुवाका लागि स्टड गरिएको सहयोगी उपकरण हुन्छन्। हिलहरू न्यून र फराकिलो हुनुपर्छ। बालुवा, गिटी वा लवण (क्याल्सियम क्लोराइड)लाई प्राय: सङ्कर्षण सुधार गर्न सडक वा बाटामा छरिन्छ।
mt: The most common causes of winter accidents are slippery roads, sidewalks (sidewalks) and especially stairs. At least you need appropriate shoes. Most winter boots are very slippery on snow and ice, and some winter boots also have less grip. This structure should be deep enough, at least 5 millimeters (1/5 inch) or more, and the material should be soft enough at cold temperatures. Some boots have studs and there are usually suitable, helpful accessories for most boots and shoes, for example, for hills or for hills and for studs. Hills should be low and narrow. Gravel, grit or lime (calcium chloride) is usually spread on roads or paths to improve traction.
ref: The most common cause for accidents in winter is slippery roads, pavements (sidewalks) and especially steps. At a minimum, you need footwear with suitable soles. Summer shoes are usually very slippery on ice and snow, even some winter boots are deficient. The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures. Some boots have studs and there is studded add-on equipment for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, for the heels or heels and sole. Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often scattered on roads or paths to improve traction.

src: दक्षिण प्रशान्त महासागरको बिचमा पोलिनेसियामा अवस्थित न्यूजील्यान्डको स्वतन्त्रतामा सहकार्य गर्ने कुक द्वितहरू हुन्‌। यो समुद्रमा 22 लाख वर्ग किलोमिटर क्षेत्रमा फैलिएको 15 टापुहरूको एउटा द्वीपसमूह हो। हवाईको जस्तै समय क्षेत्र भए पनि यी टापुलाई कहिलेकाहिँ “हवाई तल”का रूपमा लिइने गरेको छ। सानो भए तापनि, यसले सबै ठूला पर्यटक होटेल र अन्य विकास बिना राज्यको संज्ञा पाउनुभन्दा पहिले हवाईका केही बुढा आगन्तुकहरूको सम्झना गराउँछ। कुक टापुहरूमा कुनै पनि सहर छैन तर यो 15वटा फरक टापुहरू मिलेर बनेको छ। तीमध्ये मुख्य सहरहरू भनेका रारोटोङ्गा र आइतुतकी हुन्।
mt: The Cook Islands are a self-governing country in free association with New Zealand, in the southern Pacific Ocean. It comprises 15 islands whose total land area is 224.6 km² (86.7 sq mi). The nation has been inhabited since about 500 CE. The first European settlers on the islands were the British, who arrived in 1814. Cook Islands was a New Zealand colony from 1901 to 1964, when it became a self-governing state in free association with New Zealand. This unique relationship comprises the Cook Islands Constitution Act 1964. As well as retaining full responsibility for its own defence and foreign affairs, New Zealand is responsible for the external affairs of the Cook Islands. The Cook Islands has been a member of the Commonwealth of Nations since 1965 and of the Pacific Community since 1983. The Cook Islands currently has three free trade agreements in place with the countries of New Zealand, Fiji and Mexico. The Cook Islands uses the New Zealand dollar as its unit of currency. The population is 9,000, and the majority of inhabitants are of Māori descent (77.9%); 8.7% are Pākehā (New Zealanders of European descent), and 5.6% are part-Polynesian and part-European. The main island in the group is Rarotonga, whose population of 14,000 accounts for 60% of the total population of the country. The Avarua, on Rarotonga, is the capital and largest town. The main industries are tourism, agriculture, and marine and financial services. Foreign aid represents a large proportion of the island's gross domestic product.
ref: "The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean. It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean. With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as ""Hawaii down under"". Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development. The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki."

src: अनुमति पत्रहरू अग्रिम रूपमा आरक्षित हुनु पर्छ। तपाईंसँग सिरेनामा रात बस्नका लागि अनुमति हुनु पर्छ। सिरेना एकमात्र रेन्जर स्टेसन हो जसले छात्रावास बसोबास र क्याम्पिङ बाहेक राम्रो भोजन प्रदान गर्दछ। ला लियोना, सान पेद्रिलो र लस पातोसले खाना सेवा बिना क्याम्पिङ मात्र प्रस्ताव गर्छन्। पुएर्टो जिमनेजको रेन्जर स्टेसनबाटै पार्क अनुमतिहरू सुरक्षित गर्न सकिन्छ तर तिनीहरूले क्रेडिट कार्ड स्वीकार गर्दैनन् पार्क सेवा (MINAE) ले अपेक्षित आगमनको एक महिनाभन्दा पहिले पार्क अनुमति जारी गर्दैन। क्याफेनेट एल सोलले US$30 शुल्कमा रिजर्भेसन सेवा वा एक दिनको पासका लागि $10 का लागि प्रस्ताव गर्दछ। तिनीहरूको कोर्कोभाडो पृष्ठमा विवरण छ।
mt: Permits must be reserved in advance. You will need to spend the night in a serena. Serena is the only ranger station that provides good food other than dormitory accommodation and camping. La Leon, San Pedro and Las Patos offer only camping without food. Puerto Jimenez's ranger station can reserve park permits from there but they do not accept credit cards. Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than a month in advance of expected arrival. Cafe El Sol offers reservation service for $30 or a daily pass for $10. Details are on their website.
ref: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight at Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos offer only camping with no food service. It is possible to secure park permits directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of US$30, or $10 for one-day passes; details on their Corcovado page.

Details are on their website.
ref: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight at Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos offer only camping with no food service. It is possible to secure park permits directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of US$30, or $10 for one-day passes; details on their Corcovado page.

src: स्कीमार्फत ब्याकप्याकिङ: यो गतिविधिलाई ब्याककन्ट्री स्की, स्की टुरिङ वा स्की हाइकिङ पनि भनिन्छ। सामान्यतया अल्पाइन शैली स्की भ्रमण वा पर्वतारोहण समावेश नगरे पनि यो सम्बन्धित छ। पछिल्तिर ठाडो क्षेत्रमा र धेरै कडा स्की र बुटहरू आवश्यक हुन्छ। स्कीइङ मार्गलाई हाइकिङ मार्ग जस्तै समान रूपमा सोच्नुहोस्। राम्रा अवस्थाहरूमा तपाईं हिँड्नुभन्दा केही अधिक दूरी पार गर्न सक्षम हुनुहुनेछ, तर केवल धेरै बिरलै तपाईंले भारी ब्याकप्याक बिना तयार ट्र्याकहरूमा क्रस कन्ट्री स्कीइङको गति प्राप्त गर्न सक्नुहुनेछ।
mt: Backcountry skiing: This activity is also known as ski touring, ski trekking or ski mountaineering, unless alpine style ski touring or mountaineering is included. It requires steeper terrain and stiffer skis. Think of the ski route as a hiking route. In good conditions you can go further than you can hike, but only rarely can you ski a route without a heavy pack without crossing country skiing.
ref: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking. It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots. Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route. In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.

src: पुनः प्रवेश आघात संस्कृति आघातभन्दा चाँडो आउँदछ (हनिमुन चरण कम छ), लामो समयसम्म रहन्छ, र बढी गम्भीर हुनसक्छ। नयाँ संस्कृतिमा घुलमिल गर्न सजिलो समय भएको यात्रुहरूलाई कहिलेकाहीँ उनीहरूको मूल संस्कृतिमा पुनः घुलमिल गर्न गाह्रो हुन्छ। विदेशमा बसे पछि घर फर्कंदा तपाईं नयाँ संस्कृतिमा मिल्नु हुने र तपाईंको घरको संस्कृतिबाट केही बानीहरू हराउने छ। जब तपाईं पहिला विदेशमा जानुभयो, मानिसहरू शायद नयाँ देशका यात्रुहरूले अनुकूलित हुनुपर्दछ भनेर बुझेर धैर्यवान हुन्छन् र बुझ्दछन्। मानिसहरूले यो अनुमान गर्दैनन् कि घर फर्कने यात्रीहरूका लागि धैर्य र समझ पनि आवश्यक छन्।
mt: Reentry culture shock comes sooner than culture shock (shorter acclimation period), lasts longer, and can be more severe. New cultures are easier to acclimate to when you have been away for a long time. When you return home after being abroad, you will be mixing with a new culture and will lose some of your home culture. When you first went abroad, people may have been understanding that new travelers need to acclimate. People do not realize that homecoming travelers also need patience and understanding.
ref: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe. Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture. When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture. When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt. People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.

src: मुस (जसलाई एल्क पनि भनिन्छ) स्वाभाविक रूपमा आक्रामक हुँदैनन्, तर यदि उनीहरूलाई कुनै खतरा महसुस भयो भने आफूलाई बचाउनेछन्। जब मानिसले हिरणलाई सम्भावित खतराको रूपमा हेर्दैनन्, तिनीहरू धेरै नजिक पुगरे आफूलाई जोखिममा पार्न सक्छन्।
mt: (Which are also called elk) are not naturally aggressive, but if they feel threatened they will defend themselves. When humans don't perceive them as a potential threat, they can get very close before they realize they are in danger.
ref: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat. When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.

src: मुस (जसलाई एल्क पनि भनिन्छ) स्वाभाविक रूपमा आक्रामक हुँदैनन्, तर यदि उनीहरूलाई कुनै खतरा महसुस भयो भने आफूलाई बचाउनेछन्। जब मानिसले हिरणलाई सम्भावित खतराको रूपमा हेर्दैनन्, तिनीहरू धेरै नजिक पुगरे आफूलाई जोखिममा पार्न सक्छन्।
mt: (Which are also called elk) are not naturally aggressive, but if they feel threatened they will defend themselves. When humans don't perceive them as a potential threat, they can get very close before they realize they are in danger.
ref: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat. When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.

src: दिउँसोको गर्मीमा यात्रीहरूले पानीको जस्तो भ्रम (वा अन्य चीजहरू) दिने मिराजहरू अनुभव गर्न सक्छन्। बहुमूल्य उर्जा र बाँकी रहेको पानी खेर फाल्दै यात्रीहरू मृगकणका पछि लागे भने यी कुराहरू खतरनाक हुन सक्छन्। सबैभन्दा गर्मी मरुभूमि समेत रातमा धेरै चिसो हुन सक्छ। तातो लुगा बिना हाइपोथर्मिया साँच्चिकै जोखिम हो।
mt: Passengers can experience mirages (or other things) that look like water in the heat of the day.  Valuable energy and remaining water evaporate as passengers follow mirages.  If passengers follow mirages, these things can be dangerous.  Even the hottest deserts can be very cold at night.  Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.
ref: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things). These can be dangerous if the traveler pursue the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water. Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.

src: दिउँसोको गर्मीमा यात्रीहरूले पानीको जस्तो भ्रम (वा अन्य चीजहरू) दिने मिराजहरू अनुभव गर्न सक्छन्। बहुमूल्य उर्जा र बाँकी रहेको पानी खेर फाल्दै यात्रीहरू मृगकणका पछि लागे भने यी कुराहरू खतरनाक हुन सक्छन्। सबैभन्दा गर्मी मरुभूमि समेत रातमा धेरै चिसो हुन सक्छ। तातो लुगा बिना हाइपोथर्मिया साँच्चिकै जोखिम हो।

src: डोमिनिकन गणतन्त्र (स्पेनिस: रिपब्लिका डोमिनिकाना) एक क्यारेबियन देश हो जसले हिस्पेनियोला टापुको पूर्वी आधा भाग ओगटेको छ, जुन यसले हाइटीसँग साझा गर्दछ। सेतो बालुवाका तट र हिमालका परिदृष्यहरूका साथै, यो अमेरिकाहरूको सबैभन्दा पुरानो युरोपेली सहरको गृह हो, जुन हाल सान्टो डोमिङ्गोको एक हिस्सा हो। यस टापुमा पहिले टाइनोस र क्यारिबहरूले बसोबास गरेका थिए। क्यारिबहरू अरावाकान भाषा बोल्नेहरू थिए जो करिब 10,000 ईसापूर्वमा आएका थिए। यूरोपीयन अन्वेषकहरूको आगमनको केही थोरै वर्षहरूमा, स्पेनका योद्धाहरूले टेनोसको जनसङ्ख्या उल्लेखनीय रूपमा कम गरिसकेका थिए। फ्रे बार्टोलोम डे लास कासास (ट्राटाडो डे लास इन्डियास)को आधारमा 1492 र 1498को बिचमा स्पेनी विजेताहरूले लगभग 100,000 टाइनोस मारे।
mt: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern two-thirds of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti. Its area is 48,671 km² (18,808 sq mi), with a population of over 10 million. It is the second largest nation in the Antilles after Cuba. The capital city is Santo Domingo, the oldest continuously inhabited European settlement in the Americas and the site of the first cathedral, fortress, hospital and university in the New World. The country's first permanent settlement was founded in 1492 by Christopher Columbus, who was looking for a route to India. The colony was originally called La Isla Española, but was renamed Santo Domingo in 1496. The colony was the first seat of Spanish colonial government in the New World, and the first capital of the Spanish Empire. The colony was the first to establish a university, Seminario de Santo Tomás, in 1538. The colony was the first to establish a hospital, Hospital de San Nicolás de Bari, in 1503. The colony was the first to establish a fortress, Fortaleza de San Felipe, in 1504. The colony was the first to establish a university, Universidad de Santo Tomás, in 1538. The colony was the first to establish a fortress, Fortaleza de San Felipe, in 1504. The colony
ref: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti Besides white sand beaches and mountain landscapes, the country is home to the oldest European city in the Americas, now part of Santo Domingo. The island was first inhabited by the Taínos and Caribes. The Caribes were an Arawakan-speaking people who had arrived around 10,000 BCE. Within a few short years following the arrival of European explorers, the population of Tainos had significantly been reduced by the Spanish conquerors Based on Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) between 1492 and 1498 the Spanish conquerors killed around 100,000 Taínos.

src: स्की वा खुट्टामा स्नोबोर्ड समावेश गरेर हिउँले ढाकिएको क्षेत्रमा तल झर्ने डाउनहिल स्नोस्पोर्ट्समा स्किङ र स्नोबोर्डिङ लोकप्रिय खेलहरू हुन्‌। बिदाको पूरै दिन निश्चित स्थानमा रहेर स्काइङ गर्ने योजना बनाउने र “स्काइ बम” भनेर चिनिने उत्साहीहरूका लागि स्काइङ एक प्रमुख यात्रा गतिविधि हो। स्कीइङको धारण धेरै पुरानो हो - स्कीयरको चित्रण गरिएका गुफा चित्रहरू 5000 ईसापूर्वसम्मका भेटिन्छन्। डाउनहिल स्कीइङ खेल कम्तीमा 17औं शताब्दीदेखि खेलिदै आइएको छ र सन् 1861 मा अष्ट्रेलियामा नर्वेलीहरूले पहिलो स्की क्लब खोलेका थिए।
mt: Downhill skiing and snowboarding are popular sports in areas where there is snow cover. For those who plan to ski on a specific slope for the entire day, and for the enthusiastic who are known as "ski bums", downhill skiing is a major recreational activity. Skiing has been depicted in cave paintings dating back to 5000 BC. Downhill skiing has been played since at least the 17th century and the first ski club was opened in Australia in 1861 by Norwegians.
ref: "Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet. Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as ""ski bums,"" planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location. The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC! Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia."

src: पूर्वी अफ्रीकी टापु हिन्द महासागरको अफ्रिकाको पूर्वी तटमा छ। वन्यजन्तुहरूका लागि माडागास्कर सबैभन्दा ठूलो र आफैँमा एक महाद्वीप हो। धेरै जस्ता साना टापुहरू स्वतन्त्र राष्ट्रहरू हुन् वा फ्रान्ससँग सम्बन्धित छन् र विलासीबिच रिसोर्टका रूपमा परिचित छन्। अरबहरूले इस्लामलाई भूमिमा ल्याए र यो कोमोरोज र मेयोट्टमा ठूलो मात्रामा फैलियो। 15औँ शताब्दीमा युरोपेली प्रभाव र उपनिवेशवाद सुरु भयो, जब पोर्चुगाली खोजकर्ता भास्को डि गामाले युरोपदेखि भारतसम्म केप रुट पत्ता लगाए।
mt: Eastern Africa  is a region of the  African continent  comprising the easternmost part of the continent.  Madagascar  is the largest island off the eastern coast of Africa, and is separated from the mainland by the  Mozambique Channel.  Many small islands are scattered off the east coast, including the  Comoros  and  Mayotte  which are of major importance to the  Arab world  as the home of the  Comoros  and  Mayotte  which are of major importance to the  Arab world  as the home of the  Comoros  and  Mayotte  which are of major importance to the  Arab world  as the home of the  Comoros  and  Mayotte  which are of major importance to the  Arab world  as the home of the  Comoros  and  Mayotte  which are of major importance to the  Arab world  as the home of the  Comoros  and  Mayotte  which are of major importance to the  Arab world  as the home of the  Comoros  and  Mayotte  which are of major importance to the  Arab world  as the home of the  Comoros  and  Mayotte  which are of major importance to the  Arab world  as the home of the  Comoros  and  Mayotte  which are of major importance to the  Arab world  as the home of the  Comoros  and  Mayotte  which are of major importance to the  Arab world  as the home of the  Comoros  and  Mayotte  which are of major importance to the  Arab world  as the home of the  Comoros  and  Mayotte  which are of major importance to the  Arab world  as the home of the  Comoros  and  Mayotte  which are of major importance to the  Arab world  as the home of the  Comoros  and  Mayotte  which are of major importance to the  Arab world  as the home of the  Comoros  and  Mayotte  which are of major importance to the  Arab world  as the home of the  Comoros  and  Mayotte  which are of major importance to the  Arab world  as the home of the  Comoros  and  Mayotte  which are of major importance to the  Arab world  as the home of the  Comoros  and  Mayotte
ref: The East African Islands are in the Indian Ocean off the eastern coast of Africa. Madagascar is by far the biggest, and a continent on its own when it comes to wildlife. Most of the smaller islands are independent nations, or associated with France, and known as luxury beach resorts. The Arabs also brought Islam to the lands, and it took in a big way in the Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, as Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found the Cape Route from Europe to India.

src: सूर्योदय हेर्नका लागि इस्टरको रात जागा रहेर उक्त सुर्योदय विशेष बिन्दुमा हेर्ने परम्परा छ। त्यहाँ निश्चय नै यो परम्पराको लागि क्रिस्चियन आस्थिक व्याख्याहरू छन्, तर यो पूर्व-क्रिश्चियन वसन्त र प्रजनन रीति हुन सक्छ। धेरै परम्परागत चर्चहरूले प्रायः इस्टर सप्‍ताहको अन्त्यमा शनिबार राती इस्टर प्रार्थना आयोजना गर्दछन्, जसमा मण्डलीहरूले ख्रीष्टको पुनरुत्थानलाई मनाउन ठ्याक्कै मध्यराति उत्सव गर्दछन्।
mt: People have been getting up early to see the sunrise on Easter Sunday. There are certainly Christian interpretations of this tradition, but it could also be a pre-Christian fertility rite. Many traditional churches hold Easter Vigils on the Saturday night before Easter, where the congregation celebrates Christ's resurrection at exactly midnight.
ref: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise. There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual. More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.

src: रात परेपछि र कम व्यस्त क्षेत्रहरूमा मूल्य बढ्छ। ट्याक्सीहरू भेट्टाउन सजिलो हुन्छ; ती सबै मुख्य सडकहरूको नजिक पार्क गरिएका हुन्छन् र तिनमा भाडा-मिटर प्रयोग गरिएको हुन्छ। इक्वेडरियाको विदेश मामिला मन्त्रालयले यो पत्र वैध हुनु पर्छ र केहि आवश्यकताहरूको पालना गर्नुहोस्। दुवै देशहरूबिच संगठित प्रवासी प्रवाह प्रदान गर्न यी आवश्यकताहरू तोकिएको हो। यूएसको ग्रीन कार्डधारी क्युवाली नागरिकहरूले यस शर्तमा छुट पाउन इक्वेडरियाको वाणिज्य दूतावास भ्रमण गर्नु पर्छ। तपाईंको पासपोर्ट कम्तीमा तपाईंको यात्रा मितिभन्दा 6 महिनाका लागि मान्य हुनुपर्दछ। जाने-आउने/अगाडिको यात्रा टिकट तपाईंको बसाईको लम्बाई प्रमाणित गर्न आवश्यक हुन्छ।
mt: 1. At night and in less busy areas, prices go up. Taxis are easy to find; all are parked near main roads and have meters. The Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs has this letter valid and you must comply with some requirements. These requirements are established to provide organized flows of migration between the two countries. U.S. green card holders can visit the Ecuadorian consulate in this condition. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months after your travel date. Your round-trip ticket must prove the length of your stay.
ref: Ecuador requires that Cuban citizens receive an invitation letter prior to entering Ecuador through international airports or frontier admission points. This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and comply with certain requirements. These requirements are designed to provide an organized migratory flow between both countries. Cuban citizens who are US green card holders should visit an Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption to this requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel dates. A round/onward trip ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay.

src: चश्माहरू विदेशमा सस्ता हुन सक्छन्, विशेषगरी कम आय भएका देशहरूमा जहाँ श्रम लागत कम हुन्छन्। विशेष गरी बीमाले यसलाई समेटेको छ र प्रिस्क्रिप्सनलाई अन्य ठाउँमा पेश गर्नका लागि घरमै आँखाको जाँच गर्ने बारे सोच्नुहोस्‌। केहि नक अफ हुन सक्छन्‌ र वास्तविक आयातितहरू घरभन्दा बढी महँगो हुन सक्ने हुनाले त्यस्ता क्षेत्रमा उपलब्ध उच्च अन्तको ब्रान्डका नाम फ्रेममा दुई समस्या हुन सक्छ।
mt: Glasses can be cheaper abroad, especially in low-income countries where labor costs are lower. Consider prescribing them for use elsewhere and checking the eyes at home. There may be knockoffs and the imported ones may be more expensive than at home, so there are two problems in that area.
ref: Eyeglasses can be cheaper in a foreign country, especially in low-income countries where labour costs are lower. Consider getting an eye exam at home, especially if insurance covers it, and bringing the prescription along to be filed elsewhere. High-end brand-name frames available in such areas may have two problems; some may be knock-offs, and the real imported ones may be more expensive than at home.

src: एक ब्रिटिश पाउन्ड (GBP)को बराबर मूल्य सेट गरिएको आधिकारिक फल्कल्यान्ड मुद्रा फल्कल्यान्ड पाउन्ड (FKP) हो। FIC वेस्ट स्टोरको स्ट्यान्लीमा अवस्थित टापुहरूमा रहेको बैंकमा मात्र पैसा विनिमय गर्न सकिन्छ। प्राय: टापुहरूमा ब्रिटिश पाउन्डहरू स्वीकृत हुन्छन् र स्टानको क्रेडिट कार्ड र संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिकाको डलर स्वीकार गरिन्छ। ब्रिटिस र संयुक्त राज्यको मुद्रा लिएको भए तापनि टाढाका टापुहरूमा क्रेडिट कार्डहरू सम्भवतः स्वीकार्य नहुन सक्छन्; स्वीकार्य भुक्तानी विधि के हो भनी निर्धारण गर्न मालिकसँग अग्रिम रूपमा कुरा गर्नुहोस्। टापु बाहिर फाल्कल्यान्ड मुद्रा विनिमय गर्न लगभग असम्भव हुनाले टापु छोड्नअघि पैसाको आदान प्रदान गर्नुहोस्।
mt: 1 British pound (GBP) is the official Falkland Islands currency, the Falkland pound (FKP). FIC West Store is located in Stanley, the capital. Only money can be exchanged at the bank. British pounds are usually accepted and credit cards from the United Kingdom and the United States are accepted. If you bring British or American currency, credit cards may not be accepted at remote islands; please inquire with the owner about the accepted payment method. It is almost impossible to exchange Falkland Islands currency outside the islands, so exchange money before leaving the islands.
ref: The official Falklands currency is the Falkland pound (FKP) whose value is set equivalent to that of one British pound (GBP). Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store. British pounds will generally be accepted anywhere in the islands and within Stanley credit cards and United States dollars are also often accepted. On the outlying islands credit cards will probably not be accepted, although British and United States currency may be taken; check with the owners in advance to determine what is an acceptable payment method. It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.

src: एक ब्रिटिश पाउन्ड (GBP)को बराबर मूल्य सेट गरिएको आधिकारिक फल्कल्यान्ड मुद्रा फल्कल्यान्ड पाउन्ड (FKP) हो। FIC वेस्ट स्टोरको स्ट्यान्लीमा अवस्थित टापुहरूमा रहेको बैंकमा मात्र पैसा विनिमय गर्न सकिन्छ। प्राय: टापुहरूमा ब्रिटिश पाउन्डहरू स्वीकृत हुन्छन् र स्टानको क्रेडिट कार्ड र संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिकाको डलर स्वीकार गरिन्छ। ब्रिटिस र संयुक्त राज्यको मुद्रा लिएको भए तापनि टाढाका टापुहरूमा क्रेडिट कार्डहरू सम्भवतः स्वीकार्य नहुन सक्छन्; स्वीकार्य भुक्तानी विधि के हो भनी निर्धारण गर्न मालिकसँग अग्रिम रूपमा कुरा गर्नुहोस्। टापु बाहिर फाल्कल्यान्ड मुद्रा विनिमय गर्न लगभग असम्भव हुनाले टापु छोड्नअघि पैसाको आदान प्रदान गर्नुहोस्।
mt: 1 British pound (GBP) is the official Falkland Islands currency, the Falkland pound (FKP). FIC West Store is located in Stanley, the capital. Only money can be exchanged at the bank. British pounds are usually accepted and credit cards from the United Kingdom and the United States are accepted. If you bring British or American currency, credit cards may not be accepted at remote islands; please inquire with the owner about the accepted payment method. It is almost impossible to exchange Falkland Islands currency outside the islands, so exchange money before leaving the islands.
ref: The official Falklands currency is the Falkland pound (FKP) whose value is set equivalent to that of one British pound (GBP). Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store. British pounds will generally be accepted anywhere in the islands and within Stanley credit cards and United States dollars are also often accepted. On the outlying islands credit cards will probably not be accepted, although British and United States currency may be taken; check with the owners in advance to determine what is an acceptable payment method. It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.

src: मन्दिरको वार्षिक चाडपर्व नोभेम्बर अन्त्यदेखि मेको मध्यसम्म हुन्छ। प्रत्येक मन्दिरको वार्षिक पात्रो फरक हुन्छ। मन्दिरको वार्षिकोत्सवको रूपमा होस्‌ वा देवताका जन्मदिन होस्‌ वा मन्दिरसँग सम्बन्धित कुनै अन्य प्रमुख कार्यक्रमहरूको रूपमा मन्दिरमा चाडपर्वहरू मनाइन्छ। सुसज्जित हात्तीहरू, मन्दिरका वादकदल तथा अन्य उत्सवहरूसहितको नियमित लावालस्करले गर्दा केरलाका मन्दिरमा हुने मेलाहरू अवलोकन गर्न धेरै रमाईलो हुन्छ।
mt: The annual festival of the temple is held from November end to mid-March. The annual festival of the temple may be in the form of a temple festival or the birth day of the deity or any other major event related to the temple. The regular processions of decorated elephants, temple orchestra and other festivities make the temple festivals in Kerala very colourful to watch.
ref: Most of the temples do have an Annual festival starting from November end to Mid of May, which varies according to each temple's annual calendar. Most of the temple festivals is celebrated as part of temple's anniversary or presiding deity's birthday or any other major event associated with the temple. Kerala's temple festivals are very interesting to see, with regular procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestra and other festivities.

src: पहिलो वा व्यवसायिक वर्गमा उडानको स्पष्ट तरीका भनेको सुअवसरको मोटा रकम बनाउनु हो (वा अझ राम्रो, तपाईंको कम्पनीले तपाईंलाई यो गर्न लगाउछ)। यद्यपि यो सस्तोमा आउँदैनः अनुभव सिद्ध नियमका रूपमा तपाईंले बिजिनेसका लागि सामान्य इकोनोमी भाडाभन्दा चार गुणा बढी र पहिलो श्रेणीका लागि एघार गुणासम्म तिर्ने आशा गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ। सामान्यतया भन्नुपर्दा, A देखि B सम्म सीधा उडानमा, बिजनेस वा प्रथम श्रेणीको सिटहरूका लागि छुट खोज्नु बेकार हुनेछ। छिटो र आरामदायी हुने सुविधाका लागि शीर्ष डलर तिर्न इच्छुक फ्लायरहरूको एक निश्चित कोर समूह छ र त्यस हिसाबले चार्ज गर्छ भन्ने एयरलाइन्सलाई राम्रोसँग थाहा छ।
mt: 1st or business class is the obvious way to get a fat wad of cash (or, better yet, your company will pay for it). However, this is not cheap: as a rule of thumb, you can expect to pay four times the standard economy fare for business class and eleven times for first class. As a general rule, A to B direct, business or first class, you will not find a cheaper way to get there quickly and comfortably. There is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the convenience of a top dollar airline, and they know it.
ref: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you). However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class! Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.

src: इमिरेट्स, इतिहाद एयरवेज, कतार एयरवेज र टर्की एयरलाइन्स जस्ता एयरलाइन्सले अफ्रिकामा आफ्नो सेवाहरूको विस्तार गरेको छ र धेरै प्रमुख अफ्रिकी शहरहरूमा अन्य यूरोपीयन एयरलाइन्सको तुलनामा प्रतिस्पर्धी दरहरूमा उडान प्रदान गर्छ। 2014 सम्म टर्कीज एयरलाइन्सले 30 अफ्रिकी देशहरूका 39 गन्तव्यहरूमा उडान गर्छ। तपाईंसँग यात्रा गर्नका लागि अतिरिक्त समय छ भने तपाईंलाई विश्व वरिपरि घुम्ने भाडाको तुलनामा अफ्रीकामा जान लाग्ने कुल भाँडा दर कति छ भनेर जाँच्नुहोस्। अफ्रिका बाहिरका ती सबै स्थानहरूका लागि अतिरिक्त प्रवेशाज्ञा, प्रस्थान कर, स्थल यातायात, आदिका अतिरिक्त लागतहरूमा थप्न नबिर्सनुहोस्।
mt: Emirate, Etihad, Qatar Airways, and Turkish Airlines have expanded their services in Africa and offer competitive fares to many major African cities compared to other European airlines. By 2014, Turkish Airlines will fly to 39 destinations in 30 African countries. Check out the additional travel time for you to travel to these places compared to the total cost of the fare to tour the world. Do not add additional entry fees, departure tax, site transportation, etc. to these places.
ref: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines have greatly expanded their services to Africa, and offer connections to many major African cities at competitive rates than other European airlines. Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries as of 2014. If you have additional travel time, check to see how your total fare quote to Africa compares with a round-the-world fare. Don't forget to add in the extra costs of additional visas, departure taxes, ground transportation, etc. for all those places outside of Africa.

src: सुपरमार्केटमा खाना किन्नु प्राय: खाना पाउनु सस्तो तरिका हो। पकाउने अवसरहरू बिना, विकल्पहरू यद्यपि तयारी खानासम्म सीमित हुन्छन्। बढ्दै गरेका सुपरमार्केटहरूले तयारी खानाका थप विविध खण्ड राखिरहेका छन्। केहीले त खाना तताउन माइक्रोवेव ओभन वा अन्य साधनहरू पनि उपलब्ध गराउँछन्। केही देशहरू वा केही प्रकारका स्टोरहरूमा कम्तिमा एक साइटमा रहेको रेस्टुरेन्ट हुन्छ, जुन प्राय:जसो सस्तो मूल्यका साथ एक अनौपचारिक रूपको हुन्छ।
mt: Supermarkets are often the cheapest way to buy food. Without cooking facilities, however, options are limited. Increasingly, supermarkets are offering more prepared foods. Some even offer microwaves or other appliances to heat them. In some countries or some types of stores, there is at least one restaurant on site, which is usually informal and cheap.
ref: Buying food in supermarkets is usually the cheapest way to get fed. Without cooking opportunities, choices are however limited to ready-made food. Increasingly supermarkets are getting a more varied section of ready-made food. Some even provide a microwave oven or other means to heat food. In some countries or types of stores there is at least one on-site restaurant, often a rather informal one with affordable prices.

src: बेल्जियम र स्विजरल्याण्डमा बोल्ने फ्रेन्चका प्रजातिहरू फ्रान्समा बोल्ने फ्रेन्च तिनीहरू आपसी सुगम हुन सक्ने समान भए तापनि थोरै फरक छन्। विशेष गरी, फ्रान्समा बोल्ने फ्रेन्चभन्दा फ्रेन्च भाषी बेल्जियम र स्विजरल्याण्डमा संख्या प्रणालीको केही हल्का भिन्न छ र केही शब्दहरूको उच्चारण केही फरक छ। तथापि, सबै फ्रान्सेली बोल्ने बेल्जियन र स्विसले विद्यालयहरूमा मानक फ्रान्सेली सिकेका हुन्थे, ताकि तपाईंले मानक फ्रान्सेली सङ्ख्या प्रणाली प्रयोग गर्नुभएको भए तापनि तिनीहरू तपाईंलाई बुझ्न सक्षम हुन सकून्।
mt: French speakers in Belgium and Switzerland speak French in France, but they are not identical. In particular, the number system is slightly different in French in France than in French in Belgium and Switzerland, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different. However, all French speakers in Belgium and Switzerland had learned standard French in school, so if you use the standard French number system, they will be able to understand you.
ref: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible. In particular, the numbering system in French-speaking Belgium and Switzerland has some slight peculiarities that are different from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different. Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
