src: केही एयरलाइन्सहरूले मात्र अझै शोक भाडा प्रदान गर्छन्, जसले अन्तिम मिनेटको अन्त्येष्टि यात्राको लागत थोरै छुट दिन्छ। यी प्रस्ताव गर्ने एयरलाइन्सहरूमा एयर क्यानडा, डेल्टा एयर लाइन्स, अमेरिका वा क्यानडाबाट सुरु हुने उडानका लागि लुफ्थहान्सा र वेस्टजेट समावेश छन्। सबै अवस्थाहरूमा, तपाईंले फोन मार्फत सिधै एयरलाइन्सँग बुक गर्नु पर्दछ।
mt: Some airlines are still offering bereavement fares, which are a small discount off the cost of a last-minute funeral trip. Airlines offering these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, you must book directly with the airline by phone.
ref: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel. Airlines that offer these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.

src: केही एयरलाइन्सहरूले मात्र अझै शोक भाडा प्रदान गर्छन्, जसले अन्तिम मिनेटको अन्त्येष्टि यात्राको लागत थोरै छुट दिन्छ। यी प्रस्ताव गर्ने एयरलाइन्सहरूमा एयर क्यानडा, डेल्टा एयर लाइन्स, अमेरिका वा क्यानडाबाट सुरु हुने उडानका लागि लुफ्थहान्सा र वेस्टजेट समावेश छन्। सबै अवस्थाहरूमा, तपाईंले फोन मार्फत सिधै एयरलाइन्सँग बुक गर्नु पर्दछ।
mt: Some airlines are still offering bereavement fares, which are a small discount off the cost of a last-minute funeral trip. Airlines offering these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, you must book directly with the airline by phone.
ref: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel. Airlines that offer these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.

src: तपाईं देशबाट बाहिर भएका बेला नेभिगेट गर्ने सबैभन्दा सजिलो र सुविधाजनक तरिका तपाईंको स्मार्टफोनका GPS नेभिगेसन अनुप्रयोगहरू प्रयोग गर्नु हो। यसले GPS का लागि नयाँ नक्सा किन्ने वा GPS उपकरण किन्ने वा कार भाडा कम्पनीबाट GPS भाडामा लिन लाग्ने पैसा बचत गर्न सक्दछ। यदि तपाईंसँग आफ्नो फोनका लागि डाटा जडान छैन भने वा यो दायराभन्दा बाहिर हुँदा, तिनीहरूको प्रदर्शन सीमित वा अनुपलब्ध हुन सक्छ।
mt: The easiest and most convenient way to navigate while you are abroad is to use your smartphone's GPS navigation apps. This can save you money on buying maps for GPS, buying a GPS device, or renting a car from a GPS rental company. If you don't have data for your phone or you are outside of this range, their display may be limited or unavailable.
ref: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when out of your home country. It can save money over buying new maps for a GPS, or a standalone GPS device or renting one from a car rental company. If you don't have a data connection for your phone, or when it is out of range, their performance can be limited or unavailable.

src: गालापागोसको ठाउँ र वन्यजन्तुहरू हेर्दा, डुंगामा राम्रो काम गरिएको छ, चार्ल्स डार्विनले 1835मा यस्तो गरेका थिए। 8 देखि 100 यात्रुसम्म आकारको दायरा भएका 60भन्दा बढी क्रूज जहाजहरू गलापागोस पानीमा यात्रा गर्दछन्। धेरै मानिसहरूले आफ्नो ठाँउ पहिला नै बुक गर्दछन् (किनभने डुङ्गा प्रायः चल्तिको मौसममा भरिन्छन्)। आफूले जुन एजेन्टका माध्यमबाट बुक गर्नुहुन्छ उक्त एजेन्ट विभिन्न प्रकारका जहाजहरूबारे राम्रो ज्ञान भएका ग्यालापागोस विशेषज्ञ हुन् भन्ने कुराको सुनिश्चित गर्नुहोस्। यसले निश्चित गर्दछ कि तपाईंका विशेष रुचिहरू र वा सीमितताहरू उनीहरूका लागि सबैभन्दा उपयुक्त जहाजका साथ मिलेका छन्।
mt: In the Galapagos, where Darwin first visited in 1835, good work is being done. Sixty or more cruise ships, each carrying up to 100 passengers, sail the Galapagos waters. Many people book their destination in advance (as the Dunga is often full in the busy season). Make sure that the agent you book through is a Galapagos expert who knows about different types of ships. This ensures that your particular interests or limitations are matched with the most suitable ship.
ref: Seeing the sites and wildlife of the Galapagos is best done by boat, just as Charles Darwin did it in 1835. Over 60 cruise ships ply the Galapagos waters - ranging in size from 8 to 100 passengers. Most people book their place well in advance (as the boats are usually full during the high season). Be sure the agent through whom you book is a Galapagos specialist with a good knowledge of a wide variety of ships. This will ensure that your particular interests and/or constraints are matched with the ship most suitable to them.

src: प्रायः समय र पैसा पाहुनाहरू खर्च गर्ने अधिकतम बनाउन धेरै क्यासिनोले प्रयास गर्छन्। झ्याल र घडीहरू प्राय राखिएका हुनन्‌ र बाहिर निस्कन गाह्रो हुन सक्छ। अतिथिहरूलाई राम्रो मुडमा राख्नका लागि र तिनीहरूलाई प्रीमियममा राख्नका लागि उनीहरूसँग प्राय: विशेष खाना, पेय र मनोरन्जनका कार्यहरू हुन्छन्। केही स्थानहरूले घरमा मादक पेय पदार्थहरू प्रदान गर्छन्। यद्यपि मतवालापनले न्यायलाई बाधा पुर्‍याउँछ र सबै राम्रा जुवाडेहरूले शान्त रहनुको महत्त्व जान्दछन्।
mt: Most casinos try to maximize the time and money spent by their patrons. Clocks and watches are usually kept running and it is difficult to leave. Guests are usually kept in good humor and they are usually kept in premium by special food, drink and entertainment. Some places provide alcoholic beverages at home. However, gambling interferes with the law and all good gamblers know the importance of keeping calm.
ref: Casinos typically make many efforts to maximize time and money spent by guests. Windows and clocks are usually absent, and exits can be hard to find. They usually have special food, drink and entertainment offers, to keep guests in a good mood, and keep them at the premise. Some venues offer alcoholic beverages on the house. However, drunkenness impairs judgement, and all good gamblers know the importance of staying sober.

src: प्रायः समय र पैसा पाहुनाहरू खर्च गर्ने अधिकतम बनाउन धेरै क्यासिनोले प्रयास गर्छन्। झ्याल र घडीहरू प्राय राखिएका हुनन्‌ र बाहिर निस्कन गाह्रो हुन सक्छ। अतिथिहरूलाई राम्रो मुडमा राख्नका लागि र तिनीहरूलाई प्रीमियममा राख्नका लागि उनीहरूसँग प्राय: विशेष खाना, पेय र मनोरन्जनका कार्यहरू हुन्छन्। केही स्थानहरूले घरमा मादक पेय पदार्थहरू प्रदान गर्छन्। यद्यपि मतवालापनले न्यायलाई बाधा पुर्‍याउँछ र सबै राम्रा जुवाडेहरूले शान्त रहनुको महत्त्व जान्दछन्।

ref: Casinos typically make many efforts to maximize time and money spent by guests. Windows and clocks are usually absent, and exits can be hard to find. They usually have special food, drink and entertainment offers, to keep guests in a good mood, and keep them at the premise. Some venues offer alcoholic beverages on the house. src: तपाईंका लागि सिए शब्द सँगसँगै वाक्यको बीचमा पनि सबै नामहरू सधैँ ठूलो अक्षरबाट सुरु हुन्छ। यो कुनै क्रिया र कर्मबीच फरक छुट्याउने एक महत्त्वपूर्ण तरिका हो। यसले यथोचित रूपमा पढ्न सजिलो पनि बनाउँदछ, यद्यपि लेखनमा केही क्रिया वा विशेषण प्रयोग गरिएको छ वा छैन भन्ने कुरा पत्ता लगाउनका लागि आवश्यक छ।
mt: For you, all names in a sentence are always capitalized. This is an important way to distinguish between verbs and nouns. It also makes it easier to read, although it is necessary to know whether a verb or adjective is used or not.
ref: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects. It also arguably makes reading easier, though writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or adjective is used in a substantivized form.

src: तपाईंका लागि सिए शब्द सँगसँगै वाक्यको बीचमा पनि सबै नामहरू सधैँ ठूलो अक्षरबाट सुरु हुन्छ। यो कुनै क्रिया र कर्मबीच फरक छुट्याउने एक महत्त्वपूर्ण तरिका हो। यसले यथोचित रूपमा पढ्न सजिलो पनि बनाउँदछ, यद्यपि लेखनमा केही क्रिया वा विशेषण प्रयोग गरिएको छ वा छैन भन्ने कुरा पत्ता लगाउनका लागि आवश्यक छ।

src: विश्वका धेरै भागहरूमा, हात हल्लाउनु मित्रताको इशारा हो, जसले “हेलो” सङ्केत गर्दछ। यद्यपि मलेसियामा, कम्तिमा ग्रामीण इलाकामा मलेहरूमा, यसको अर्थ “भेट्न आउ” भन्ने हुन्छ, शरीरतर्फ चोर औँला झुकाइएको जस्तै, एक इशारा जुन केही पश्चिमी देशहरूमा प्रयोग गरिन्छ र त्यही उद्देश्यका लागि मात्र प्रयोग गरिनुपर्दछ। त्यस्तै, स्पेनका बेलायती यात्रीले हात हल्लाउने व्यक्तितर्फ हत्केला फर्काएर (बिदाई गरिएको व्यक्तितर्फ फर्काउनुको सट्टा) बिदाई भनिएकोलाई फर्केर आउने इशारा सोच्न सक्छन्।
mt: In many parts of the world, waving goodbye is a sign of friendship, indicating "hello". However, in Malaysia, at least in rural areas, this means "come and get me", with the hand held palm down, like a chopping motion, an action used in some Western countries only for this purpose. Thus, a British tourist in Spain may interpret a wave as a sign to "come back" (the opposite of a wave, indicating departure).
ref: "In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating ""hello."" However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means ""come over,"" similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose. Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back."

src: विश्वका धेरै भागहरूमा, हात हल्लाउनु मित्रताको इशारा हो, जसले “हेलो” सङ्केत गर्दछ। यद्यपि मलेसियामा, कम्तिमा ग्रामीण इलाकामा मलेहरूमा, यसको अर्थ “भेट्न आउ” भन्ने हुन्छ, शरीरतर्फ चोर औँला झुकाइएको जस्तै, एक इशारा जुन केही पश्चिमी देशहरूमा प्रयोग गरिन्छ र त्यही उद्देश्यका लागि मात्र प्रयोग गरिनुपर्दछ। त्यस्तै, स्पेनका बेलायती यात्रीले हात हल्लाउने व्यक्तितर्फ हत्केला फर्काएर (बिदाई गरिएको व्यक्तितर्फ फर्काउनुको सट्टा) बिदाई भनिएकोलाई फर्केर आउने इशारा सोच्न सक्छन्।

However, in Malaysia, at least in rural areas, this means "come and get me", with the hand held palm down, like a chopping motion, an action used in some Western countries only for this purpose. Thus, a British tourist in Spain may interpret a wave as a sign to "come back" (the opposite of a wave, indicating departure).
ref: "In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating ""hello."" However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means ""come over,"" similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose. Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back."

src: हिमनदी स्थिर छैनन्, तर पहाडबाट तल बग्दछन्। यसले चिराहरू, हिमदरारहरू पैदा गर्नेछ, जुन हिउँ पुलहरूद्वारा रोकिन सक्दछ। हिमगुफाहरूका भित्ता र छतहरू ढल्न सक्छन् र चिराहरू बन्द हुन सक्छन्। हिमनदीको किनारका विशाल ब्लकहरू छुट्टिन थाल्छन्, तल झर्छन् र सायद गुड्दै किनारबाट अझै धेरै तल पुग्छन्।
mt: Glaciers are not static, but flow downhill. This will create crevasses, icefalls that can be stopped by snow fences. Walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and crevasses can form. Large blocks of ice break off the edge of glaciers, fall down and may fall even further from the edge of the glacier.
ref: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This will cause cracks, crevasses, which may be obscured by snow bridges. The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can get closed. At the edge of glaciers huge blocks break loose, fall down and perhaps jump or roll farther from the edge.

src: हिमनदी स्थिर छैनन्, तर पहाडबाट तल बग्दछन्। यसले चिराहरू, हिमदरारहरू पैदा गर्नेछ, जुन हिउँ पुलहरूद्वारा रोकिन सक्दछ। हिमगुफाहरूका भित्ता र छतहरू ढल्न सक्छन् र चिराहरू बन्द हुन सक्छन्। हिमनदीको किनारका विशाल ब्लकहरू छुट्टिन थाल्छन्, तल झर्छन् र सायद गुड्दै किनारबाट अझै धेरै तल पुग्छन्।
mt: Glaciers are not static, but flow downhill. This will create crevasses, icefalls that can be stopped by snow fences. Walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and crevasses can form. Large blocks of ice break off the edge of glaciers, fall down and may fall even further from the edge of the glacier.
ref: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This will cause cracks, crevasses, which may be obscured by snow bridges. The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can get closed. At the edge of glaciers huge blocks break loose, fall down and perhaps jump or roll farther from the edge.

src: गोमा रवान्डाको निकट पूर्वमा रहेको प्रजातान्त्रिक गणतन्त्र कङ्गोको पर्यटकीय सहर हो। 2002 मा निरागोन्गो ज्वालामुखीबाट निस्केको लाभाले गोमालाई ध्वस्त पारेको थियो जसले गर्दा सहरको अधिकांश सडकहरू विशेष गरी सहरको केन्द्र पुरियो। गोमा यथोचित सुरक्षित भए तापनि गोमा बाहिरका कुनै पनि भ्रमणहरूमा उत्तरी किभु प्रान्तमा रहेको संघर्षको अवस्था बुझ्न अनुसन्धान गर्नु पर्छ। यो सहर अफ्रिकाको सबैभन्दा सस्तो माउन्टेन गोरिल्ला ट्र्याकिङको साथै निराङ्गोङ्गो ज्वालामुखी चढ्नका लागि आधार पनि हो। तपाईं गोमाको छेउछाउमा जान बोडा-बोडा (मोटरसाइकल ट्याक्सी) प्रयोग गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ। सामान्य (स्थानीय) मूल्य छोटो दूरीको सवारीका लागि ~500 कंगोको फ्रान्क्स हो।
mt: Goma is a tourist city in the Democratic Republic of the Congo, east of Rwanda. In 2002, the benefits of the eruption of Mount Nyiragongo destroyed Goma, most of its roads, especially in the center of the city. Goma is relatively safe, but any excursions outside Goma should be investigated for the state of the conflict in the northern province of Kivu. This city is the cheapest mountain gorilla tracking in Africa, as well as the base for climbing Mount Nyiragongo. You can use a Boda-Boda (motorcycle taxi) around Goma. The general (local) price of a short ride is ~500 Congolese francs.
ref: Goma is a tourist city of the Democratic Republic of Congo in the extreme east near Rwanda. In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which buried most of the town’s streets, particularly the town centre. While Goma is reasonably safe, any visits outside of Goma should be researched to understand the state of the fighting that persists in the North Kivu province. The city is also the base to climb the Nyiragongo volcano along with some of the cheapest Mountain Gorilla tracking in Africa. You can use boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to get around Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese Francs for the short ride.

src: गोमा रवान्डाको निकट पूर्वमा रहेको प्रजातान्त्रिक गणतन्त्र कङ्गोको पर्यटकीय सहर हो। 2002 मा निरागोन्गो ज्वालामुखीबाट निस्केको लाभाले गोमालाई ध्वस्त पारेको थियो जसले गर्दा सहरको अधिकांश सडकहरू विशेष गरी सहरको केन्द्र पुरियो। गोमा यथोचित सुरक्षित भए तापनि गोमा बाहिरका कुनै पनि भ्रमणहरूमा उत्तरी किभु प्रान्तमा रहेको संघर्षको अवस्था बुझ्न अनुसन्धान गर्नु पर्छ। यो सहर अफ्रिकाको सबैभन्दा सस्तो माउन्टेन गोरिल्ला ट्र्याकिङको साथै निराङ्गोङ्गो ज्वालामुखी चढ्नका लागि आधार पनि हो। तपाईं गोमाको छेउछाउमा जान बोडा-बोडा (मोटरसाइकल ट्याक्सी) प्रयोग गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ। सामान्य (स्थानीय) मूल्य छोटो दूरीको सवारीका लागि ~500 कंगोको फ्रान्क्स हो।
mt: Goma is a tourist city in the Democratic Republic of the Congo, east of Rwanda. In 2002, the benefits of the eruption of Mount Nyiragongo destroyed Goma, most of its roads, especially in the center of the city. Goma is relatively safe, but any excursions outside Goma should be investigated for the state of the conflict in the northern province of Kivu. This city is the cheapest mountain gorilla tracking in Africa, as well as the base for climbing Mount Nyiragongo. You can use a Boda-Boda (motorcycle taxi) around Goma. The general (local) price of a short ride is ~500 Congolese francs.
ref: Goma is a tourist city of the Democratic Republic of Congo in the extreme east near Rwanda. In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which buried most of the town’s streets, particularly the town centre. While Goma is reasonably safe, any visits outside of Goma should be researched to understand the state of the fighting that persists in the North Kivu province. The city is also the base to climb the Nyiragongo volcano along with some of the cheapest Mountain Gorilla tracking in Africa. You can use boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to get around Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese Francs for the short ride.

src: ग्रान्ड क्यान्योनको किनाराभन्दा तलका कुनै पनि क्याम्पिङलाई ग्रामीण अनुमति आवश्यक पर्छ। अनुमतिहरू घाटीको सुरक्षाका लागि सीमित गरिएका छन् र महिनाको पहिलो दिनमा उपलब्ध हुन्छन्, सुरु हुने महिनाभन्दा चार महिना पहिले। त्यसकारण, मे महिनामा कुनै पनि सुरु मितिका लागि एउटा ब्याककन्ट्री अनुमति 1 जनवरीमा उपलब्ध हुन्छ। सबैभन्दा लोकप्रिय क्षेत्रहरूका लागि ठाउँ, जस्तै फ्यान्टम रेन्चसँग जोडिएको ब्राइट एन्जल क्याम्पग्राउन्ड, सामान्यतया आरक्षणका लागि खोलिएको पहिलो मितिमा प्राप्त अनुरोधहरूद्वारा नै भरिन्छन्। पहिला आउनेले पहिला पाउने आधारमा प्रवेश अनुरोधहरूका लागि सीमित सङ्ख्यामा अनुमतिहरू छन्।
mt: Camping is only allowed outside the Grand Canyon National Park. Permits are limited for safety reasons and are available on the first day of the month, four months before the start of the month. Therefore, a backcountry permit for any start date in May is available on January 1. The most popular areas, such as Phantom Ranch with the Bright Angel Campground, are usually filled with reservation requests on the first day of the month. First come, first served basis, limited number of permits are available for entry requests based on first come, first served basis.
ref: Any camping below the rim in Grand Canyon requires a backcountry permit. Permits are limited to protect the canyon, and become available on the 1st day of the month, four months prior to the start month. Thus, a backcountry permit for any start date in May becomes available on 1 Jan. Space for the most popular areas, such as the Bright Angel Campground adjacent to Phantom Ranch, generally fill up by the requests received on first date they are opened to reservations. There are a limited number permits reserved for walk-in requests available on a first come, first served basis.

src: केही होटलहरूमा दोस्रो विश्वयुद्ध अघि १९ औं वा २० औं शताब्दीका स्टिम रेलवे र समुद्री लाइनरहरूको सुनौलो युगको सम्पदा छन्। यी होटलहरू ती थिए जहाँ धनी र दिनका प्रसिद्ध व्यक्तिहरू बस्थे र अक्सर राम्रो भोजन र रातको जीवन हुन्थ्यो। पुरानो शैलीका फिटिङहरू, नयाँ सुविधाहरूको अभाव र एक निश्चित सुखद बुढ्यौली पनि उनीहरूको चरित्रको हिस्सा हुन्। जबकि तिनीहरू प्रायः निजी स्वामित्वका हुन्छन्, तिनीहरूले कहिलेकाहिँ भ्रमणमा रहेका राज्य प्रमुख र अन्य प्रतिष्ठित व्यक्तिहरूलाई बसाउने गर्दछन्। पैसाको थुप्रो साथमा बोक्ने यात्रीले संसारमा चारैतिर उड्ने कुरालाई सोच्न सक्छ, यिनीहरू धेरै होटलहरूमा रहने गर्दछन्।
mt: Some hotels have a second world war before the 19th or 20th century steam rail and ocean liners of the golden age of wealth and famous people. These hotels were where the rich and famous stayed and often had good food and night life. Old style fittings, lack of new facilities and a certain happy old age are also part of their character. While they are mostly privately owned, they sometimes accommodate visiting heads of state and other prominent people. With plenty of money to carry, the traveler can think of flying around the world, they stay in many hotels.
ref: Some hotels have a heritage from the golden age of steam railways and ocean liners; before the Second World War, in the 19th or early 20th centuries. These hotels were where the rich and the famous of the day would stay, and often had fine dining and nightlife. The old fashioned fittings, the lack of the latest amenities, and a certain graceful agedness are also part of their character. While they are usually privately owned, they sometimes accommodate visiting heads of state and other dignitaries. A traveller with piles of money might consider a round the world flight, broken up with stays in many of these hotels.

src: """युरोप र ब्रोडब्यान्ड स्याटेलाइटमा अन्डर सि फाइबर अप्टिक केबल लिङ्कहरूले गर्दा, ग्रिनल्यान्ड इन्टरनेट पहुँच भएका 93% जनसङ्ख्यामा राम्रोसँग जडान भएको छ। तपाईंको होटेल वा पाहुनाहरू (यदि गेस्ट हाउस वा निजी घरमा बस्दैछन् भने) वाईफाई वा इन्टरनेट जडित पीसी हुन सक्छ भने र सबै बस्तीमा ईन्टरनेट क्याफे वा सार्वजनिक वाईफाई भएको केहि स्थान हुन्छ। माथि उल्लेख गरिएझैं, """"एस्किमो"""" शब्द संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिकामा स्वीकार्य रहे पनि, यो धेरै गैर-संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिकाका आर्कटिक व्यक्तिहरूद्वारा, विशेष गरी क्यानाडामा अपमानजनक मानिन्छ। जबकि तपाईंले ग्रिनल्यान्ड वासीहरूले प्रयोग गरेका शब्द सुन्न सक्नुहुन्छ, तर यसको प्रयोग विदेशीहरूले रोक्नु पर्दछ। आफूलाई क्यानाडामा इनुइट र ग्रीनल्यान्डको ग्रीनल्यान्ड कालालेख (कलालिट) ग्रीनल्यान्डका स्थानीय बासिन्दाहरूले भन्छन्। अपराध र सामान्यतया विदेशीहरूप्रति खराब इच्छा, ग्रीनल्याण्डमा लगभग अज्ञात छ। शहरहरूमा पनि, त्यहाँ कुनै “असभ्य क्षेत्रहरू” छैनन्। चिसो मौसम शायद तयारी नगरेका मानिसहरूले सामना गरेको एक मात्रै वास्तविक खतरा हुन सक्छ। यदि तपाईं चिसो मौसममा ग्रिनल्यान्ड भ्रमण गर्नुहुन्छ भने (जति उत्तर तपाईं जानुहुन्छ, त्यति चिसो हुन्छ भन्ने कुरलाई ध्यानमा राख्दै) पर्याप्त न्यानो कपडा ल्याउन आवश्यक छ। गर्मीका धेरै लामा दिनहरूले पर्याप्त निद्रा प्राप्त गर्ने समस्या र सम्बन्धित स्वास्थ्य समस्याहरू गराउन सक्छन्। गर्मीको समयमा, नर्डिक लामखुट्टेलाई पनि ध्यान दिनुहोस्। यद्यपि तिनीहरूले कुनै पनि रोगहरू प्रसारित नगरे पनि तिनीहरू दिक्कलाग्दो हुन सक्छन्।"""
mt: 93% of the population has access to the Internet. Your hotel or guesthouses (if you are staying in a private home) may have Wi-Fi or Internet-connected PCs, and some locations have Internet cafes or public Wi-Fi. The above mentioned, """"Eskimo"""" word is accepted in the United States, but is considered offensive by many non-U.S. Arctic people, especially in Canada. While you may hear locals use the word you are using, its use by foreigners is discouraged. You are referred to as Inuit in Canada and Greenlandic in Greenland by local residents. Crime and generally bad attitude towards foreigners is rare in Greenland. There are no “bad neighborhoods” in the cities. Cold weather is the only real danger you may face. If you are visiting Greenland in the winter (the further north you go, the colder it gets), be sure to bring appropriate clothing. Long periods of warm weather can cause problems with sleep and related health issues. In the summer, be aware of the Nordic reindeer. While they do not spread any diseases, they can be stubborn.
ref: "Thanks to undersea fiber optic cable links to Europe and broadband satellite, Greenland is well connected with 93% of the population having internet access. Your hotel or hosts (if staying in a guesthouse or private home) will likely have wifi or an internet connected PC, and all settlements have an internet cafe or some location with public wifi. As mentioned above, though the word ""Eskimo"" remains acceptable in the United States, it is considered pejorative by many non-U.S. Arctic peoples, especially in Canada. While you may hear the word used by Greenlandic Natives, its use should be avoided by foreigners. The native inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), a Greenlander, in Greenland. Crime, and ill-will toward foreigners in general, is virtually unknown in Greenland. Even in the towns, there are no ""rough areas."" Cold weather is perhaps the only real danger the unprepared will face. If you visit Greenland during cold seasons (considering that the further north you go, the colder it will be), it is essential to bring warm enough clothing. The very long days in the summer can lead to problems getting sufficient sleep and associated health issues. During the summer, also watch out for the Nordic mosquitoes. Although they do not transmit any diseases, they can be irritating."

The above mentioned, """"Eskimo"""" word is accepted in the United States, but is considered offensive by many non-U.S. Arctic people, especially in Canada. While you may hear locals use the word you are using, its use by foreigners is discouraged. You are referred to as Inuit in Canada and Greenlandic in Greenland by local residents. Crime and generally bad attitude towards foreigners is rare in Greenland. There are no “bad neighborhoods” in the cities. Cold weather is the only real danger you may face. If you are visiting Greenland in the winter (the further north you go, the colder it gets), be sure to bring appropriate clothing. Long periods of warm weather can cause problems with sleep and related health issues. In the summer, be aware of the Nordic reindeer. While they do not spread any diseases, they can be stubborn.
ref: "Thanks to undersea fiber optic cable links to Europe and broadband satellite, Greenland is well connected with 93% of the population having internet access. Your hotel or hosts (if staying in a guesthouse or private home) will likely have wifi or an internet connected PC, and all settlements have an internet cafe or some location with public wifi. As mentioned above, though the word ""Eskimo"" remains acceptable in the United States, it is considered pejorative by many non-U.S. Arctic peoples, especially in Canada. While you may hear the word used by Greenlandic Natives, its use should be avoided by foreigners. The native inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), a Greenlander, in Greenland. Crime, and ill-will toward foreigners in general, is virtually unknown in Greenland. Even in the towns, there are no ""rough areas."" Cold weather is perhaps the only real danger the unprepared will face. If you visit Greenland during cold seasons (considering that the further north you go, the colder it will be), it is essential to bring warm enough clothing. The very long days in the summer can lead to problems getting sufficient sleep and associated health issues. During the summer, also watch out for the Nordic mosquitoes. Although they do not transmit any diseases, they can be irritating."

src: जार्डिन डे ला युनियोन। यस स्थानलाई 17 औँ शताब्दीको कन्भेन्टका लागि आट्रियमको रूपमा निर्माण गरिएको थियो, जसमध्ये टेम्प्लो डे सान डिएगो एकमात्र जीवित भवन हो। केन्द्रीय प्लाजाको रूपमा अन यसले कार्य गर्छ र सँधै दिन-रात थुप्रै चीजहरू हुँदै गइरहेका छन्। त्यहाँ बगैंचा वरिपरि थुप्रै रेस्टुरेन्टहरू छन्, र दिउँसो र बेलुका त्यहाँ प्रायः केन्द्रीय गजेबोबाट दिइने निःशुल्क कन्सर्टहरू हुन्छन्। क्यालेजोन डेल बेसो (चुम्बनको गल्ली)। मात्र 69 सेन्टिमिटरले अलग्गिएको पुरानो प्रेम आदर्श चरित्रको घर हो। केही पैसाका लागि केहि बच्चाहरूले तपाईंलाई कथा भन्नेछन्।
mt: Garden de la Unión. This site was built in the 17th century as a convent atrium, of which the Temple de San Diego is the only surviving building. It functions as the central plaza and has always been bustling day and night. There are many restaurants around the garden, and in the evenings and at night there are usually free concerts given by the central gazebo. Callejón del Beso (Kiss Alley). The home of the old love ideal couple separated by 69 centimeters. Some children will tell you stories for a few coins.
ref: Jardín de la Unión. This space was built as the atrium for a 17th-century convent, of which the Templo de San Diego is the sole surviving building. It now functions as the central plaza, and always has a lot of things going on, day and night. There are a number of restaurants surrounding the garden, and in the afternoons and evening there free concerts are often given from the central gazebo. Callejon del Beso (Alley of the Kiss). Two balconies separated by only 69 centimeters is home of an old love legend. For a few pennies some children will tell you the story.

src: पैदल यात्रा बाहिरी खुल्ला ठाउँको गतिविधि हो जसमा प्राय: पैदल यात्राको बाटोमा प्राकृतिक वातावरणमा हिँड्ने कुरा समावेश हुन्छ। दिनको पैदल यात्रामा एकै दिनमा सम्पन्न गर्न सकिने एक माइलभन्दा कम देखि लामो दूरी सम्मको दूरी समावेश हुन्छ। सजिलो बाटोमा एक दिने पैदल यात्राका लागि केही तयारीहरू आवश्यक हुन्छन् र कुनै पनि मध्यम रूपमा फिट व्यक्तिले तिनीहरूको आनन्द लिन सक्छ। साना बच्चाहरू सहितका परिवारहरूलाई थप तयारीहरू आवश्यक पर्न सक्छ, तर बच्चा र प्रि-स्कुलका बच्चाहरूसँग पनि दिनमा घर बाहिर निस्कन सजिलै सम्भव हुन्छ।
mt: A walk is an outdoor activity consisting of walking. The term usually implies taking a leisurely stroll, rather than a fast-paced hike. A day walk is a walk that can be completed in a day. Some preparation is required for easy day walks, and most people can enjoy them. Families with small children may require additional preparation, but children and pre-schoolers can easily walk around the house.
ref: Hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, often on hiking trails. Day hiking involves distances of less than a mile up to longer distances that can be covered in a single day. For a day hike along an easy trail little preparations are needed, and any moderately fit person can enjoy them. Families with small children may need more preparations, but a day outdoors is easily possible even with babies and pre-school children.

src: नर्वेमा ठाडो फ्योर्ड र उपत्यका छन् जसले अचानक एक उच्च, अधिक वा कम उच्चसमस्थलीको लागि बाटो दिन्छ। यी उच्च समस्थलीहरू प्राय “भिडे” भनेर चिनिन्छन् जसको अर्थ चौडा, खुला रुखविहीन अन्तरिक्ष र असीमित विस्तार हो। रोगाल्यान्ड र आगदेरमा तिनीहरूले प्रायजसो “हेई” भन्थे जस्को अर्थ प्राय: हिथरले ढाकिएको उजाड दलदल हो।
mt: There are wide fjords and valleys in Norway that suddenly lead to a high, higher or lower summit. These high summits are usually called "bids" which means wide, open treeless space and unlimited expansion. In Rogaland and Agder they usually called them "hey" which means usually a heather-covered bog.
ref: "Typical for Norway are steep fjords and valleys that suddenly give way to a high, more or less even plateau. These plateaus are often referred to as ""vidde"" meaning a wide, open treeless space, a boundless expanse. In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called ""hei"" meaning a treeless moorland often covered in heather."

src: नर्वेमा ठाडो फ्योर्ड र उपत्यका छन् जसले अचानक एक उच्च, अधिक वा कम उच्चसमस्थलीको लागि बाटो दिन्छ। यी उच्च समस्थलीहरू प्राय “भिडे” भनेर चिनिन्छन् जसको अर्थ चौडा, खुला रुखविहीन अन्तरिक्ष र असीमित विस्तार हो। रोगाल्यान्ड र आगदेरमा तिनीहरूले प्रायजसो “हेई” भन्थे जस्को अर्थ प्राय: हिथरले ढाकिएको उजाड दलदल हो।

These high summits are usually called "bids" which means wide, open treeless space and unlimited expansion. In Rogaland and Agder they usually called them "hey" which means usually a heather-covered bog.

These plateaus are often referred to as ""vidde"" meaning a wide, open treeless space, a boundless expanse. In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called ""hei"" meaning a treeless moorland often covered in heather."

src: पर्वत स्टेसनहरूका लागि पर्यटकीय मौसम भारतीय गर्मीको अवधिमा साधारणतया वृद्धि हुन्छ। यद्यपि, उनीहरूको हिउँदयाममा फरक प्रकारको सौन्दर्य र आकर्षण छ, धेरै पहाडी स्टेशनहरूले स्वस्थ मात्रामा हिउँ पाइरहेको छ र स्कीइङ र स्नोबोर्डिङजस्ता गतिविधिहरू प्रदान गर्दछन्।
mt: For most of the Indian summer, the tourist season for hill stations is usually an increase. However, they have different kinds of beauty and attraction in their winter, many hill stations are providing healthy amounts of snow and activities such as skiing and snowboarding.
ref: The tourist season for the hill stations generally peaks during the Indian summer. However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.

src: पर्वत स्टेसनहरूका लागि पर्यटकीय मौसम भारतीय गर्मीको अवधिमा साधारणतया वृद्धि हुन्छ। यद्यपि, उनीहरूको हिउँदयाममा फरक प्रकारको सौन्दर्य र आकर्षण छ, धेरै पहाडी स्टेशनहरूले स्वस्थ मात्रामा हिउँ पाइरहेको छ र स्कीइङ र स्नोबोर्डिङजस्ता गतिविधिहरू प्रदान गर्दछन्।

ref: The tourist season for the hill stations generally peaks during the Indian summer. However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.

src: तपाईंले मरीनसलाई ठक्कर दिएको लगत्तैपछि, सबैकुरा स्पष्ट देखिनेछ भनी सुनिश्चित गर्नुहोस्। तपाईं अरू डुङ्गा चढ्नेहरूलाई भेट्नुहुनेछ र तिनीहरूले उनीहरूसँग तपाईंको जानकारी आदानप्रदान गर्नेछन्। साधारणतया तपाईं अरूलाई आफ्नो सहायता प्रस्तुत गर्दै, डकको लम्बाई नाप्दै, आफ्ना साना डुङ्गा सफा गरिरहेका मानिसहरूसँग नजिकिन खोज्दै, बारमा नाविकहरूसँग सम्पर्क गर्ने प्रयास गर्दै हुनु हुने छ। सकेसम्म धेरै व्यक्तिहरूसँग कुरा गर्ने प्रयास गर्नुहोस्। केही समयपछि सबैले तपाईंलाई चिन्नेछन् र तपाईंलाई डुङ्गाले कसैलाई खोज्दैछ भनेर सङ्केत दिनेछन्।
mt: 1. Make sure you are certain of your location. You may have hit a marine. 2. You will see other boats and they will be able to tell you where you are. 3. You will be able to help others, measure the length of a duck, clean your small boat, and try to contact the sailors in the bar. 4. Try to talk to many people. Soon everyone will know you and will signal you that you are looking for someone and that you have hit a marine.
ref: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you. Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc. Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.

src: तपाईंले मरीनसलाई ठक्कर दिएको लगत्तैपछि, सबैकुरा स्पष्ट देखिनेछ भनी सुनिश्चित गर्नुहोस्। तपाईं अरू डुङ्गा चढ्नेहरूलाई भेट्नुहुनेछ र तिनीहरूले उनीहरूसँग तपाईंको जानकारी आदानप्रदान गर्नेछन्। साधारणतया तपाईं अरूलाई आफ्नो सहायता प्रस्तुत गर्दै, डकको लम्बाई नाप्दै, आफ्ना साना डुङ्गा सफा गरिरहेका मानिसहरूसँग नजिकिन खोज्दै, बारमा नाविकहरूसँग सम्पर्क गर्ने प्रयास गर्दै हुनु हुने छ। सकेसम्म धेरै व्यक्तिहरूसँग कुरा गर्ने प्रयास गर्नुहोस्। केही समयपछि सबैले तपाईंलाई चिन्नेछन् र तपाईंलाई डुङ्गाले कसैलाई खोज्दैछ भनेर सङ्केत दिनेछन्।
mt: 1. Make sure you are certain of your location. You may have hit a marine. 2. You will see other boats and they will be able to tell you where you are. 3. You will be able to help others, measure the length of a duck, clean your small boat, and try to contact the sailors in the bar. 4. Try to talk to many people. Soon everyone will know you and will signal you that you are looking for someone and that you have hit a marine.
ref: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you. Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc. Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.

src: हङकङ टापूले हङकङको क्षेत्रलाई यसको नाम दिन्छ र यस ठाउँमा धेरै पर्यटकहरू केन्द्रित छन्। हङकङको क्षितिज बनाउने भवनहरूको प्रदर्शनीलाई चम्किलो स्तम्भ चित्रमा मनपराइएको छ जसलाई भिक्टोरिया बन्दरगाहको पानीको उपस्थितिद्वारा स्पष्ट बनाइन्छ। हङकङका सर्वश्रेष्ठ दृश्यहरू प्राप्त गर्नका लागि, टापु छोड्नुहोस् र कोवुलुन वाटरफ्रन्टको विपरित जानुहोस्। हङकङ टापुको अधिकांश सहरी विकासको पुनः कब्जा गरिएको भूमिको उत्तरी बैंक घना रुपमा भरिएको छ। बेलायतले यो स्थान आफ्नो उपनिवेशका रूपमा लिए र तपाईं क्षेत्रको औपनिवेशिक विगतका प्रमाणहरू खोज्दै हुनुहुन्छ भने सुरु गर्नका लागि यो राम्रो स्थान हो।
mt: Hong Kong Island is the center of Hong Kong's territory, and many tourists are focused here. The skyline of Hong Kong's skyscrapers is best seen in the bright columns of the Victoria Harbour. To get the best views of Hong Kong Island, leave the island and go to the opposite side of the Kowloon Waterfront. Most of the urban development of Hong Kong Island has been reclaimed from the sea. Britain took this place as its colony and you are looking for evidence of its colonial past, this is a good place to start.
ref: Hong Kong Island gives the territory of Hong Kong its name and is the place that many tourists regard as the main focus. The parade of buildings that make the Hong Kong skyline has been likened to a glittering bar chart that is made apparent by the presence of the waters of Victoria Harbour. To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head for the Kowloon waterfront opposite. The great majority of Hong Kong Island's urban development is densely packed on reclaimed land along the northern shore. This is the place the British colonisers took as their own and so if you are looking for evidence of the territory's colonial past, this is a good place to start.

src: हङकङ टापूले हङकङको क्षेत्रलाई यसको नाम दिन्छ र यस ठाउँमा धेरै पर्यटकहरू केन्द्रित छन्। हङकङको क्षितिज बनाउने भवनहरूको प्रदर्शनीलाई चम्किलो स्तम्भ चित्रमा मनपराइएको छ जसलाई भिक्टोरिया बन्दरगाहको पानीको उपस्थितिद्वारा स्पष्ट बनाइन्छ। हङकङका सर्वश्रेष्ठ दृश्यहरू प्राप्त गर्नका लागि, टापु छोड्नुहोस् र कोवुलुन वाटरफ्रन्टको विपरित जानुहोस्। हङकङ टापुको अधिकांश सहरी विकासको पुनः कब्जा गरिएको भूमिको उत्तरी बैंक घना रुपमा भरिएको छ। बेलायतले यो स्थान आफ्नो उपनिवेशका रूपमा लिए र तपाईं क्षेत्रको औपनिवेशिक विगतका प्रमाणहरू खोज्दै हुनुहुन्छ भने सुरु गर्नका लागि यो राम्रो स्थान हो।
mt: Hong Kong Island is the center of Hong Kong's territory, and many tourists are focused here. The skyline of Hong Kong's skyscrapers is best seen in the bright columns of the Victoria Harbour. To get the best views of Hong Kong Island, leave the island and go to the opposite side of the Kowloon Waterfront. Most of the urban development of Hong Kong Island has been reclaimed from the sea. Britain took this place as its colony and you are looking for evidence of its colonial past, this is a good place to start.
ref: Hong Kong Island gives the territory of Hong Kong its name and is the place that many tourists regard as the main focus. The parade of buildings that make the Hong Kong skyline has been likened to a glittering bar chart that is made apparent by the presence of the waters of Victoria Harbour. To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head for the Kowloon waterfront opposite. The great majority of Hong Kong Island's urban development is densely packed on reclaimed land along the northern shore. This is the place the British colonisers took as their own and so if you are looking for evidence of the territory's colonial past, this is a good place to start.

src: सवारी गर्नेको खुट्टाका लागि रिकाब सहारा हुन्, जुन गद्दीको दुवै पट्टि तलतिर झुन्डिन्छन्। तिनीहरूले सवारी गर्नेको लागि धेरै नै स्थिरता प्रदान गर्दछन् तर सवारी गर्नेहरूको खुट्टा तिनीहरूमा फस्न सक्ने सम्भाव्यताको कारण सुरक्षा चासोहरू हुन सक्छन्। यदि घोड सवार घोडाबाट फ्याँकिएको छ तर खुट्टा रिकाबमा अड्किएको छ भने, घोडा भागेको बेलामा उनीहरूलाई घिसार्न सक्दछन्। यो जोखिम कम गर्न धेरै सुरक्षाका पूर्वसावधानी अपनाउन सकिन्छ। सुरुमा, प्राय चालकहरूले हिल र नरम, एकदमै साँघुरो सोल भएका बुटहरू लगाउँदै थिए। अब, केही गद्दीहरू, विशेष गरी बेलायती गद्दीहरूमा सुरक्षा पट्टीहरू छन् जसले यदि लड्न लागेको सवारीकर्ताले पछाडि तान्यो भने एक रिकाब छालालाई गद्दीबाट तल झार्दछ।
mt: The stirrups are for the horse's feet, which are held in place by the saddle. They provide a lot of stability for the rider, but the risk of the rider's feet getting caught in them is possible. If the horse kicks out and the rider's feet are caught in the stirrups, the horse can kick the rider. This risk can be minimized by taking some safety precautions. First, riders used to wear soft, thin, and flexible boots. Now, some saddles, especially British saddles, have safety straps that if the rider kicks out, the stirrup leather will pull the stirrup leather down from the saddle.
ref: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle. They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them. If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken. First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole. Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.

src: अतिथि सेवा आदानप्रदान सञ्जाल भनेको त्यो सङ्गठन हो जसले यात्रीलाई तिनीहरू घुम्न जान लागेका सहरहरूमा स्थानीयहरूसँग जोड्छन्। यस्तो सञ्जालमा सामेल हुन सामान्यता एउटा अनलाइन फाराम भर्नु पर्छ; यद्यपि केही सञ्जालहरूले अतिरिक्त प्रमाणीकरण माग्छन् वा अनिवार्य गर्छन्। त्यसपछि उपलब्ध होस्टहरूको सूची कि प्रिन्ट र/ वा अनलाइनमा प्रदान गरिन्छ, कहिँलेकाहीँ अन्य यात्रीहरूद्वारा सन्दर्भ र समीक्षाको साथ दिइन्छ। कम्प्युटर प्रोग्रामर केसी फेन्टनले आईसल्याण्डका लागि सस्तो उडान भेट्टाएपछि तर त्यहाँ बस्ने ठाउँ नभएकोले काउचसर्फिङ्गको स्थापना जनवरी 2004 मा भएको थियो। उनले स्थानीय विश्वविद्यालयमा विद्यार्थीहरूलाई पत्राचार गर्दै निःशुल्क रूपमा आवासको लागि भारी सङ्ख्याको प्रस्तावहरू प्राप्त गरेका थिए।
mt: An exchange service is an organization that connects travelers with locals they are visiting in cities they are interested in visiting. To join such a service, one typically fills out an online form; some services require or recommend additional verification. A list of available hosts is then provided either online or in print, sometimes with references and reviews from other travelers. Computer programmer KC Fenton found cheap flights to Iceland but no place to stay, so couchsurfing was established in January 2004. He sent out a mass email to students at a local university, offering free accommodation.
ref: A hospitality exchange network is the organization that connects travelers with locals in the cities they are going to visit. Joining such a network usually just requires filling out an online form; although some networks offer or require additional verification. A listing of available hosts is then provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers. Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but did not have a place to stay. He emailed students at the local university and received an overwhelming number of offers for free accommodation.

src: होस्टलहरू मुख्यतया युवा व्यक्तिहरूलाई खान-पानको प्रबन्ध गर्दछन् - विशौं शताब्दीको विशिष्ट पाहुना - तर तपाईं प्रायः त्यहाँ बृद्ध यात्रीहरूलाई पनि भेट्टाउन सक्नुहुन्छ। बच्चाहरू भएका परिवारहरू दुर्लभ दृश्य हुन्, तर केही होस्टलले निजी कोठामा तिनीहरूलाई अनुमति दिन्छ।
mt: Hostels primarily cater to young people - the distinctive guest of the twentieth century - but you will often find elderly travelers there as well. Families with children are a rare sight, but some hostels allow them in private rooms.
ref: Hostels cater primarily to young people – a typical guest is in their twenties – but you can often find older travellers there too. Families with children are a rare sight, but some hostels do allow them in private rooms.

src: होस्टलहरू मुख्यतया युवा व्यक्तिहरूलाई खान-पानको प्रबन्ध गर्दछन् - विशौं शताब्दीको विशिष्ट पाहुना - तर तपाईं प्रायः त्यहाँ बृद्ध यात्रीहरूलाई पनि भेट्टाउन सक्नुहुन्छ। बच्चाहरू भएका परिवारहरू दुर्लभ दृश्य हुन्, तर केही होस्टलले निजी कोठामा तिनीहरूलाई अनुमति दिन्छ।

src: धेरै पर्यटकहरू लिन चाहने बुमेराङ्ग थ्रोइङ्ग लोकप्रिय कला हो। तपाईं आफ्नो हातमा फर्केर आउने बुमर्‍याङ फ्याँक्न सिक्न चाहनुहुन्छ भने आफूतिर फर्केर आउने उचित खालको बुमर्‍याङ छ भन्ने कुराको सुनिश्चित गर्नुहोस्। अष्ट्रेलियामा उपलब्ध अधिकांश बुमरेङ्गहरू वास्तवमा फिर्ता नहुने खालका हुन्छन्। सुरुवाती व्यक्तिहरूले हावाहुरीमा फ्याँक्ने कोशिस नगर्नु राम्रो हुन्छ।
mt: Many tourists want to throw a Bumrung Throwing popular art. If you want to learn how to throw a Bumrung that comes back, make sure you have the right kind of Bumrung that comes back. Most Bumrungs available in Australia are actually not coming back. Beginners should not try to throw in the wind, and it is good.
ref: Boomerang throwing is a popular skill that many tourists want to acquire. If you want to learn throwing a boomerang that comes back to your hand, make sure you have a suitable boomerang for returning. Most boomerangs available in Australia are in fact non-returning. It is best for beginners to not try throwing in windy

src: 17,000 टापुहरूमध्येबाट छनौट गर्न, ईन्डोनेसियाली खाना देशभरि पाइने विभिन्न प्रकारका क्षेत्रीय खानाहरू समेटिएको एउटा छाता हो। तर कुनै थप विशेषक बिना प्रयोग गरिएमा उक्त शब्दले मूल रूपमा मुख्य टापु जाभाको मध्य र पूर्वी भागको खानालाई जनाउँछ। अहिले सम्पूर्ण द्वीप समूहमा व्यापक उपलब्ध भएको जाभानीज खानामा सामान्य रूपमा मसलाहरू प्रयोग गरिएका परिकारहरू पर्दछन्, जाभानीजहरूले मनपराउने मुख्य स्वादहरूमा बदाम, खुर्सानी, चिनी (विशेष गरी जाभानीज नरिवल चिनी) र विभिन्न सुगन्धित मसलाहरू हुन्।
mt: 17,000 islands wide, Indonesian cuisine is a collection of various regional dishes from across the archipelago. However, the term itself originally refers to the main island of Java's central and eastern regions. The most common dishes in the entire archipelago are those that use the main ingredients of peanuts, soybeans, sugar (especially Javanese sugar cane), and various spices that Javanese people like.
ref: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian food is an umbrella term covering a vast variety of regional cuisines found across the nation. But, if used without further qualifiers, the term tends to mean the food originally from the central and eastern parts of the main island Java. Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.

src: चिकित्सा शब्दजालसँग अपरिचितहरूका लागि, संक्रामक र सरुवा शब्दहरूको अलग-अलग अर्थ छन्। सङ्क्रामक रोग भाइरस, ब्याक्टेरिया, फङ्गस जस्ता रोगजनक वा अन्य परजीवीहरूले गर्दा हुने रोग हो। संक्रमित व्यक्तिको छेउछाउमा रहँदा सजिलै सर्ने रोग संक्रामक रोग हो। धेरै सरकारहरूलाई भ्रमण गर्न प्रवेश गरेका आगन्तुकहरू वा देश छोडेर गएका बासिन्दाहरूले रोगहरूको धेरै खोप लगाउन आवश्यक छ। यी आवश्यकताहरू प्रायः एक यात्रीले कुन देशहरू भ्रमण गरेको छ वा भ्रमण गर्न खोजेको छ भन्नेमा भर पर्न सक्छन्।
mt: For the uninitiated, infectious and contagious have different meanings. An infectious disease is one caused by a virus, bacterium, fungus, or other pathogen. A contagious disease is one that can easily spread to those in close contact with an infected person. Many governments require that visitors entering or leaving a country have received many vaccinations against diseases. These requirements are often based on which countries a traveler has visited or is visiting.
ref: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings. An infectious disease is one that is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or other parasites. A contagious disease is a disease which is easily transmitted by being in the vicinity of an infected person. Many governments require visitors entering, or residents leaving, their countries to be vaccinated for a range of diseases. These requirements may often depend on what countries a traveller has visited or intends to visit.

src: चिकित्सा शब्दजालसँग अपरिचितहरूका लागि, संक्रामक र सरुवा शब्दहरूको अलग-अलग अर्थ छन्। सङ्क्रामक रोग भाइरस, ब्याक्टेरिया, फङ्गस जस्ता रोगजनक वा अन्य परजीवीहरूले गर्दा हुने रोग हो। संक्रमित व्यक्तिको छेउछाउमा रहँदा सजिलै सर्ने रोग संक्रामक रोग हो। धेरै सरकारहरूलाई भ्रमण गर्न प्रवेश गरेका आगन्तुकहरू वा देश छोडेर गएका बासिन्दाहरूले रोगहरूको धेरै खोप लगाउन आवश्यक छ। यी आवश्यकताहरू प्रायः एक यात्रीले कुन देशहरू भ्रमण गरेको छ वा भ्रमण गर्न खोजेको छ भन्नेमा भर पर्न सक्छन्।
mt: For the uninitiated, infectious and contagious have different meanings. An infectious disease is one caused by a virus, bacterium, fungus, or other pathogen. A contagious disease is one that can easily spread to those in close contact with an infected person. Many governments require that visitors entering or leaving a country have received many vaccinations against diseases. These requirements are often based on which countries a traveler has visited or is visiting.
ref: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings. An infectious disease is one that is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or other parasites. A contagious disease is a disease which is easily transmitted by being in the vicinity of an infected person. Many governments require visitors entering, or residents leaving, their countries to be vaccinated for a range of diseases. These requirements may often depend on what countries a traveller has visited or intends to visit.

src: राजनीतिक सेन्सरसिप र व्यावसायिक प्रयोजनका लागि गरिने IP- जियोफिल्टरिङ बाइपास गर्नका लागि व्यक्तिगत VPN (भर्चुअल निजी नेटवर्क) प्रदायकहरू उत्कृष्ट तरिका हुन्। तिनीहरू धेरै कारणहरूले वेब प्रोक्सीहरू भन्दा माथि छन्: तिनीहरूले http मात्र नभएर सबै आन्तरिक ट्राफिकलाई पुनः निर्देशित गर्छन्। तिनीहरूले साधारणतयाः उच्च ब्यान्डविथ र सेवाको अझ राम्रो गुणस्तर प्रदान गर्छन्। तिनीहरू गुप्तीकरण गरिएका हुन्छन् र यसर्थ जासुसी गर्न कठिन हुन्छ।
mt: Political and commercial IP-geofiltering bypasses are best done with personal VPN (virtual private network) providers. They are better than web proxies in many ways: they redirect all internal traffic, not just http. They provide higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted, so they are harder to spy on.
ref: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are an excellent way of circumventing both political censorship and commercial IP-geofiltering. They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http. They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.

src: कलहरू इन्टरनेटमार्फत राउट गरिने भएकाले तपाईंले आफू बस्ने र यात्रा गर्ने ठाउँको फोन कम्पनीको सेवा प्रयोग गरिराख्नु पर्दैन। तपाईं बस्ने समुदायबाट कुनै स्थानीय नम्बर प्राप्त गर्नुपर्ने आवश्यकता पनि छैन: तपाईंले चिकेन, अलास्काको जङ्गलमा उपग्रह इन्टरनेट जडान प्राप्त गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ र एक नम्बर चयन गरेमा त्यसले तपाईंलाई घमाइलो एरिजोनामा हुनुहुन्छ भनेर दाबी गर्दछ। प्रायः तपाईंले ग्लोबल नम्बर छुट्टै किन्नु पर्छ जसले PSTN फोनहरूलाई तपाईंलाई फोन गर्न अनुमति दिन्छ। नम्बर कहाँबाट हो भन्ने कुराले तपाईंलाई फोन गर्ने मान्छेहरूका लागि फरक पार्दछ।
mt: Because you can route calls over the Internet, you don't need to use a local number when you're in a new place. You don't need to get a local number in the chicken, the jungle of Alaska, which claims you're in ghastly Arizona. You usually need to buy a separate number, which allows PSTN phones to call you. Where the number is from matters to people who call you.
ref: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel. There is also no requirement that you obtain a local number from the community in which you live; you can obtain a satellite Internet connection in the wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number which claims you're in sunny Arizona. Often, you have to buy a global number separately that allows PSTN phones to call you. Where the number is from makes a difference for people calling you.

src: लेखिएअनुसार उच्चारण गरिने हुनाले इटालियनमा उच्चारण तुलनात्मक रूपमा सजिलो छ तिनीहरूको उच्चारण निम्न स्वरमा आधारित हुनाले ध्यान दिनुपर्ने मुख्य अक्षरहरू c र g हुन्। r र rr फरक तरिकाले उच्चारण गर्नु पर्ने हुन्छ: क्यारो(Caro) को अर्थ प्रिय र क्यारो(Carro) को अर्थ रथ हो।
mt: As reported, pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian, as the main vowels are based on the low sounds of c and g. r and rr are pronounced differently: Caro (Caro) means dear, while Carro (Carro) means cart.
ref: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written The main letters to watch out for are c and g, since their pronunciation varies based on the following vowel. Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.

src: इज्मिर लगभग 3.7 मिलियन जनसंख्या भएको टर्कीको तेस्रो सबैभन्दा ठूलो सहर, इस्तानबुलपछिको दोस्रो सबैभन्दा ठूलो बन्दरगाह भएको र एउटा धेरै राम्रो यातायात केन्द्र हो। एक पटक स्मायर्नाको प्राचीन सहर, यो अहिले एक आधुनिक, विकसित र व्यस्त व्यवसायिक केन्द्र हो, जुन अहिले खाडीको चारैतिर स्थित छ र हिमालहरूले घेरिएको छ। ठूला बोलेभार्डहरू, शीशाले ढाकेका भवनहरू र आधुनिक किनमेल केन्द्रहरू पारम्परिक रातो-टायल भएका छतहरूले भरिएका छन्, 18 औँ शताब्दीको बजार र पुराना मस्जिद र गिर्जाघरहरू, यद्यपि यस शहरको वातावरण परम्परागत टर्कीकोभन्दा भूमध्य यूरोपको जस्तो छ।
mt: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey, after Istanbul and Ankara, and the second largest port after Istanbul. Once a Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed and busy business center, which is now located in the Middle East and surrounded by mountains. Large bazaars, glass-covered buildings and modern shopping centers are filled with traditional red-tiled roofs, 18th century markets and old mosques and churches, although the atmosphere of this city is more like Western Europe than traditional Turkey.
ref: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub. Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains. The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.

src: हानामी भनेर चिनिने, चेरी फुलिरहेको हेर्ने 8 औँ शताब्दीदेखि जापानी संस्कृतिको एउटा भाग रहँदै आएको छ। यसको अवधारणा चीनबाट आएको हो जहाँ बयरका फूलहरू छनोटका फूल थिए। आफ्नो र शाही अदालतका अन्य कुलीन सदस्यहरूका लागि मात्र जापानमा पहिलो चेरी ब्लासम पार्टी आयोजना गरिएको थियो।
mt: 8th century, the viewing of cherry blossoms has been a part of Japanese culture. Its concept came from China where the bear's flowers were considered a rare flower. The first cherry blossom viewing party was held in Japan for the emperor and other members of the royal court.
ref: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century. The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice. In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.

src: अधिकांश अन्य देश र संयुक्त राष्ट्रसंघले यसलाई इजरायलको राजधानीको रूपमा मान्यता नदिए पनि जेरूसलम इजरायलको राजधानी र ठूलो शहर हो। जुडियन पहाडमा रहेको पुरानो सहरको हजारौं वर्ष फैलिएको मनमोहक इतिहास छ। यो सहर तिनवटा एक ईश्वरवादी धर्महरू – यहुदी, इसाई र इस्लाम धर्महरूका लागि पवित्र छ र आध्यात्मिक, धार्मिक र सांस्कृतिक केन्द्रको रूपमा सेवा दिन्छ। सहरको धार्मिक महत्त्व र विशेष गरी पुरानो सहरी क्षेत्रका धेरै स्थलहरूको कारणले, जेरुसेलम इजरायलका मुख्य पर्यटकीय क्षेत्रहरूमध्ये एक हो। जेरूसेलममा व्यवसायिक र भीडभाड भएको किनमेल केन्द्र, क्याफे र रेस्टुरेन्टहरूसहित धेरै ऐतिहासिक, पुरातात्विक र सांस्कृतिक क्षेत्रहरू छन्।
mt: While most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as the capital of Israel, Jerusalem is the capital of Israel and its largest city. The Old City, on the Mount of Olives, has a history dating back thousands of years. It is sacred to three monotheistic religions – Judaism, Christianity and Islam – and serves as a center of spiritual, religious and cultural service. The city's religious significance and especially the many sites in the Old City, have made Jerusalem one of Israel's main tourist areas. There are many historical, archaeological and cultural areas in Jerusalem, including commercial and crowded shopping centers, cafes and restaurants.
ref: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, though most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as Israel's capital. The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a fascinating history spanning thousands of years. The city is holy to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious, and cultural center. Due to the religious significance of the city, and in particular the many sites of the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel. Jerusalem has many historic, archeological and cultural sites, along with vibrant and crowded shopping centers, cafés, and restaurants.

ref: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, though most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as Israel's capital. The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a fascinating history spanning thousands of years. The city is holy to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious, and cultural center. Due to the religious significance of the city, and in particular the many sites of the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel. Jerusalem has many historic, archeological and cultural sites, along with vibrant and crowded shopping centers, cafés, and restaurants.

src: पूर्वमा मोजाम्बिकको सिमानामा पर्ने क्रुगर राष्ट्रिय निकुञ्ज (KNP) दक्षिण अफ्रिकाको उत्तर पूर्वमा अवस्थित छ। उत्तरमा जिम्बाब्वे र दक्षिणी सिमाना क्रोकोडायल नदी छ। यो पार्कले 19,500 किमि² ओगट्छ र यसलाई 14 भिन्न पारिस्थितिक क्षेत्रहरूमा विभाजित गरिएको छ, जसमा प्रत्येकले भिन्न वन्यजन्तुलाई समर्थन गर्छ। दक्षिण अफ्रिकाको मुख्य आकर्षण मध्ये यो एक हो र यसलाई दक्षिण अफ्रिकी राष्ट्रिय निकुञ्ज (SANParks) को प्रमुख आकर्षणका रूपमा पनि मानिन्छ। दक्षिण अफ्रिकी राष्ट्रिय निकुञ्जहरू जस्तै पार्कका लागि दैनिक संरक्षण र प्रवेश शुल्कहरू लगाइएका छन्। दक्षिण अफ्रिका वा त्यताका सबै राष्ट्रिय निकुञ्जहरूको पार्कहरूको चयनमा प्रवेश प्रदान गर्ने वाईल्ड कार्ड किन्न पनि यो लाभदायक हुन सक्छ।
mt: The KNP is located in the north of Mozambique. To the north is Zimbabwe and the southern border is the Crocodile River. The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided into 14 different biomes, each supporting different wildlife. It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and is also considered one of the main attractions of SANParks. Daily conservation and entrance fees have been imposed for the park, as with other South African national parks. A Wild Card can be purchased to provide access to all South African national parks, including the KNP.
ref: The Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in the north-east of South Africa and runs along the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River. The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided in 14 different ecozones, each supporting different wildlife. It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks). As with all South African National Parks, there are daily conservation and entry fees for the park. It may also be beneficial for one to buy a Wild Card, which provides entry to either selections of parks in South Africa or all of the South African National Parks.

src: सबै अवशेषहरूका तस्विरहरूको पृष्ठभूमि रहेको माचु पिच्चुको उत्तरी छेउको माथिल्लो भाग ठाडो पहाड हो। यो तलबाट केही गाह्रो देखिन्छ र यो एक एकदम भिरालो र गाह्रो उकालो छ, तर प्रायः तन्दुरुस्त व्यक्तिहरूले यसलाई लगभग 45 मिनेटमा पूरा गर्न सक्षम हुन्छ। मार्गको अधिकांश भागमा ढुङ्गाको पाइला राखिएको छ र भिरालो भागहरूमा स्टील केबलहरूले सहायक रेलिङ प्रदान गर्छन्। त्यस्तो भनिन्छ कि, श्वास बन्द हुने अपेक्षा हुन्छ र ठाडो अंशहरूमा सावधानी अपनाउनु पर्छ, विशेष गरी जब भिजेको हुन्छ, यो छिट्टै खतरनाक हुन सक्छ। माथिको नजिक सानो गुफा छ जुन पार गर्नुपर्नेछ, यो एकदमै सानो र साँघुरो छ।
mt: The background of the Machu Picchu northern slope is a steep mountain. There is some loose rock visible and this is a very steep and loose slope, but most fit people can complete it in about 45 minutes. Most of the path is paved with stone steps and steel cables provide assistance on the steep sections. It is said that one should be prepared for shortness of breath and be cautious on the steep sections, especially when wet, as it can become very dangerous quickly. There is a small cave nearby that needs to be passed, this is very small and narrow.
ref: Towering above the north end of Machu Picchu is this steep mountain, often the backdrop to many photos of the ruins. It looks a bit daunting from below, and it is a steep and difficult ascent, but most reasonably fit persons should be able to make it in about 45 minutes. Stone steps are laid along most of the path, and in the steeper sections steel cables provide a supporting handrail. That said, expect to be out of breath, and take care in the steeper portions, especially when wet, as it can become dangerous quickly. There's a tiny cave near the top that must be passed through, it is quite low and a rather tight squeeze.

src: मोयोर्केली खाना, भूमध्यसागरमा उस्तै क्षेत्र भएको जस्तो, रोटी, तरकारी र मासुमा आधारित छ (विशेष किसिमको सुँगुरको मासु), जसमा धेरै मात्रामा जैतुनको तेल प्रयोग हुने गर्दछ। विशेष गरी गर्मीको समयमा साधारण डिनर पा एम्ब ओली हो। जैतूनको तेल, टमाटर र कुनै पनि उपलब्ध मसला जस्तै चीज, टुना माछासँग रोटी।
mt: The cuisine of Majorca, like the rest of the Balearic Islands, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (especially a certain type of lamb), with a lot of olive oil used. A typical dinner in the summer is pa amb oli. Olive oil, tomatoes and any available meat with cheese, tuna fish with bread.
ref: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout. A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.

src: ह्याङ्गी खानालाई जमिनको तातो खाल्डोमा पकाइन्छ। खाल्डोलाई कि त आगोबाट तातो ढुङ्गाले तताइन्छ वा केहि स्थानहरूमा भूतापीय तापले जमिनको क्षेत्रलाई प्राकृतिक रूपमा तातो बनाउँछ। ह्याङ्गीलाई प्राय: परम्परागत रोस्ट शैलीको डिनर बनाउन प्रयोग गरिन्छ। रोटरूआका धेरै स्थानहरूले भू-तापीय हाङ्गी प्रक्रिया प्रस्ताव गर्दछन् भने अन्य हाङ्गी क्राइस्टचर्च, वेलिङ्टन र अन्य ठाउँमा नमूना राख्न सकिन्छ।
mt: The heat from the ground is hanged. The ground is heated by the heat of the fire or by some places the geothermal heat makes the area of the earth naturally hot. The hanger is usually used to make a traditional roast style dinner. Many places offer geothermal hanger process, while other hangers can be stored in Christchurch, Wellington and other places.
ref: A Hangi Meal is cooked in a hot pit in the ground. The pit is either heated with hot stones from a fire, or in some places geothermal heat makes areas of ground naturally hot. The hangi is often used to cook a traditional roast style dinner. Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.

src: ह्याङ्गी खानालाई जमिनको तातो खाल्डोमा पकाइन्छ। खाल्डोलाई कि त आगोबाट तातो ढुङ्गाले तताइन्छ वा केहि स्थानहरूमा भूतापीय तापले जमिनको क्षेत्रलाई प्राकृतिक रूपमा तातो बनाउँछ। ह्याङ्गीलाई प्राय: परम्परागत रोस्ट शैलीको डिनर बनाउन प्रयोग गरिन्छ। रोटरूआका धेरै स्थानहरूले भू-तापीय हाङ्गी प्रक्रिया प्रस्ताव गर्दछन् भने अन्य हाङ्गी क्राइस्टचर्च, वेलिङ्टन र अन्य ठाउँमा नमूना राख्न सकिन्छ।

src: मठहरूको भ्रमण गर्दा, महिलाहरूले घुँडा ढाक्ने स्कर्ट लगानुपर्छ र उनीहरूको काँध पनि छोपिएको हुनुपर्छ। धेरैजसो गुम्बाले विनातयारी आउने महिलाहरूका लागि चादर उपलब्ध गराउँछन्। तर तपाईंले आफैं चादर लिएर आउनुभयो र अझ त्यो उज्यालो रङको छ भने तपाईंले प्रवेशद्वारमा भिक्षु वा योगीबाट मुस्कान पाउनुहुनेछ। त्यसै गरी, पुरुषहरूले घुँडा ढाकिने गरी ट्राउजरहरू लगाउनु आवश्यक हुन्छ। यो पनि प्रवेशद्वारमा स्टकबाट उधारो लिन सकिन्छ तर त्यो लुगा हरेक प्रयोगकर्ताले लगाएपछि धोइएको छैन त्यसैले तपाईं यी स्कर्ट लगाउन सहज महसुस गर्न सक्नुहुन्न। एउटै आकार सबै पुरुषहरूका लागि फिट हुन्छ!
mt: When visiting monasteries, women must wear skirts that cover their ankles and their shoulders must be covered. Most temples provide coverings for women who are not prepared. However, if you have brought your own coverings and they are light-colored, you will receive a smile from the monk or yogi at the entrance. Similarly, men must wear trousers that cover their ankles. This can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance, but if everyone wears them after use, you will not feel comfortable wearing these skirts!
ref: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too. Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance. Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees. This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!

src: तपाईं जाडोमा आर्कटिक वा अन्टार्कटिक क्षेत्रहरू भ्रमण गर्नु हुन्छ भने तपाईंले ध्रुवीय रातको अनुभव गर्नु हुनेछ जसको मतलब सूर्य क्षितिज भन्दा माथि उदाउँदैन। यसले अरोरा बोरलिसलाई हेर्नका लागि राम्रो अवसर प्रदान गर्छ, किनकि आकाश प्राय:जसो समयमा अध्यारो हुने छ। यी क्षेत्रहरूमा फाट्टफुट्ट जनसंख्या भएकाले यहाँ प्रायः प्रकाश प्रदूषणको समस्या हुँदैन र तपाईं ताराहरूको आनन्द लिन पनि सक्षम हुनुहुनेछ।
mt: If you are visiting the Arctic or Antarctic regions during the winter, you will experience the midnight sun, meaning the sun never sets below the horizon. This provides a good opportunity to observe the aurora borealis, as the sky is usually clear most of the time. There is usually little light pollution in these regions due to the sparse population, so you will be able to enjoy the stars.
ref: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon. This offers a good opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, as the sky will be dark more or less around the clock. As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.

src: दुर्गम स्थानहरूमा, सेल फोनको कभरेज बिना, उपग्रह फोन तपाईंको एक मात्र विकल्प हुन सक्छ। उपग्रह फोन सामान्यतया मोबाइल फोनका लागि प्रतिस्थापन हुँदैन, किनभने तपाईं फोन सम्पर्क गर्नका लागि उपग्रहको स्पष्ट लाइनमा बाहिर बसेको हुनुपर्छ। रिमोट डाटा, आवाजको आवश्यकता र खुशी शिल्प भएका अभियानहरूसहित सेवाको बारम्बार सिपिङद्वारा प्रयोग गरिन्छ। यस सेवामा जडानका बारेमा तपाईंको स्थानीय टेलिफोन सेवा प्रदायकले धेरै जानकारी दिन सक्नु पर्छ।
mt: In remote areas, where cell phone coverage is unavailable, a satellite phone may be your only option. Satellite phones are not a replacement for mobile phones, as you must be in clear line of sight of a satellite to make a call. They are used in remote data, voice, and happiness projects, as well as repeated signaling of service. Your local telephone service provider should be able to provide you with a lot of information about this service.
ref: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option. A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call. The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs. Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.

src: चिसिनाउ मोल्डोभाको राजधानी हो। रूसी व्यापक रूपमा प्रयोग भए पनि त्यहाँको स्थानीय भाषा रोमनियान हो। मोल्दोभा एक बहु-जातीय गणतन्त्र राष्ट्र हो तथापि यो जातीय द्वन्द्वबाट ग्रसित छ। 1994 मा, यो द्वन्द्वले पूर्वी मोल्डोभाको स्व-उद्घोषित ट्रान्सनिस्ट्रिया गणतन्त्रमा पुर्‍यायो, जसको आफ्नै सरकार र मुद्रा थियो तर UN सदस्य राष्ट्रमा मान्यता प्राप्त छैन।। राजनीतिक वार्तामा असफल भए पनि मोल्डोभाका यी दुई भागहरूका बीच आर्थिक सम्बन्ध पुनः स्थापित भएको छ। मोल्दोभाको प्रमुख धर्म भनेको आस्थिक इसाई हो।
mt: Chisinau is the capital of Moldova. Russian is widely used there, but the local language is Romanian. Moldova is a multiethnic republic, but it is troubled by ethnic strife. In 1994, this strife spilled over into the self-proclaimed Transnistrian Republic of Eastern Moldova, which had its own government and currency, but is not recognized as a member state by the UN. Political talks have failed, but economic relations between these two parts of Moldova have been re-established. The main religion of Moldova is Eastern Orthodox Christianity.
ref: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used. Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict. In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country. Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations. The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.

src: मोन्टेभिडियो भूमध्यरेखाको दक्षिणमा रहेकोले, उत्तरी गोलार्द्धमा जाडोयाम हुँदा त्यहाँ ग्रीष्मयाम हुन्छ र यस्तै विपरित हुन्छ। मोन्टेभिडियो उपोष्णकटिबंधीय क्षेत्रमा छ; गर्मी महिनाहरूमा, +30°Cभन्दा माथिको तापमान सामान्य हो। जाडोमा नराम्रोसँग चिसो हुन सक्छ: तापक्रम विरलै जमिनभन्दा तल जान्छ तर हावा र आर्द्रताले मिसाएर थर्मोमिटरकोभन्दा चिसो महसुस गराउँछ। त्यहाँ कुनै विशेष “वर्षा” र “सुख्खा” ऋतुहरू छैनन्: वर्षाको मात्रा लगभग वर्षभरि उस्तै रहन्छ।
mt: Montevideo is in the Southern Hemisphere, so in the Northern Hemisphere's winter, it is summer there. Montevideo is in a tropical zone; in the warm months, temperatures can be above +30°C. In winter, it can be quite cold: the temperature rarely goes below ground level, but the air and humidity mix to make the thermometer feel colder. There are no special "rainy" and "dry" seasons: the amount of rain is about the same all year.
ref: "Since Montevideo is south of the Equator, it is summer there when it's winter in the Northern Hemisphere and vice versa. Montevideo is in the subtropics; in the summer months, temperatures above +30°C are common. The winter can be deceptively chilly: temperatures rarely go below freezing, but the wind and humidity combine to make it feel colder than what the thermometer says. There are no particular ""rainy"" and ""dry"" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year."

src: नचाहेको भित्ते चित्र वा भद्दा लेखोटलाई भित्ते चित्रणको रूपमा चिनिन्छ। यद्यपि, आजकल स्थापित ग्राफिटि कलाकारहरू, ग्राफिटि कार्यक्रमहरू र “कानूनी” भित्ताहरू छन्। यस सन्दर्भमा ग्राफिटि पेन्टिङहरू प्राय: अवैधानिक ट्यागहरूभन्दा पनि कलाकृति जस्तै देखिन्छन्। धेरै पर्यटकहरू गर्न चाहने बुमेराङ्ग थ्रोइङ्ग एउटा लोकप्रिय कौशल हो।
mt: Graffiti is writing or drawings made on a wall and considered vandalism. However, there are now established graffiti programs, graffiti artists, and "legal" walls. In this context, graffiti pens are often considered more like art than illegal tags. Many tourists want to do a graffiti throw-up, a popular skill.
ref: "Unwanted murals or scribble is known as graffiti. While it's far from a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with youth vandalizing public and private property using spray paint. However, nowadays there are established graffiti artists, graffiti events and ""legal"" walls. Graffiti paintings in this context often resemble artworks rather than illegible tags."

src: केही उत्सवहरूका लागि, सङ्गीत उत्सवहरूमा उपस्थित धेरैले साइटमा शिविर राख्ने निर्णय गर्छन् र अधिकांश उपस्थितहरू यसलाई अनुभवको एक महत्त्वपूर्ण हिस्सा मान्छन्। तपाईं कार्यको नजिक हुन चाहनुहुन्छ भने सङ्गीतको नजिक एउटा क्याम्पिङ क्षेत्र प्राप्त गर्न छिट्टै पुग्नु पर्छ। मुख्य चरणहरूमा सङ्गीत समाप्त भए तापनि, बेलुका रातिसम्म सङ्गीत जारी रहने चाडपर्वका केही अंशहरू हुन सक्छन् भन्ने कुरामा विशेष ध्यान दिनु पर्दछ। केही चाडहरूमा साना परिवार सहितका साना बालबालिकाहरूका लागि विशेष शिविर क्षेत्र राखिएको छ।
mt: For some festivals, many of the attendees set up camp on site and most of the attendees consider this to be an important part of the experience. If you are coming to the event, you should get to the camping area quickly. The main stages will be over by the end of the music, but some parts of the festival may continue into the night. Some festivals have special camping areas for small families with small children.
ref: For some festivals, the vast majority of the attendants to music festivals decide to camp on site, and most attendants consider it a vital part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music. Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.

src: धेरै पियोबल्सहरू जति नै टाढा भए तापनि, तपाईं अल्बुकर्क वा सान्ता फे यात्रा नगरी पर्याप्त रात्री जीवन पाउन सक्नुहुन्न। यद्यपि, माथि सूचिकृत गरिएका लगभग सबैजसो क्यासिनोहरूले पेय पदार्थ बेच्दछन् र तीमध्ये धेरैजसोले नाम-ब्रान्ड मनोरञ्जन (प्राथमिक रूपमा विशाल अल्बुकर्क र सान्टा फेको वरिपरिको) प्रदान गर्छन्। सावधान रहनुहोस्: यहाँका साना शहरी बारहरू राज्य बाहिरका आगन्तुकहरूलाई रमाइलो गर्नका लागि सधैं राम्रो ठाउँ हुँदैन। एक त, उत्तरी न्यू मेक्सिकोमा मदिरा सेवन गरेर सवारी चलाउने थुप्रै मात्रामा समस्याहरू छन् र मदिराले मातिएका सवारी चालकको एकाग्रता साना सहरका बारहरू नजिक उच्च छ।
mt: You can't get enough of the pioballs, but you can't get enough of the night life if you don't go to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. Most of the casinos here sell alcohol and many of them provide name-brand entertainment (primarily large Albuquerque and Santa Fe surrounding). Be careful: the small city bars are not a good place for out-of-state visitors to have fun. One, there are a lot of problems with drunk driving in Northern New Mexico and the concentration of drunk drivers is high in small city bars.
ref: Given how remote many of the pueblos are, you won't be able to find a significant amount of nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. However, nearly all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and several of them bring in name-brand entertainment (primarily the large ones immediately surrounding Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out. For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars.

Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out. For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars.

src: मुख्य स्थानीय बियर “नम्बर वन” हो, यो जटिल बियर होइन, तर रमाइलो र स्फूर्तिदायक छ। अर्को स्थानीय बियरलाई “मन्ता” भनिन्छ। यहाँ धेरै फ्रान्सेली वाइन उपलब्ध छन् तर न्युजिल्यान्ड र अस्ट्रेलियाको वाइन लिएर जानु अझ राम्रो हुन सक्छ। स्थानीय ट्याप पानी पिउन पूर्णतया सुरक्षित छ तर तपाईं डराउनुहुन्छ भने बोतलको पानी सजिलैसँग भेट्न सकिन्छ। अष्ट्रेलियालीहरूका लागि “सादा सेतो” कफीको विचार विदेशी हो। छोटो कालो “एस्प्रेसो” हो, क्यापुचिनो क्रीमसहित माथि आउँछ (फिँज जस्तो होइन) र दूध बिनाको चिया दिइन्छ। हट चकलेट बेल्जियमको मानक स्तरमा छ। फलका रस महङ्गो भए पनि उत्कृष्ट छ।
mt: 1. The main local beer is “Number One”, not a complex beer, but fun and invigorating. Another local beer is called “Manta”. There are many French wines available, but New Zealand and Australian wines are even better. Local tap water is completely safe to drink, but if you are worried, bottled water is easily found. For Australians, “plain white” coffee is foreign. Short black “espresso” comes with capuchino cream on top (not like a frappe) and milk is served with tea. Hot chocolate is at Belgian standards. Fruit juices are expensive but excellent.
ref: "The main local beer is 'Number One', it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called ""Manta"". There are many French wines to be had, but the New Zealand and Australian wines might travel better. The local tap water is perfectly safe to drink, but bottled water is easy to find if you are fearful. For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk. The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent."

src: अहिलेको पूर्वी पाराग्वे भनिनेमा बसोवास गर्ने सबैभन्दा महत्त्वपूर्ण आदिवासी समूह ग्वारानी थिए, जो अर्ध-यायावर सिकारीहरूको रूपमा बस्थे जसले जीविका कृषिको अभ्यास गरे। चाको क्षेत्र आदिवासी जनजातिहरू गुयक्युरी र पायागुईजस्ता अन्य समूहहरूको घर थियो, जो शिकार गर्ने, भेला हुने र माछा मार्दै जीविकोपार्जन गरिरहेका थिए। 16 औँ शताब्दीमा पाराग्वे, जसलाई पहिले “इन्डिजको विशाल प्रान्त भनिन्थ्यो”,को जन्म जन्मजात आदिवासी समूहहरूसँग स्पेनी विजेताहरूको सामनाको परिणामका रूपमा भएको हो। स्पेनीहरूले औपनिवेशीकरण सुरु गरे जुन तीन शताब्दीसम्म रह्यो। 1537 मा एसुन्सियनको स्थापना भएदेखि, पाराग्वेले आफ्ना धेरै आदिवासी चरित्र र पहिचान राख्न सफल भएको छ।
mt: The most important indigenous group in the current Eastern Paraguay were the Guaraní, who were semi-nomadic hunters who practiced agriculture. The Chaco region was home to indigenous groups such as the Guaycuru and Payaguá, who were hunters, gatherers, and fishermen. The birth of Paraguay, which was once called the "Great Province of the Indians", was the result of the encounter of its native-born indigenous groups with Spanish conquerors. The Spanish began the process of colonization, which lasted for three centuries. Since the establishment of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has been successful in retaining many of its indigenous characteristics and identity.
ref: "The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture. The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing. In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called ""The Giant Province of the Indies"", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups. The Spaniards started the colonization period which lasted for three centuries. Since the foundation of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has managed to keep a lot of its indigenous character and identity."

src: पेरिसबासीहरूलाई अहङ्कारी, असभ्य र घमण्डी भएकोमा गर्व छ। जबकि यो प्रायः एक गलत परम्परागत संस्कार मात्र हो, जुन कुनै व्यक्ति जस्तै “बिएन एलेभे” (राम्रोसँग ल्याइएको) को जस्तो व्यवहार गर्दै पेरिस जाने उत्तम तरिका भनेको तपाईंको उत्तम व्यवहार हुनु हो। यसले पुग्नलाई एकदमै सजिलो बनाउने छ। तपाईंले केही आधारभूत शिष्टाचारहरू गर्नुभयो भने पेरिसियनहरू अचानक आफैं पग्लिने छन्‌।
mt: Parisians are proud of their arrogance, rudeness and conceit. While this is usually just a mistaken traditional custom, like the way someone like "Bien Elevé" (well brought up) behaves when going to Paris, it is your excellent behavior. It will make things much easier for you. If you have done some basic etiquette, Parisians will suddenly be on their best behavior.
ref: "Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant. While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is ""bien élevé"" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier. Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies."
