src: युद्ध क्षेत्र मान्न सकिने कुनै देशको यात्राको योजना बनाएका जो कोहीले पनि व्यवसायिक प्रशिक्षण लिनुपर्दछ। “शत्रुतापूर्ण वातावरण पाठ्यक्रम” का लागि इन्टरनेटको खोजले सम्भवतः एक स्थानीय कम्पनीको ठेगाना प्रदान गर्नेछ। एउटा कोर्सले सामान्यतयाः व्यवहारिक अनुभवसहित यहाँ अझ विस्तृतमा छलफल गरिएको सबै मुद्दाहरूको समेट्दछ। एक पाठ्यक्रम साधारणतया 2-5 दिनको हुन्छ र भूमिका निभाउने, थुप्रै प्राथमिक उपचार र कहिलेकाहिँ हतियारहरूसम्बन्धी प्रशिक्षण समावेश हुनेछ। जङ्गल र प्रकृति बचाउनका लागि प्रकाशित पुस्तक र पत्रिकाहरू सामान्य छन्, तर युद्ध क्षेत्रहरूसँग सम्बन्धित प्रकाशनहरू थोरै छन्।
mt: Anyone planning a trip to a country considered a war zone should also plan to receive business training. A search of the Internet may lead to the address of a local company. One course includes a discussion of all the issues here in more detail, with practical experience. A typical course is 2-5 days long and includes acting, primary care and sometimes weapons training. There are general books and magazines on saving the jungle and nature, but there are few publications related to war zones.
ref: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training. A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company. A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience. A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.

src: युद्ध क्षेत्र मान्न सकिने कुनै देशको यात्राको योजना बनाएका जो कोहीले पनि व्यवसायिक प्रशिक्षण लिनुपर्दछ। “शत्रुतापूर्ण वातावरण पाठ्यक्रम” का लागि इन्टरनेटको खोजले सम्भवतः एक स्थानीय कम्पनीको ठेगाना प्रदान गर्नेछ। एउटा कोर्सले सामान्यतयाः व्यवहारिक अनुभवसहित यहाँ अझ विस्तृतमा छलफल गरिएको सबै मुद्दाहरूको समेट्दछ। एक पाठ्यक्रम साधारणतया 2-5 दिनको हुन्छ र भूमिका निभाउने, थुप्रै प्राथमिक उपचार र कहिलेकाहिँ हतियारहरूसम्बन्धी प्रशिक्षण समावेश हुनेछ। जङ्गल र प्रकृति बचाउनका लागि प्रकाशित पुस्तक र पत्रिकाहरू सामान्य छन्, तर युद्ध क्षेत्रहरूसँग सम्बन्धित प्रकाशनहरू थोरै छन्।
mt: Anyone planning a trip to a country considered a war zone should also plan to receive business training. A search of the Internet may lead to the address of a local company. One course includes a discussion of all the issues here in more detail, with practical experience. A typical course is 2-5 days long and includes acting, primary care and sometimes weapons training. There are general books and magazines on saving the jungle and nature, but there are few publications related to war zones.
ref: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training. A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company. A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience. A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.

src: पानी शुद्धीकरण गर्ने विभिन्न तरिकाहरू छन्, केही विशेष खतराहरूको विरuद्ध ज्यादा प्रभावकारी हुन्छन्। केही क्षेत्रहरूमा एक मिनेट पानी उमाल्न पर्याप्त छ, अरूमा धेरै मिनेट आवश्यक छ। प्रभावकारितामा फिल्टरहरू भिन्न हुन्छन् र तपाईंको चासो हुनुपर्छ, तब तपाईंले प्रतिष्ठित कम्पनीबाट सिल लगाइएको बोतलमा आफ्नो पानी किन्न विचार गर्नुपर्दछ।
mt: There are various ways to purify water, some are more effective against certain hazards. In some areas, a minute of boiling is sufficient, in others, more minutes are needed. Filters vary in effectiveness and you should consider buying your water from a reputable company in a bottle.
ref: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats. In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed. Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.

src: प्रायः चट्टानमा वा यस्तै प्रकारमा चीर प्रवाह समुद्र किनारमा छालहरूले छोड्दै आएको प्रवाह हो। पानी भित्रको भू-बनोटको कारण फिर्ता प्रवाह केही गहिरो खण्डहरूमा केन्द्रित हुन्छ, र त्यहाँ पानीको गहिराइमा एक द्रुत प्रवाह उत्पन्न हुन सक्छ। धेरैजसो मृत्युहरू थकाइको परिणामस्वरूप छालको प्रवाह विरूद्ध पौडिन खोज्नाले गर्दा हुन्छन् जुन असम्भव हुन सक्दछ। तपाईं बेगबाट बाहिर निस्कनेबित्तिकै पौडी खेल्नु सामान्यभन्दा धेरै गाह्रो हुँदैन। जहाँ तपाईंलाई फेरि समातिदैन वा तपाईंको कौशलतामा र तपाईंलाई ध्यान दिइएको छ कि छैन भन्नेमा आधारित रहेर कुनै ठाउँको लक्ष्य बनाउने कोसिस गर्नुहोस्, जहाँ तपाईं उद्धारका लागि कुर्न चाहन सक्नुहुनेछ।
mt: 1. The current is usually a tidal current or a similar type of current that flows along the coast. The water in the center of the current is usually deeper, and a fast current can be formed there. Most deaths are due to drowning while swimming against the current, which is impossible. It is not difficult to swim out of the water and back again, based on your ability and whether you are paying attention or not, and to set a target for any place where you want to be rescued.
ref: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar. Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there. Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible. As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally. Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.

src: वरिपरि छुट्टी मनाउने आधार बनाउन अन्तर्देशीय जलमार्ग एक राम्रो ठाउँ हुन सक्छ। उदाहरणका लागि लोइर उपत्यका, राइन उपत्यकामा भएका महलहरू यात्रा गर्ने वा डान्युबको चाखलाग्दा साइटहरूका लागि क्रुज लिने वा एरी नहरमा डुङ्गा खियाउने। लोकप्रिय पैदल र साइकल यात्राको मार्ग तिनीहरूले परिभाषित गर्छन्।
mt: A good place to base a holiday can be a river cruise. For example, the Loire valley, the Rhine valley, the castles of the Danube, the cruises of the Nile, the popular walking and cycling routes they define.
ref: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around. For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal. They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.

src: यो क्षेत्र उत्तरमा साहेलर दक्षिण र पश्चिममा एटलान्टिक महासागरद्वारा  घेरिएको छ। महिलाः यो सिफारिस गरिएको छ कि कुनै पनि महिला यात्रुले वास्तविक वैवाहिक स्थितिको पर्वाह नगरी उनीहरू विवाहित भएको भन्नुपर्दछ। औँठी पनि लगाउनु उपयोगी हुन्छ (केवल महँगो देखिने औँठी मात्र होइन)। सांस्कृतिक भिन्नताको परिणामस्वरूप उनीहरूले उत्पीडनका बारेमा के सोच्दछन् भन्ने बारेमा महिलाहरूले बुझ्नु पर्दछ र यो अनुसरण गर्न असाधारण कुरा होइन जसमा हात समात्नु आदि समावेश छन्। पुरुषहरूलाई कमजोर देखाउन दृढ हुनुहोस् र आफ्नो स्थान खडा गर्न नडराउन हुँदैन (सांस्कृतिक भिन्नता नभए पंनि यसले ठिक बनाउँदैन!)।
mt: This region is bordered to the north by Sahara, to the east by the Red Sea, and to the west by the Atlantic Ocean. Women: It is suggested that any female traveler claim to be married, even if she is not. Wearing a ring is useful (not just expensive rings). Understand how women think about harassment, and this is not an extraordinary thing to do, including holding hands. Be strong and don't let yourself be intimidated (cultural differences or not, this works!).
ref: In the north the region is bounded by the Sahel, and in the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean. Women: It is recommended that any women travellers say that they are married, regardless of actual marital status. It is helpful to also wear a ring (just not one that looks too expensive. Women should realize that cultural differences may result in what they would consider harassment and it is not uncommon to be followed, grabbed by the arm, etc. Be firm in turning down men, and don't be afraid to stand your ground (cultural differences or not, it doesn't make it ok!).

src: यो क्षेत्र उत्तरमा साहेलर दक्षिण र पश्चिममा एटलान्टिक महासागरद्वारा  घेरिएको छ। महिलाः यो सिफारिस गरिएको छ कि कुनै पनि महिला यात्रुले वास्तविक वैवाहिक स्थितिको पर्वाह नगरी उनीहरू विवाहित भएको भन्नुपर्दछ। औँठी पनि लगाउनु उपयोगी हुन्छ (केवल महँगो देखिने औँठी मात्र होइन)। सांस्कृतिक भिन्नताको परिणामस्वरूप उनीहरूले उत्पीडनका बारेमा के सोच्दछन् भन्ने बारेमा महिलाहरूले बुझ्नु पर्दछ र यो अनुसरण गर्न असाधारण कुरा होइन जसमा हात समात्नु आदि समावेश छन्। पुरुषहरूलाई कमजोर देखाउन दृढ हुनुहोस् र आफ्नो स्थान खडा गर्न नडराउन हुँदैन (सांस्कृतिक भिन्नता नभए पंनि यसले ठिक बनाउँदैन!)।

src: वाइल्डलाइफ फोटोग्राफरको सबैभन्दा चुनौतीपूर्ण अभिप्रायहरू मध्ये एक हो र यसलाई भाग्य, धैर्यता, अनुभव र राम्रो उपकरणको संयोजन आवश्यक हुन्छ। वाइल्डलाइफ फोटोग्राफी प्राय: अनुमोदनका रूपमा लिइन्छ तर सामान्यतया फोटोग्राफी चित्रले हजार शब्दहरूको लायक हुन्छ। वाइल्डलाइफ फोटोग्राफीका लागि प्राय: लामो टेलिफोटो लेन्सको आवश्यक परेता पनि चराहरूको बथान वा साना प्राणी जस्ता चीजलाई अन्य प्रकारका लेन्सहरू चाहिन्छ। धेरै लोपन्मुख जनावरहरू भेट्टाउन गाह्रो हुन्छ। पार्कहरूमा कहिलेकाहीँ व्यावसायिक उद्देश्यका लागि फोटोहरू लिन नियमहरू हुन्छन्। जङ्गली जनावरहरू लजालु वा आक्रामक हुन सक्छन्। वातावरण चिसो, तातो वा शत्रुतापूर्ण हुन सक्छ।
mt: 1. One of the most challenging aspects of wildlife photography is luck, patience, experience and good equipment. Wildlife photography is often seen as a form of approval, but a photograph can be worth a thousand words. Wildlife photographers often need a long telephoto lens to capture birds or small animals, but many animals are shy. There are often rules in parks for commercial purposes. Wild animals can be shy or aggressive. The environment can be cold, hot or hostile.
ref: Wildlife is among the most challenging motifs for a photographer, and needs a combination of good luck, patience, experience and good equipment. Wildlife photography is often taken for granted, but like photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words. Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, though things like a flock of birds or a tiny creature need other lenses. Many exotic animals are hard to find, and parks sometimes have rules about taking photographs for commercial purposes. Wild animals might either be shy or aggressive. The environment might be cold, hot, or otherwise hostile.

src: वाइल्डलाइफ फोटोग्राफरको सबैभन्दा चुनौतीपूर्ण अभिप्रायहरू मध्ये एक हो र यसलाई भाग्य, धैर्यता, अनुभव र राम्रो उपकरणको संयोजन आवश्यक हुन्छ। वाइल्डलाइफ फोटोग्राफी प्राय: अनुमोदनका रूपमा लिइन्छ तर सामान्यतया फोटोग्राफी चित्रले हजार शब्दहरूको लायक हुन्छ। वाइल्डलाइफ फोटोग्राफीका लागि प्राय: लामो टेलिफोटो लेन्सको आवश्यक परेता पनि चराहरूको बथान वा साना प्राणी जस्ता चीजलाई अन्य प्रकारका लेन्सहरू चाहिन्छ। धेरै लोपन्मुख जनावरहरू भेट्टाउन गाह्रो हुन्छ। पार्कहरूमा कहिलेकाहीँ व्यावसायिक उद्देश्यका लागि फोटोहरू लिन नियमहरू हुन्छन्। जङ्गली जनावरहरू लजालु वा आक्रामक हुन सक्छन्। वातावरण चिसो, तातो वा शत्रुतापूर्ण हुन सक्छ।

src: उच्च अक्षांश वा हिमाली क्षेत्रमा कोही सवारी चलाउँदै जाँदैछ भने उसले हिउँ, बरफ वा हिउँ पर्ने तापक्रमको सम्भावनालाई विचार गर्नुपर्छ। बर्फीलो र हिउँ भएका रोडहरुमा, घर्षण कम हुन्छ र तपाईँ खाली अलकत्रामा चलाएको जसरी गाडी चलाउन सक्नुहुन्न। हिम आँधीको बेलामा, तपाईंलाई धेरै कम समयमा पनि धेरै हिउँले अड्काउन सक्दछ। हिउ परेर वा उडाएर वा सवारी साधनको झ्यालमा बाक्लो बाफ वा बरफद्वारा हेर्ने दृष्यता प्रतिबन्धित हुन सक्छ। अर्कोतर्फ, धेरै देशहरूमा बर्फिलो र हिउँ परेको अवस्था सामान्य हुन्छन् र वर्षभरि ट्राफिक अवरोध हुन्छ।
mt: If you are driving in high latitudes or mountainous areas, you should consider the possibility of snow, ice or cold temperatures. On snowy or icy roads, friction is reduced and you cannot drive as if you were on a dry road. In the winter, you can be covered with snow or blown away by the wind in a short time. Visibility can be restricted by snow or ice on the windshield or on the vehicle's grille. On the other hand, snow and ice are common in many countries and traffic jams occur throughout the year.
ref: Anyone who's going to drive at high latitudes or over mountain passes should consider the possibility of snow, ice, or freezing temperatures. On icy and snowy roadways, friction is low and you cannot drive as if you were on bare asphalt. During blizzards, enough snow to get you stuck can fall in very little time. Visibility may also be restricted by falling or blowing snow or by condensation or ice on vehicle windows. On the other hand, icy and snowy conditions are normal in many countries, and traffic goes on mostly uninterrupted all year round.

src: तपाईं कूटनीतिज्ञ नभएसम्म विदेशमा काम गर्नुको मतलब तपाईंले आफू बसेको देशमा आयकर हाल्नु पर्ने हुन्छ। देशअनुसार आयकरसम्बन्धी फरक फरक व्यवस्था गरिएको हुन्छ र करको दर र सीमा देशपिच्छे भिन्न हुन्छ। संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिका र क्यानाडा जस्ता केही सङ्घीय देशहरूमा, आयकर सङ्घीय स्तर र स्थानीय स्तर दुवैमा लगाइन्छ, त्यसैले दर र वर्ग क्षेत्रअनुसार फरक हुन सक्छ।
mt: If you are not a diplomat, working abroad means you have to pay taxes in the country you are based in. There are different tax arrangements in different countries, and the rate and limit vary between countries. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, taxes are collected at the federal and local levels, so the rate and class area may vary.
ref: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in. Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.

src: विश्व मेला (विश्व प्रदर्शनी वा प्रदर्शनी भनिन्छ) कला र विज्ञानको अन्तर्राष्ट्रिय महोत्सव हो। सहभागी देशहरूले संसारका समस्याहरू वा तिनीहरूका देशका संस्कृति र इतिहास देखाउन राष्ट्रिय स्तम्भहरूमा कलात्मक र शैक्षिक प्रदर्शनहरू प्रस्तुत गर्छन्। अन्तर्राष्ट्रिय बागवानी प्रदर्शन विशेष कार्यक्रमहरू हुन् जसले फूलहरूको प्रदर्शन, बोटानिकल बगैँचा र बोटबिरूवासँग सम्बन्धित कुराहरूको प्रदर्शन गर्दछन्। यद्यपि सिद्धान्तमा उनीहरू वार्षिक रूपमा घटित हुन सक्दछन् (तिनीहरू विभिन्न देशहरूमा भएसम्म), व्यवहारमा तिनीहरू छैनन्। यी घटनाहरू सामान्यतया कहीँ पनि तीनदेखि छ महिनाका बिचमा रहन्छन् र कम्तिमा पनि 50 हेक्टर क्षेत्रफल भएका साइटहरूमा आयोजित गरिन्छ।
mt: A World's Fair (also known as a World's Exposition or Expo) is an international exhibition held in accordance with protocols established in the Convention Relating to International Exhibitions. The event is a display of nations' industries, inventions, and achievements. Participants are usually countries, but they can also be groups of countries, regions, or private-sector organizations. The World's Fair is a place where countries can show off their culture, technology, and economic power. The World's Fair is also a place where countries can show off their culture, technology, and economic power. ref: A World's Fair (commonly called World Exposition, or simply Expo) is large international festival of arts and sciences. Participating countries present artistic and educational displays in national pavilions to showcase world issues or their country's culture and history. International Horticultural Expositions are specialised events which showcase floral displays, botanical gardens and anything else to do with plants. Although in theory they can take place annually (so long as they are in different countries), in practice they are not. These events normally last anywhere between three and six months, and are held on sites no smaller than 50 hectares.

src: यद्यपि पार्कमा भएका धेरैजस्ता जनावरहरू मानवहरू देख्ने बानी भएका हुन्छन्, वन्यजन्तुहरू जंगली भए तापनि उनीहरूलाई खुवाउने वा तर्साउने गर्नु हुँदैन। भालु र ब्वाँसोहरूबाट कम्तीमा 100 गज/ मिटर टाढा र अन्य सबै जङ्गली जनावरहरूबाट 25 गज/मिटर रहन पार्क अधिकारीहरू भने! बाइसन, एल्क, मूस, भालु र लगभग सबै ठूला जनावरहरूले जस्ता नरम देखिए पनि आक्रमण गर्न सक्छन्। उनीहरूले उचित दूरी नबनाउँदा प्रत्येक वर्ष दर्जनौं आगन्तुक घाइते हुन्छन्। यी जनावरहरू ठूला, जङ्गली र सम्भावित खतरनाक हुनाले उनीहरूलाई आफ्नो ठाउँ दिनुहोस्। थप रूपमा, सावधान रहनुहोस् कि गन्धले भालु र अन्य वन्यजन्तुहरूलाई आकर्षित गर्दछ, त्यसैले गन्ध युक्त खाना बोक्ने वा पकाउने कार्य नगर्नुहोस् र शिविर सफा राख्नुहोस्।
mt: While most of the animals in the park are used to seeing humans, wild animals should not be fed or taunted. Bison and bighorn sheep should be kept at least 100 yards (91 m) away, and all other wild animals should be kept at least 25 yards (23 m) away, according to park officials! Bison, elk, moose, bighorn sheep, and most large animals appear tame, but can attack. Each year, dozens of visitors are injured by these animals. These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so keep your distance. Additionally, be aware that scent can attract bighorn sheep and other wildlife, so do not bring food with a strong smell or cook food in the campsite, and keep the campsite clean.
ref: Though many of the animals in the park are used to seeing humans, the wildlife is nonetheless wild and should not be fed or disturbed. According to park authorities, stay at least 100 yards/meters away from bears and wolves and 25 yards/meters from all other wild animals! No matter how docile they may look, bison, elk, moose, bears, and nearly all large animals can attack. Each year, dozens of visitors are injured because they didn't keep a proper distance. These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so give them their space. In addition, be aware that odors attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking odorous foods and keep a clean camp.
